§III.301 hana brata, aṅambaṅ, ṅa, yan amaṅan kinambaṅakәn riṅ bañu, satavun samayanya, bhaṭāra viṣṇu maveh brata, pha, mañjanma riṅ kaḍaṅ ajī, sugih vәsi, tūr keḍәp kavi prajurit.

§IV nyan ta saṅ citta varaṇā, umarah [ri] saṅ vala kula, mūla tattvaniṅ dadi kabeh, pahenak paṅrәṅə̄nta, mūlabhoktaniṅ kanirāśrayan, mvaṅ kābhyudayan, bhāvanya mvaṅ lakṣaṇanya, pūrvanya mvaṅ vәkasnya, maṅkana liṅ saṅ vala kula, nǝmbah hulun, Om̐ viku satakvan[,] tānaku, kita pva siksa ṅaran ika, duga-duga tumakvan, vuvus maṅkana, rәṅə̄n siptan i ṅhulun. pūrvaṃ śrī puruṣānte, varānugraha makanya, saṅ rojyam, narāsakane, Ayavaṃ vidyaṃ prajayaṃ. maṅkana pariñciniṅ cipta, kaliṅanya, pūrva haraniṅ mimitan, tripuruṣa haraniṅ brahmā viṣṇu Iśvara, vara ṅaraniṅ amiddhi , anugraha haraniṅ panuṅsuṅ , manoka ṅaraniṅ devata, saroja [45v] ṅaraniṅ manūtra, nara ṅaraniṅ mānuṣa, sakāla ṅaraniṅ samaṅke, yaśa ṅaraniṅ kirti, vidyā ṅaraniṅ hajī, aprayadha ṅaraniṅ pūjā, kaliṅanya, bhaṭāra sira magave pratapa riṅ vana giri, maṅaṣkāra bhaṭāra, bhaṭārī, Atitah kasukan amragat trәṣṇā, anusupi vanavāsa, maṅǝnakǝn tapa, manaṅsāra rāga, tinūt deniṅ manūṣa maṅke, atapa abrata, ayoga asamadhī, ayajña dāna kīrti, maṅhanakǝn brata apayapanya, Ulandriya, rumәgǝp pañcendriya, tuṅgalakәna riṅ tri sandhyā, piṇdhakǝn riṅ kaparāmarthan, vaḍahana yoga, sahabana samadhi, tindihana brata, tuṅgunǝniṅ dāna kīrti, laṅlaṅana riṅ āgama, pagǝrana pupūjān sasapon, lavaṅana saṅgarma, ugǝr ugǝrana sadā, inǝbana tuhu, tindihana kañciṅanā parāmartha, yeka ulahaniṅ saṅ tumaki-taki kābhyudayan, kābhyudayan ṅaranya, kavibhavan, kavibhavan ṅaranya, bandha savita, bandha savita ṅaranya, kasugihan kula rūpa, śakti vani, nirogha nirvighna , cakṣyah lavajjanā, subrata dīrgha yuṣa yovaṇa aveta urip, maṅkana phalaniṅ brata yan inabhyāsa, ya kābhyudayan de saṅ surupa, maṅkana liṅ saṅ citta varaṇa, riṅ saṅ vala kula. nambah hulun, mapa riṅ kanirāśrayan, mәne pukulun, mәne kami varah iri kita, lakoni siptaṅku riṅ lagi rumuhun, sājña pukulun, vurukәniṅ brata pukulun, pariñcinya, mvaṅ phalanya, A U ma.

§III.302 hana brata, tan pamaṅan tan paturu, bratanira saṅ hyaṅ vәkasniṅ kavi viśeṣa. pha, svarga lәvih, titisnya añakravartti, subhaga anulus, anurāga riṅ rāt, katәkan sapinakṣanira riṅ bhūmi, dinuluriṅ āyu, śakti vani mahābhāra.

§III.303 hana brata, ambhairava pakṣa, siṅ pinaṅan, tuhun tan trәṣṇeṅ turu, bhaṭāra pavakānugrahani, mvaṅ devata, [pha,] bhūta gandharva masih, janmanya puruṣa viśeṣa, subhaga hanulus, ajrih kaṅ sarva galak.

§III.304 hana brata, tan paṅgilani sarva tinaḍah, sambarana , ṅa, pha, viryavan siddha sugih saṅkan rare.

§III.305 hana brata, ṅarәṅ, ṅa, amaṅan harәṅ rumuhun[,] bhaṭārī gaṅga hyaṅniṅ brata, ma, Om̐ gaṅgā ya namah, salek samayanya, pha, apәkik kerәṅan deniṅ jagat.

§III.306 hana brata, yan amaṅan maivak harәṅ tumpə̄r, pәtaṅ tavun samayanya, pha, keḍәp riṅ samanta janma, kinasihaniṅ rāt, keḍәpiṅ arabi anak anak.

§III.307 hana brata, maṅan apisan, pituṅ lek pituṅ vәṅi samayanya, pha, kinasihaniṅ rāt.

§III.308 hana brata nitīkrama, ṅa, amaṅan sadina sapisan, saṅ hyaṅ smara hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, siṅ prih meṅgal katәmu, dirghyuṣa.

§III.309 nahan brata, maṅan piṅ saptami, pituṅ lek samayanya, kinasihaniṅ rāt phalanya.

§III.310 hana brata, ambhūmi amasar bhuvana, ṅa, pha, sugih lәmah sīma.

§III.311 hana brata, maṅaniṅ lәmah, pituṅ śaśih lavasnya, kinasihaniṅ rāt phalanya, bhūmi ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.

§III.312 hana brata, mañcavara, ṅa, U, marәp maṅetan amaṅan, pa, marәp kidul amaṅan. pva, marәp aṅulon. va, marәp aṅalor amaṅan. ka, siṅ harәpira maṅan, duluranya lalab kabeh, mvaṅ kǝmbaṅ hanūt kadi varṇaniṅ sәga, pañcavarṇa, putih kuniṅ abaṅ Irәṅ, riṅ teṅah pañcavarṇa, deva rata hyaṅnya, pha, mantuk iṅ svarga pada bhaṭāra śiva, !pamit!, ma, Om̐ Om̐ śrī jagat guru paduke bhyo namah. sasarnya mañjanma rata añakravr̥tti, tan kapadhān.

§III.313 hana brata, mañca vara dalәm, ṅa, kramanya, amaṅan uyah kevala, amaṅan sәkul kevala, salek tәluṅ dina samayanya, vus maṅkana, ulam kevala, vus maṅkana, toya kevala, vus maṅkana, aṅinaṅ kevala, vus maṅkana lavasnya, kәneṅ paṅan, tan kәneṅ turu, samaṅkana lavasnya, saṅ hyaṅ vәkasiṅ anuṅku rāt hyaṅnya ikaṅ brata, tan upir upir sukanta, mantuk riṅ svargan bhaṭāra dharma, janmanya suka maṅan aṅaṅgur, tan aṅhel panambut gave, suka sugih tan pasaṅkan, kaṅ vvaṅ masih deva bikṣuka, muleh iri kita.

§III.314 hana brata, luhuriṅ kayu, ṅa, tigaṅ lek samayanya, pha, vrәddhi putra, tur keḍәp siṅ paṅucap.

§III.315 hana brata, aturu luhuriṅ kayu, salek divasanya, pha, śakti kasiddhyan kapaṅguh.

§III.316 hana brata, aṅalasa, ṅa, asaṅidaniṅ alas savәguṅ, tan papasa deniṅ voṅ, ṅuniveh sarva sato, asǝp, pha, prajurit riṅ paravu, aṅuṅgahana bahanya, va, harәṅ prajurit riṅ darāt luṅguhana vatu, [devatanya] saṅ buddha subrata, sasarnya dam puvavaṅ riṅ paravu, sugih savah, tur sugih paravu.

§III.317 hana brata, ṅraka sabran tilәm mvaṅ pūrṇama, sarva putus, ṅa, saṅ hyaṅ silih asih maveh brata, pha, tinuṅgviṅ rāma reṇa, suka sugih prih avak, tur tan paṅubiṅ voṅ atuha.

§III.318 hana brata, maṅan gǝḍaṅ tan kinulitan, tәluṅ vәṅi samayanya, saṅ hyaṅ murṣita hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, apәkik, yen istri mǝṅgǝpiṅ pahyunan, abәcikiṅ buddhi, vruhiṅ kaliṅanya, pituturiṅ bapebu.

§III.319 hana brata, maṅan tuhuṅ pitpit rumuhun, saṅ hyaṅ maṇik muñcar, ṅaraniṅ brata, saṅ hyaṅ maṇik aṅuñci pǝpǝt sira turunābrata, pinakabaghā, pinakarūpa, paṅadǝganiṅ vavadon, pinakalistvayu, [pha] drәman manis ta kita, lindihǝn voṅ apәkik, drәman anak anak, aputu riṅ niṣkala.

§III.320 hana brata, ṅgilir kacaṅ, ṅa, kramanya, aṅuvāsa savәguṅ, amaṅan savәguṅ, hyaṅ prajā sadā hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, mantuk riṅ svargan bhaṭāra Iśvara, sasarnya mañjanma suka sugih, lәvih anulus, yan lanaṅ puruṣa kula pratyakṣa anurāga kita, sugih pisis riṅ dlāha, yan istri samaṅkana.

§III.321 hana brata, yan amaṅan sinaren kasumba, saṅ hyaṅ maṇik pari rāja, ṅa, hyaṅ maṇik teja bhūmi turunābrata, ya pinakarūpa, pinakarah-dagiṅ, pinakahati, [pha,] riṅ dadi vvaṅ, suka sugih, listvayu, sәkar analum, akǝmbaṅ avoh riṅ niṣkala.

§III.322 hana brata, maṅan sәkul sapuluṅ, saṅ hyaṅ maṇik tampa, ṅaraniṅ brata, saṅ hyaṅ maṇḍala hyaṅniṅ brata, ya pinakarūpa, pinakakukusaniṅ śarīra, [pha,] asǝsǝkan kanakāguṅ, kalavan alit, aśrī asambaṅ jarijya, siddhaniṅ vvaṅ suka sugih, tan pәgat sādhana, mvaṅ mās maṇik, kinanti jagat kinanti japa kita riṅ dlāha.

§III.323 hana brata, maṅān sәkul putih kuniṅ, aṅkǝn kalivon, humārәp purvva, mevaka bhīra, paṅan pisan saṅaṅ kalivon divasanya, Uttamā saṅaṅ vulan, bhaṭāra śiva hyaṅniṅ brata, papalihan hyaṅ antadeva, ya pinakarūpa, pinakasamūha, pinakadirgha yuṣa, yan lanaṅ pinakapәkikan, pinakapolah, pinakararas, yan vadon pinakakahayon pinakapolah , pinakahibon, pha, mulihiṅ svarga bhaṭāra śiva, sasarnya mañjanma riṅ prabhu añakravarti, viku, bhujaṅga, śeva sogata, sugih malǝṅkә riṅ mās pirak, sarva sosoca, rare, hulun, kәbo sapi, mrәgādi, vrәddhi putra, tinuṅgviṅ bapebu, kaki nini, ma, Om̐ hram̐ hrim̐ sah parāmaśivāditya ya namah, ahyas.

§III.324 hana brata, amiśe[49r]ṣa, ṅa, yan amaṅan tan pahupa, anlasana sәkul, yan vus kinurәn kurәn, ma, Atma tuturakәna mariṅ bhaṭāra viśeṣa, umuṅguh riṅ vindu nadha, sakāla niṣkāla, viśeṣa bhaṭāra baja, maty aturu, maty aluṅguh, maty aṅadǝg, lәsālәyǝp, pavak tan paśarīra sakāla niṣkāla.

§III.325 hana brata, nūtakǝn saśila bhaṭāra gaṇa, amuṣpa gaṇa, ṅa, yan amaṅan sәga nǝm kǝpǝl, sarahina, tiṅkahiṅ amaṅan, śīla gaṇā, nǝm vulan samayanya, pha, mantuk iṅ bhaṭāra guru, sasarnya mañjanma riṅ viku Ijo, śakti dūra darśana, sojar ira keḍǝp.

§III.326 hana brata, maṅan sәga sinaṅga ri taṅan kiva, tan patәdha tan patambǝh, tan apilih ivaknya, Apan mayoni, ṅa, hyaṅ siddhi narasiṅha turunābrata, ya pinakarūpa, pinakalaku , [pha,] siddhaniṅ vaṅ anambadani śabda, sihniṅ rāt, ma, Om̐ Om̐ siddhi kāraṇāya namah svāhā, yan ahyas.

§III.327 hana brata, jaṅga varṇa, ṅa, amaṅan [49v] sәga balaka, pituṅ dina lavasnya mābhyāsa, pha, keḍәp savuvusta deniṅ rāt, prajñan vicakṣaṇa, biṣa gamǝl aṅiduṅ.

§III.328 hana brata, jaga śatru, ṅa, saṅ hyaṅ saptanala hyaṅniṅ brata, kramanya, taṅgal pisan piṅ ro tәmu taṅgal piṅ pitu, lamun huvus sumurup vulan juga kita vәnaṅ aturu, livat saṅkeṅ taṅgal piṅ pitu, sakarәptāturu, maṅkāneṅ krәṣṇa pakṣa, lamun mәtu vulan juga kita turu, livat saṅke rika, sakarәpta turu, pha, riṅ dadi vvaṅ sugih, tan hana nuskr̥ta , riṅ niṣkāla.

§III.329 hana brata, mūrāba, ṅa, maṅlәkasa taṅgaliṅ kapat mabrata, maṅana purāṇa, kǝmbaṅ nāgasāri, kulalaṭa, malabahaniṅ pūrṇama , polihnyāpәkik hayu tan pasiriṅ, ma, Om̐ smarāya namah, yan ahyas.

§III.330 hana brata, taṅgal piṅ savlas, Atikukus, ṅa, phalanya virya, drәman anulus.

§III.331 hana brata, maṅan aronāron, ulam kalapa binakar, lima vәlas dina divasanya, saṅ hyaṅ viśeṣa hyaṅ[50r]niṅ brata, pha, abәcik kaṅ hulon.

§III.332 hana brata, amaṅan tan paron, pituṅ lek divasanya, pha, siddhakārya, jaya patra ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.

§III.333 hana brata, ṅavaśakәn sakvehiṅ brata, pha, mantuk iṅ svarga bhaṭāra Umapati, [pha,] janmanya prabhu añakravartti, viku śakti bahu sikṣa, labdha vara subhaga.

§III.334 hana brata, kadi rare, tan kinatәṅǝtakәn, pha, tan pavali valyañjanma kita, sasarnya dadi ratu.

§III.335 nihan brata, amati agni, asisirih, 3, dina, tan pamaṅan sakalvirnya, tutug 3, dina, alabahan, tur tīrthanana, pha, hilaṅ pāpa kleṣaniṅ śarīra.

§III.336 hana brata, amaṅan sǝsǝdhǝp rumuhun, pituṅ tavun divasanya, bhaṭārī vastu hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, keḍәpiṅ rāt.

§III.337 hana brata, maṅan mevak uyah harәṅ, pha, keḍәp riṅ rāt, kineriṅan deniṅ bhuvana, kinajrihaniṅ śatru.

§III.338 Ana brata, mamaṅan catur varṇa, limaṅ vәṅi lavasanya, prajña śakti phalanika, tәhǝr kinasihaniṅ rāt, Apurvva kita, sakabdhu ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.

§III.339 hana brata maṅan riyana, 5, tәluṅ lek lavasnya, pha, halus jarijinta, niromanira.

§III.340 hana brata, ṅantara, ṅa, maṅan tṅaṅ ve , tәṅah vәṅi, tigaṅ lek lavasnya mabhyāsa, pha, śakti saturasta, suka magə̄ṅ.

§III.341 hana brata, maṅan pituṅ kәpǝl, sadina, pituṅ rahina samayanya, mabrata, catur ṅaraniṅ brata, [pha] riṅ dadi vvaṅ sarva vәsi tan tumamāhi śariranta, riṅ niṣkāla.

§III.342 hana brata, yan amaṅan tan paluṅguh, saṅ hyaṅ hayu maveh brata, saṅ hyaṅ laku laku haraniṅ brata, ya pinakarūpa hayu raspati, [pha] suka riṅ lakunta, lәbur tampakta aśri iṅiriṅan, deniṅ pavoṅan, siddhaniṅ vvaṅ suka sugih, amūkti sāriniṅ kaḍaton, kita riṅ dlāha.

§III.343 hana brata, amadhapa, ṅa, amaṅan riṅ paṅkon, malamak patra, saṅ hyaṅ sūkṣma maveh brata, phalanya sapolahta pantǝs, tan pәgat sihniṅ malakya rabi, salek samayanya, ma, Om̐ sūkṣmāya namah, pamit.

§III.344 hana brata, tan pamaṅan sarvāmbǝkan, naṅkǝn pon, mvaṅ kalivon, pha, keḍәpiṅ rāt.

§III.345 hana brata, yan amaṅan aṅilo riṅ pahesan, naṅkǝn pūrṇama, satavun divasanya, pha, mañjanma riṅ kabayan buyut sugih.

§III.346 nihan aji rambut, amaṅan sәga hirәṅ, naṅkǝn caturthi, śukla pakṣa, ma, hulun aṅaji rambut, tan abaṅ, tan ana raṅraṅ, tan ana putih, sәlǝm abuluniṅ gagak, adava, alambas, atәtәl, ṅkon rambutin hulun, katәmu maṅko, lәvih kaṅ tǝmbe hulun aṅaji rambut, vastu hulun aṅaji rambut, Om̐ sa ba ta A I namā śivāya.

§III.347 hana brata, mona mūjā, pha, deva masih iri kita.

§III.348 hana brata, mona, ṅa, yan aṅisiṅ, yan ahuyuh, yan adyus, yan alәlәṅa, yan abasahan, yan lumaku, pituṅ lek samayanya, bhaṭāra śiva maveh brata, sasarnya sugih duve, sugih vәka, tur keḍәp, mañjanma riṅ mantrī.

I śaka, 1722. Vai, ka, vrә, vara mrakih, praṭipadā riṅ śukla pakṣa, Asuji maśa, rah, 2, tǝṅgǝk, 2. I rika divasanya, pūrṇna linikhita.

^326. ] G M N P U • hana brata yan amaṅan anūtakǝn vulan ... śiṣya təka] In P the title of the brata, mantra, and result is same with other witnesses, but tend to different in the technique to perform the observance. This is the complete passage of the ms P. "hana bratā hañutakәn hulan·, yan hamaṅan taṅgal hapisan·, sakәpәl·, taṁ, 2, rvaṁ kәpәl·, muṅgah sakәpәl· sadinā, tәkāniṁ taṅgal·, piṁ, 14, pūṛnama hamr̥ti, yan paṅloṁ hapisan·, piṁ, 14, sinuddhana sakәpәl·, tәkaniṁ til̥m hamr̥ti, tigaṁ lek· ṣamayanya, bhaṭārendra hyaṁnya, ma, Ōm̐ surendra ya namaḥ, pamit·. phalanya mantukiṁ bhaṭāra śivā, sasaṛnya mañjanmā riṁ ratu, mvaṁ riṁ vikva bhavu siṣyā kitā." G U in III.26 M N P in III.29

^429. ] N • hana bratā, hamaṅan ... dr̥man halāki N in III.84
^430. ] G N • hana brata haṅǝṁbaṁ ... hyen āmaṅan G in III.94 N in III.85
^431. ] N • hana bratta hantara ... saṁ pāṇḍita N in III.86
^432. ] G N P • hana brata, hañjaya ... saṛvva galak G in III.78 N in III.87 P in III.94
^433. ] N P • hana bratā nrus ... samanta janmā N in III.88 P in III.127
^434. ] N • hana bratā hanrus ... sidḍi gave N in III.89 P in III.143 U in III,87, III.94

^436. ] N • hana bratta nrus ... huluniṁ sajagat N in III.91

260 <head type="editorial" xml:lang="eng">The Right Behavior in Performing Observances</head><p>
.nihan <app>
. <lem wit="#M #N">parikramaniṅ</lem>
. <rdg wit="#G #P" cause="lexical">panarima</rdg>
. <rdg wit="#U" cause="additive">tiṅkahiṅ panarima</rdg>

.brata, yan kita <app>

. </app>

.<div n="II" type="chapter">
. <head type="editorial" xml:lang="eng">The Philosophy of Observances</head><p>
350nihan saṅ hyaṅ tattva brata, kayatnākәna de saṅ amet kasiddhan, kasiddhaniṅ brata, tan pāvak tattvannira saṅ hyaṅ dharma,
.<app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">rajəg</lem>
. <rdg wit="P"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>
.turus, <app>
. <lem wit="#G #M #N #P">tattvanika</lem>

.apan pinakāvak balәbəd,

.<div n="III" type="chapter">

. <p n="III.1">
465hana brata mәgat rasa, ṅa, <app>

.hana brata

595 <p n="III.5">
.hana brata amaṅan tan kasurupan saṅ hyaṅ śiva raditya, tigaṅ tahun samayanya, bhaṭāra śiva <app><lem wit="#M">hyaṅniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#N">hyaṅiṅ</rdg></app> brata, pha, apaḍaṅ kaṅ ati, praṇa aṅən aṅənta, ekasadya, ma, om̐ mam̐ śivāya namah, yan ahyas.

. </app>
. </p>
600
. <p n="III.6">

. <app><lem wit="#G #U">śivāya</lem><rdg wit="#M #N #P">ya namah</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P">pamit</lem><rdg wit="#U"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>,
. pha, prajñan riṅ sarva kārya, makādi vidya,

. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">yan</lem><rdg wit="P"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>

.<p n="III.7">
. hana brata

630 ṅa,

650
.<p n="III.8">
. hana brata nilәm, ṅa, <app><lem wit="#G">aṅkən</lem><rdg wit="#M #N #U">naṅkәn</rdg><rdg wit="#P" cause="transposition">manaṅkәn</rdg></app>
. tilәm
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">kita</lem><rdg wit="#G #P"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>
655 <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">aṅupavāsa</lem><rdg wit="#G">ṅupavāśa</rdg><rdg wit="#P" cause="transposition">maṅupavaṣā</rdg></app>,
. pituṅ lek samayanya, bhaṭārī
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #P">rātri devī</lem><rdg wit="#G">vastri</rdg><rdg wit="#U">ratrī devam</rdg></app>
. hyaṅnya, ma, Om̐
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #P #U">rātri</lem><rdg wit="#G">vastri</rdg></app>
660 <app><lem type="emn">devyai</lem><rdg wit="#G">daivye</rdg><rdg wit="#M #N">devye</rdg><rdg wit="#P">devya</rdg><rdg wit="#U">deivya</rdg></app> namah,
. pamit, pha,
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">kinasihaniṅ rāt kita</lem><rdg wit="#G">kinasihaniṅ rāt</rdg><rdg wit="#P">siddha saprayojñananta sama lavan pūṛṇna</rdg></app>,
. deva <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">bhūṭāsih</lem><rdg wit="#P">bhūṭa maśih</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #P #U">iri</lem><rdg wit="#G">ri</rdg></app>
665 kita.
.
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>
. <note>hana brata nilәm...ri kita] <note> </note> <ptr target="#G"/> <ptr target="#U"/> in III.7 <ptr target="#M"/> <ptr target="#N"/> in III.8 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.22 </note>
. </app>
670 </p>
.
. <p n="III.9">
. hana brata narasvatī, ṅa, tan pamaṅan sәkul iṅiliran kevala tumpəṅ juga, tan paivak, kevala uyah, satahun
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">pituṅ</lem><rdg wit="#G">tigaṅ</rdg></app>
675 lek samayanya, <app><lem wit="#G #M #N">bhaṭārī rāja lakṣmī hyaṅnya</lem><rdg wit="#U" cause="line_omission"></rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N">ma</lem><rdg wit="#U"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N">Om̐</lem><rdg wit="#U"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app> śri rāja
. <app><lem type="emn">lakṣmyai</lem><rdg wit="#G #M #N">lakṣmya</rdg><rdg wit="#U">lakṣmeyā</rdg></app>
. namah, pamit, pha, təka
680 <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">guṇanta</lem><rdg wit="#G">guṇa</rdg></app>,
. mvaṅ siddha
. <app><lem wit="#G #U">saprayojananta</lem><rdg wit="#M #N">saprayojñananta</rdg></app>,tәhәr subhaga kita, <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">lavan</lem><rdg wit="#G">mvaṅ</rdg></app> <app><lem wit="#G #M #N">sihniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#U">sih</rdg></app> malaky arabi.
.
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U"></lem>
685 <note>hana narasvatī...malaky arabi] <note> </note> <ptr target="#G"/> <ptr target="#U"/> in III.8 <ptr target="#M"/> <ptr target="#N"/> in III.9 </note>
. </app>
. </p>
.
. <p n="III.10">
690 hana brata muṣpasadā, ṅa, yan amaṅan
. <app><lem wit="#P #U">mevak</lem><rdg wit="#G #M #N">mevaka</rdg></app>
. kəmbaṅ rumuhun, satahun lavasnya, saṅ hyaṅ smara hyaṅnya, ma, Om̐ śri smarāya
. <app><lem wit="#M #N">namah</lem><rdg wit="#G">nama svaha</rdg><rdg wit="#P #U">nama</rdg></app>,
. pamit, pha,
695 <app><lem wit="#M #N #P #U">riṅ rūpa</lem><rdg wit="#G">surupa</rdg></app>
. tan pasiriṅ,
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #P #U">akveh</lem><rdg wit="#G">Akveh mahyun iri kita, mvaṅ</rdg></app> rәsəp asih iri kita.
.
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U"></lem>
700 <note>hana brata muṣpasadā...iri kita] <note>
. </note> <ptr target="#G"/> <ptr target="#U"/> in III.9 <ptr target="#M"/> <ptr target="#N"/> in III.10 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.5 </note>
. </app>
. </p>
.
705<p n="III.11">
.hana brata ṅlepana, ṅa, yan amaṅan mevak alalab rumuhun tigaṅ tahun
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N">samayanya</lem><rdg wit="#U">slamanya</rdg></app>, bhaṭārī śrī hyaṅnya, ma, Om̐
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #P #U">śrī</lem><rdg wit="#G">srīh</rdg></app>
. śrī
710 <app><lem type="emn">devyai</lem><rdg wit="#G">ye</rdg><rdg wit="#M #N #U">devya</rdg></app> namah,
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">pamit</lem><rdg wit="#G">mapamit</rdg></app>,
. pha, rūpanta śrī
. <app><lem wit="#G #N #U">amenak</lem><rdg wit="#M">menak</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #N">sugih</lem><rdg wit="#G">mvaṅ sugih</rdg></app>
715 pari,
. <app><lem wit="#N #U">akveh</lem><rdg wit="#G" cause="additive"> mvaṅ akeh</rdg></app> asih avlas iri kita.
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U"></lem>
. <note>hana brata ṅlepana...iri kita] <note>
. </note> <ptr target="#G"/> <ptr target="#U"/> in III.10 <ptr target="#M"/> <ptr target="#N"/> in III.11 </note>
720 </app>
. </p>
.
.
. <!-- G hana brāta [4v] tan paṅinaṁ, satahun samalek samayanya, saṁ hyaṁ Aśvino deva hyaṁniṁ brata, ma, Om̐ Asvino deva ya namaḥ, pamit·, phalanya, meṅәt· rūpanta manis·, Akveḥ bhranta hyun iri kita-->
725
. <!-- M hanā bratā tan paṅinaṁ, satavun salek samayanya, saṁ hyaṁ ma$no deva hyaṁ niṁ bratā, ma, Om̐ Asvino deva ya namaḥ, pamit·, pha, meṅәt· rūpanta manis·, mvaṁ ha$- -kveḥ bhranta hyun hiri kitā-->
.
. <!-- N hana brata: tan paṅinaṁ, satahun salek ṣamayanya:, saṁ hyaṁ manodeva: hyaṁniṁ brata:, [SH] ma, Om̐ Asvino deva: ya namaḥ, pamit·, pha, meṅət· tur rupa:nta manis·, mvaṅ a:kveḥ bhranta hyun iri kita-->
.
730 <!-- P hana brata tan paṅinaṁ- -sәdaḥ, ṅa, satahun· salek ṣamayanya, hyaṁ haśvido devatanya, ma, Om̐ hasvino deva ya namaḥ, pamit·. phalanya, meṅә- -ttu rupānta manis·, hakveḥ branta mahyun i sirā-->
.
. <!-- U hana bratā l̥ga tan paṅinaṁ, satahun salek samayanya, sāṁ hyāṁ maṣno deva hyaṁ niṁ brata, ma, Om̐ Asvino deva ya namaḥ, pamit·, pha, meṅәt· mvaṁ rūpāntā manis·, Akveḥ brantā hyun iri kita

.

. hana

780 <!-- G hana brāta abhira, ṅa, yan amaṅan mevaka vuyaḥ, satahun tigāṅ lek· samaya nikaṁ brāta, bhaṭāreśvara hyaṁ[5r]nya, ma, Om̐ mam̐ Iśvarā ya namaḥ, pamit·, phalanya, priḥ meṅgal katmu, kinasihaniṁ rat kita, mvaṁ deva bhūta siḥ ri kita-->
.
. <!-- M hana bratāmbirā, ṅa, yan amaṅan mevaka huyaḥ, satavun tigāṁ lek ṣamayanya, bhaṭāra Iśvara hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ mam̐ Iśvara ya namaḥ, pamit·, pha, priḥ meṅgal katmu, kinasihaniṁ rāt kittha, mvaṁ de$- -va bhūṭā siḥ ri kittha-->
.
. <!-- N hana brata:mbira, ṅa, yan amaṅan mevaka huyaḥ, satahun tigaṅ lek ṣamayanya, bhaṭa:ra Iśvara: hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ mam̐ Iśvara: ya namaḥ, pamit, pha:, [SH] priḥ meṅgal katmu, kinasihaniṁ ra:t kittha, mvaṁ deva bhūṭa: siḥ ri kittha-->

. <!-- P hana brata mbira, ṅa, yan hamaṅan· mevak huyaḥ kevala, satavun lavasnyā mvaṁ tigaṁ lek ṣamayanya, bhaṭāra Iśvara hyaṁnya. ma, Ōm̐ mam̐ Iśvara ya namaḥ. phalanya siṁ priḥ Eṅgāl katәmu tuṛ kinasihan deniṁ deva- -bhuṭa, kinasihan deniṁ rāt·-->
.
. <!-- U hana bratāmbira, ṅa, yan amaṅan mevaka huyaḥ, satahun tigaṁṅ lek samayanya, bhaṭāreśvara hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ mam̐ Iśvara ya namaḥ, pamit·, pha, siṁ pinriḥ heṅgal katmu, kinasihiṁ rāt kita, mvaṁ deva bhutāsih iri kita-->

790<p n="III.14">hana brata
. <app><lem type="emn">birā</lem><rdg wit="#G">abhira</rdg><rdg wit="#M #N #P #U">mbira</rdg></app>,
. ṅa, yan amaṅan
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">mevaka</lem><rdg wit="#P">mevak</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">uyah</lem><rdg wit="#P" cause="additive">uyah kevala</rdg></app>,

. bhaṭāra Iśvara hyaṅnya, ma, Om̐ mam̐ īśvarāya namah,
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">pamit</lem><rdg wit="#P"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>, pha,
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N">prih</lem><rdg wit="#P #U">siṅ pinrih</rdg></app>
800 <app><lem wit="#G #M #N">meṅgal</lem><rdg wit="#P #U">eṅgal</rdg></app> katәmu, <app><lem wit="#G #M #N">kinasihaniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#P" cause="additive">tur kinasihan</rdg><rdg wit="#U">kinashiṅ</rdg></app>

.<!-- G hana brāta tan paṅinaṁ sәr̥h iṅapvan·, satahun divasanya, bhaṭāri bhagavati hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ namo bhagāvatye namaḥ, pamit·, phalanya, lupu$tiṁ sarvva viṣā , nirvighna kita-->
.

.<p n="III.15">
. hana brata <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">tan pamaṅan</lem><rdg wit="#P" cause="eye-skip">maṅan</rdg></app>
825 <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">sərәh</lem><rdg wit="#P" cause="lexical">sәḍah</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="G #M #N #U">iṅapvan</lem><rdg wit="#P">iṅapuhan</rdg></app>,
. satahun
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #P #U">samayanya</lem><rdg wit="#G" cause="lexical">divasanya</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U"> bhaṭārī </lem><rdg wit="#P">bhaṭāra</rdg></app> bhagāvati
830 hyaṅnya, ma, Om̐ namo
. <app><lem wit="#N">bhagavatyai</lem><rdg wit="#G #M #U">bhagāvatye</rdg><rdg wit="#P"> bhagavati</rdg></app> namah, pamit, pha, luputiṅ
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">sarvaviṣa</lem><rdg wit="#P">viṣaya kitā</rdg></app>, nirvighna kita.
.<app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U"></lem>
. <note>hana brata tan pamaṅan ... nirvighna kita] <note>
835 </note> <ptr target="#G"/> <ptr target="#U"/> in III.14
. <ptr target="#M"/> <ptr target="#N"/> in III.15 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.9</note>
.</app>
.</p>
.
840<!-- G hana brāta hamaṅan naryyan roṇḍon· pituṁ tahun samayanya, bhaṭāreśvara hyaṁnya, mantra kadi ṅuni, pamit, phalanya, mantukiṁ padhuka bhaṭāreśvara, sasvaṛggā kita lavan sira, maṁjanma riṁ juru bhāṣaṇa, sugih hulun·, lābdha riṁ prabhū$ [5v], mvaṁ mantri, tan padha lāvan rovaṁta-->
.
.<!-- M hana bratāhāmaṅan āṅaryya rondon· pituṁ tavun samayanya, ma, Om̐ mam̐ Iśvara ya namaḥ, pamit·, pha, mantukiṁ padā bhaṭāra Iśvarā, sasāṛnya maṁjanmā riṁ juru baṣā, sugiḥ hulun·, lābda ri saṁ prabhū, mvaṁ mantri, tan padha lavan rovaṁta kabeḥ-->
.
.<!-- N hana brata amaṅan aṅarya roṇḍon, pituṅ tahun samayanya, ma, Om̐ mam̐ Īśvara ya namah, pamit, pha, mantuk iṅ pada bhaṭāra Īśvara, sasarnya maṅjanma ri juru bhāṣa, sugih hulun, labdha riṅ saṅ prabhu mvaṅ mantrī, tan pada lavan rovaṅta kabeh.-->
845
.<!-- P -->
.
.<!-- U hana brata hamaṅanāṅāṛyya rondon·, pituṁ tahun samayanya, ma, Om̐ mam̐ Iśvara ya namaḥ, pamit·, pha, mantuk iṁ pāda bhāṭāra Iśvara, sasaṛnya maṁjanma riṁ juru bhāṣa, sugiḥ hulun·, labda riṁ saṁ prabhu, mvaṁ mantri, tan padha lāvan rovangta kabeh-->
.
850<p n="III.16">hana brata amaṅan
. <app><lem wit="#G">ṅaryan</lem><rdg wit="#M #N #U"></rdg></app>
. roṇḍon, pituṅ tahun samayanya,
. <app><lem wit="#G">bhaṭāreśvara hyaṅnya</lem><rdg wit="#M #N #U" cause="eye-skip"></rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">ma</lem><rdg wit="#G">mantra kadi ṅuni</rdg></app>,
855 <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">Om̐ mam̐ Īśvarāya namah</lem><rdg wit="#G" cause="syntactic"></rdg></app>, pamit, pha, mantuk iṅ <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">pada</lem><rdg wit="#G">paduka</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">bhaṭāra Īśvara</lem><rdg wit="#P" cause="orthographical">bhaṭāreśvara</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">sasarnya</lem><rdg wit="#G">sasvarggā kita lavan sira,</rdg></app> maṅjanma ri juru
. <app><lem wit="#G">bhāṣaṇa</lem><rdg wit="#M #N #U"></rdg></app>,
. sugih hulun, labdha <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">riṅ saṅ</lem><rdg wit="#P">ri</rdg></app> prabhu mvaṅ mantrī, tan pada lavan rovaṅta <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">kabeh</lem><rdg wit="#P"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>.
860<app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U"></lem>
.
. <note>hana ṅaryan roṇḍon ... roṇḍon kabeh] <note>
. </note> <ptr target="#G"/> <ptr target="#U"/> in III.15
. <ptr target="#M"/> <ptr target="#N"/> in III.16 </note>
865</app>
.</p>
.
.<!-- G hana brāta haraka, ṅa, hamaṅan saṛvva buṅkaḥ, tigaṁ tavun samayanya, hyaṅ iśvāra hyaṅiṁ brāta, ma, pitibrāta, kaddhi ṅūni, phalanya , mantukiṁ śvaṛggā bhaṭāra śiva, sasaṛnya maṁjanma riṁ viku guṇavan·, sugiḥ pirak· labdha riṁ saṁ prabhū, mvaṁ mantri-->
.
870
.<!-- M hana bratā ṅrakā, ṅa, hamaṅan sarvva buṅkaḥ, tigāṁ tavun samayanyā, hyaṁ Iśvara hyaṅnya, ma, Om̐ mam̐ ya namaḥ svāhā, pamit·, pha, mantukiṁ pada bhaṭāra śivā, sasārnya maṁjanma riṁ viku guṇavan·, sugiḥ pirak·, lābda riṁ saṁ prabhū mvaṁ - -mantri-->
.
.
.<!-- N hana brata ṅraka, ṅa, hamaṅan saṛvva buṅkaḥ, tigaṁ tahun samayanya:, hyaṁ Iśva
875ra hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ mam̐ ya namaḥ sva:ha, pamit·, pha, mantukiṁ padḍa bhaṭara śiva, sasa:ṛnya maṁjanma: riṁ viku gu$ [SH] ṇava:n·, sugiḥ pirak·, labda riṁ saṁ prabhu mvaṁ mantrī-->
.
.
.<!-- P -->
.
880
.<!-- U hana bratā ṅraka, ṅa, hamaṅan saṛvva buṅkaḥ, tigaṁ tahun samayanya, hyaṁ Iśvara hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ mam̐ ya namaḥ svāhā, pamit·, pha, mantuk iṁ bhaṭāra śiva, sasaṛnya maṁjanma riṁ viku guṇavān·, sugiḥ pirak·, labda ri saṁ prabhu mvaṁ mantri.
.-->
.
.<p n="III.17">hana brata <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">ṅraka</lem><rdg wit="#G">araka</rdg></app>,
885 ṅa, amaṅan sarva buṅkah, tigaṅ tahun samayanya, hyaṅ īśvara
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">hyaṅnya</lem><rdg wit="#G"><gap reason="omitted"></gap>hyaṅniṅ brata</rdg></app>,
. ma, <app><lem wit="#M #N #u">Om̐ mam̐ <supplied reason="omitted">śivā</supplied>ya namah svāhā, pamit</lem><rdg wit="#G">pitibrāta, kaddhi ṅūni,</rdg></app>, pha, mantuk iṅ
. <app><lem wit="#M #N">pada</lem><rdg wit="#G" cause="lexical">śvarggā</rdg><rdg wit="#U"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app> bhaṭāra śiva, sasarnya maṅjanma riṅ viku guṇavān, sugih pirak, labdha riṅ saṅ prabhu mvaṅ mantrī.
.<app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U"></lem>
890 <note>hana brata ṅraka...mvaṅ mantrī] <note>
. </note> <ptr target="#G"/> <ptr target="#U"/> in III.16
. <ptr target="#M"/> <ptr target="#N"/> in III.17 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
895
.<!-- G hana brata haṅumbakaṛṇnā, ṅa, yan aturu miriṁ satahun·, lumaḥ satahun·, tigaṁ tahun samayanya, bhaṭāra rudrā hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ namo rudrā ya svaha, phalanya, kinasihaniṁ paṇḍita, kinatvaṅan deniṁ padhanta janma, siddha sapra[6r]yanta-->
.
.<!-- M hana bratā ṅumbhakarṇna, ṅa, yan aturu miriṁ satahun· lumaḥ satavun· kumur̥b satavun·, tigaṁ tavun samayanya, bhaṭāra rudrā hyaṁ niṁ bratā, ma, Om̐ namo rūdrā ya namaḥ, pamit·, pha, kinasiha niṁ pāṇdhita kittha, samānta janma ṣamātvaṁ, siddha saprayojñananta||0||
.-->
900
.<!-- N hana brata:ṅumbhakarṇna, ṅa, yan a:turu miriṁ satahun·, lumaḥ satahu$
.n·, kumur̥b satahun·, tigaṁ tahun samayanya, bhaṭara rudra: hyaṁniṁ brata:, ma, Om̐ namo rudra: ya na [SH] maḥ, pamit·, pha, kinasihaniṁ paṇḍita kittha. samanta janma samatvaṁ, sidḍa saprayojñananta
.-->
.
905<!-- P hana bratā ṅumbhākāṛṇnā, ṅa, miriṁ satahun haturu, ṅlumaḥ satavun·, roṁ tavun· samayanya, phalanya muliḥ riṁ śvaṛgga bhaṭāra rudrā, - -sasaṛnya mañjanmā riṁ hadimantri, labda riṁ saṁ prabhu
.-->
.<!-- U hana brata mbhaṅumbakārṇna, ṅa, yan aturu miriṁ satahun·, ṅlumah satahun·, tigaṁ tahun ṣamayanya, bhaṭāra rudra hyaṁ niṁ brata, ma, Om̐ namo rudra ya namaḥ pamit·, pha, kinasiha niṁ pāṇdhita, samanta janma samātvaṁ, siddha saprayojananta.
.-->
.
910<p n="III.18">hana brata <app><lem wit="#M #N #P">ṅumbhakarṇa</lem><rdg wit="#G">aṅumbakarṇnā</rdg><rdg wit="#U">mbhaṅumbakārṇna</rdg></app>,
. ṅa,
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">yan aturu miriṅ satahun</lem><rdg wit="#P" cause="transposition">miriṅ satahun aturu</rdg></app>,
. lumah satahun,
. <app><lem wit="#M #N">kumurәb satahun</lem><rdg wit="#G #P #U"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>,
915 <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">tigaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#P">roṅ</rdg></app>
. tahun samayanya,
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">bhaṭāra rudra hyaṅniṅ brata</lem><rdg wit="#G">bhaṭāra rudrā hyaṅnya</rdg><rdg wit="#P" cause="line_omission"></rdg></app>,
. ma, <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">Om̐ namo rudrāya namah, pamit</lem><rdg wit="#G">Om̐ namo rudrā ya svaha</rdg><rdg wit="#U" cause="line_omission"></rdg></app>,
. pha, kinasihaniṅ
920 <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">paṇḍita kita</lem><rdg wit="#G">paṇḍita</rdg><rdg wit="#P"><witDetail wit="#P">mulih...ri saṅ prabhu</witDetail></rdg></app>.
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">samanta janma samatvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#G">samānta janma ṣamātvaṅ</rdg><rdg wit="#P"><witDetail wit="#P">mulih...ri saṅ prabhu</witDetail></rdg></app>, siddha <app><lem wit="#U">saprayojananta</lem><rdg wit="#G #M #N">saprayojñananta</rdg><rdg wit="#P"><witDetail wit="#P">mulih...ri saṅ prabhu</witDetail></rdg></app>.
.<app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U"></lem>
. <note>hana brata ṅumbhakarṇa...siddha saprayojananta] <note>
. </note> <ptr target="#G"/> <ptr target="#U"/> in III.17
925 <ptr target="#M"/> <ptr target="#N"/> in III.18 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.61</note>
.</app>
.</p>
.
.<!-- G kunaṅ ikaṅ amuna ṅisiṁ, priḥ meṅṅal kātmū, bahu sisya kita. -->

.

.<p n="III.24">hana brata
1050 <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">turu</lem><rdg wit="#P">aturu</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">sumaṇḍah</lem><rdg wit="#P">sugәda</rdg></app>,

. <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">samajanma</lem><rdg wit="#G">sarvvajanma</rdg><rdg wit="#P">kedhәp</rdg></app>,

1070<!-- G hana brata praṇa, ṅa, tan pamaṅan saṛvvambәkan·, tan pamaṅan asiṁ praṇi, pituṁ tahun samayanya, hyaṁ devatara hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ devatara ya namaḥ svaha, pamit·, phalanya, putra vr̥ddhi, mvaṁ vnaṁ vnaṁ kbo sapi, saṛvva tinanәmta vr̥ddhi, ya kabeḥ -->
.
.<!-- M hana bratā praṇā, ṅa, tan pamaṅan sarvvambәkan·, tan pamaṅana praṇi, pituṁ tavun samayanya, hyaṁ devā hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ devatāra ya namaḥ, pamit·, pha, putra vr̥ddhi, mvaṁ vnaṁ vnaṁ, kbo sapi, sarvva tinanәmta vr̥ddhi kabe- -ḥ -->
.
.<!-- N hana brata: praṇa:, ṅa, tan pamaṅa:n saṛvva:mbǝkan·, tan pamaṅana praṇi, pituṁ tahun samaya$nya, hyaṁ deva hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ deva:tara ya namaḥ, pamit·, pha, putra vr̥dḍi, mvaṁ vnaṁ vnaṁ, kbo sapi, sa:ṛ [SH] vva tinanǝmta vr̥dḍi kabeḥ-->

.<!-- P hana bratā praṇā, ṅa, tan pamaṅa- -:n saṛvva prani, pituṁ tavun ṣamayanya, deva ratu hyaṁnya, phalanya putra vr̥ddhi, mvaṁ vәnaṁ vәnaṁ kәbo sapi celeṁ, kuda, bebek·, - -hayam·, dara kitiran· satavana, bañak·, salviriṁ hiṅon i ṅon· mvaṁ miṇā bhavu-->
.
.<!-- U hana bratā praṇa, ṅa, tan pamaṅan· sarvvāmbәkan·, tan pamaṅan· praṇi, pituṁ tahun samayanya, hyaṁ deva hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ devatāra ya namaḥ, pamit·, pha, putra vr̥ddhi, mvaṁ vәnaṁ vәnaṁ, kbo sapi, saṛvva tinanәmta vr̥ddhi kabeh.-->

1080 <p n="III.25">hana brata prāṇa, ṅa,
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">tan pamaṅan</lem><rdg wit="#P"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">sarvāmbǝkan</lem><rdg wit="#P"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>,
.tan <app><lem wit="#G">pamaṅan asiṅ prāṇi</lem><rdg wit="#M #N #U">tan pamaṅana praṇi</rdg><rdg wit="#P">tan pamaṅān sarvva prani</rdg></app>,
.pituṅ tahun samayanya, hyaṅ
1085 <app><lem wit="#G">devātara</lem><rdg wit="#M #N #U">devā</rdg><rdg wit="#P">deva ratu</rdg></app>
. hyaṅnya,
. <app><lem wit="#G">ma, Om̐ devātarāya namah svaha, pamit,</lem><rdg wit="#M #N #U">ma, Om̐ devātara ya namah, pamit</rdg><rdg wit="#P"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app> pha, putra vrәddhi, mvaṅ vәnaṅ vәnaṅ, kәbo sapi,
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">sarva</lem><rdg wit="#P">salviriṅ</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">tinanǝmta</lem><rdg wit="#P">iṅon-iṅon</rdg></app> <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">vrәddhi kabeh</lem><rdg wit="#P">vrәddhi ya kabeh</rdg><rdg wit="#P">mvaṅ miṇā bhavu</rdg></app>.

. <note>hana brata prāṇa ... vrәddhi kabeh] <note>
. </note> <ptr target="#G"/> <ptr target="#U"/> in III.24

.</app>
1095</p>
.
.<!-- G hana brāta hamaṅan pisan savguṁ, saṁ hyaṁ sambu devatanya, ma, Om̐ śam̐ sāmbhu ve namaḥ, pamit·, phalanya, maṁ[7r]janma riṁ kula putra, subhāga siddha siṁ saprayojanantā, priḥ meṅgal· tka-->
.
.<!-- M hana bratā maṅan pisan savguṁ, saṁ hyaṁ sambhu devatanyā, satahun divaśanya, ma, Om̐ sāmbhu ve namaḥ, pamit·, pha, mañjanma riṁ kula putra, subhagā siddhi siṁ saprayojñananta, priḥ meṅgal katmu-->
1100
.<!-- N hana brata maṅan pisan savguṁ, saṁ hyaṁ sambhu devatanya:, satahun divaśanya, ma, Om̐ sambhu ve namaḥ, pamit·, pha, mañjanma: riṁ kula putra, subha:ga sidḍi siṁ saprayojñananta, priḥ meṅgal katmu-->
.
.<!-- P hana bratā maṅan· sadinā sapisan·, saṁ hyaṁ śambu devatanya, ma, Ōm̐ saṁ hyaṁ śambu- -ve namaḥ, pamit·. phalanya, mañjanma rim kula putra subhaga siddha saprayojñānanta, siṁ kapriḥ Eṅgal katәmu-->
.
1105<!-- U hana brata hamaṅan· sapisan savguṁ, saṁ hyaṁ sambhu devatanya, ma, Om̐ śambhu deva namaḥ, pamit·, pha, maṁjanma riṁ kula putra, subhāga siddhi asiṁ prayojananta, priḥ meṅgal katmu. -->
.
.<p n="III.26">hana brata amaṅan
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">pisan</lem><rdg wit="#P" cause="transposition">sadinā</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">savәguṅ</lem><rdg wit="#P" cause="transposition">sapisan</rdg></app>,
1110 saṅ hyaṅ sambhu devatanya,
. <app><lem wit="#M #N">satahun divasanya</lem><rdg wit="#G #P #U" cause="line_omission"></rdg></app>,
. ma,
. Om̐ <app><lem type="emn">śambhave</lem><rdg wit="#M #N">sambhuve</rdg><rdg wit="#G">śam̐ sāmbhuve</rdg><rdg wit="#P" cause="additive">saṅ hyaṅ śambuve</rdg><rdg wit="#U" cause="additive">śambhu deva</rdg></app>
. namah, pamit, pha,
1115 <app><lem wit="#M #N #P">mañjanma</lem><rdg wit="#G #U">maṅjanma</rdg></app>
. riṅ kula putra, subhaga
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">siddhi</lem><rdg wit="#G #P">siddha</rdg></app>
. siṅ
. <app><lem wit="#G">saprayojananta</lem><rdg wit="#M #N #P">saprayojñananta</rdg><rdg wit="#U">prayojananta</rdg></app>,
1120 <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">prih</lem><rdg wit="#P">siṅ kaprih</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">meṅgal</lem><rdg wit="#P">eṅgal</rdg></app> katәmu.
.<app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>
. <note>hana brata amaṅan pisan savәguṅ ... meṅgal katәmu] <note>
. </note> <ptr target="#G"/> <ptr target="#U"/> in III.25
1125 <ptr target="#M"/> <ptr target="#N"/> in III.26 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.10 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
.
.<!-- M hana bratā hamaṅan pisan sa- -vguṁ, saṁ hyaṁ sāmbhu hyaṅ iṁ bratā, tigāṁ tahun samayanya, pha, dr̥mman haputra, siṁ priḥ meṅgal katkan-->
1130
.<!-- N hana [SH] brata:, hamaṅan sapisan savguṁ, saṁ hyaṁ sambhu hyaṅiṁ brata:, tigaṁ tavun lavasnya:, pha, dr̥mana:putra, siṁ priḥ meṅgal katkan·-->
.
.
.<p n="III.27">hana brata, amaṅan
1135 <app><lem wit="#M">pisan</lem><rdg wit="#N">sapisan</rdg></app>
. savәguṅ, saṅ hyaṅ śambhu hyaṅiṅ brata, tigaṅ tahun lavasnya, pha, drәman aputra, siṅ prih meṅgal katəkan.
.<app><lem wit="#M #N"></lem>
. <note>hana brata amaṅan sapisan ... meṅgal katəkan] <note>
. </note>
1140 <ptr target="#M"/> <ptr target="#N"/> in III.27 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
.
.<!-- M hana bratā maṅan pisan sadinā, sakavaśa niṁ habratā, saṁ hyaṁ sambhu hyaṁnya, pha, mañjanma riṁ kula putra, siddha saprayojñananta-->
1145
.<!-- N hana brata:maṅan pisan sadina:, sakavaśaniṅ a:brata:, saṁ hyaṁ sa:ṁbhu hyaṁnya:, pha, mañjanma: riṁ kula pu$ [SH] tra, sidḍa saprayojñananta-->
.
.<p n="III.28">hana brata maṅan pisan sadina, sakavaśaniṅ abrata, saṅ hyaṅ śambhu hyaṅnya, pha, majanma riṅ kula putra, siddha <app><lem type="norm">saprayojananta</lem><rdg wit="#M #N">saprayojñananta</rdg></app>.
. <app><lem wit="#M #N"></lem>
1150 <note>hana brata maṅan pisan sadina ... siddha saprayojananta] <note>
. </note>
. <ptr target="#M"/> <ptr target="#N"/> in III.28 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
1155
.<!-- G hana brāta nutakәn vulan·, ṅa (KURANG), yan amaṅaniṁ taṅgal·, 1, sakpәl·(BEDA), yaniṁ taṅgal, 2, rva kpәl _ _ _ _
.
.makahiṅana lima vlās· kpәl·,
.yaniṁ pūṛṇnama,
1160Apan atambәḥ sakpәl
. _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _
. kunәṁ irikaṁ paṅlvaṁ,
. lvaṅāna ta ya sakpәl·,
. naṅkәn· rahina,
1165 havkāsan aṅupavāśā,
. yan tilәm·,
. tigaṁ hulan divāśanya,
. bhaṭārendra hyaṁnya,

. mvaṁ viku bahu sisya kita-->
.
.<!-- M hana bratā yan āmaṅan hanūtakәn vulan·, lviṛnya, taṅgal pisan·, sakpәl·, yan avuvuḥ taṅgal·, havuvuḥ sakpәl·,
1175
.makahiṅana lima vlas· kpәl·,

1205<!-- P hana bratā hañutakәn hulan·, yan hamaṅan taṅgal hapisan·, sakәpәl·, taṁ, 2, rvaṁ kәpәl·, muṅga- -ḥ sakәpәl· sadinā, tәkāniṁ taṅgal·, piṁ, 14,
.
.pūṛnama hamr̥ti, yan paṅloṁ hapisan·, piṁ, 14, sinuddhana sakәpәl·, tәkaniṁ til̥- -m hamr̥ti, tigaṁ lek· ṣamayanya, bhaṭārendra hyaṁnya, ma, Ōm̐ surendra ya namaḥ, pamit·. phalanya mantukiṁ bhaṭāra śivā, sasaṛnya mañjanmā riṁ ratu, mvaṁ riṁ vikva bhavu siṣyā kitā.
.-->
.
1210<!-- U hana brata yan hamaṅan hanūtakәn ulan·, ṅa, taṅgal pisan· sakpәl·, yan avuvuḥ taṅgalnya, avuvu sakәpə̄l,
.makahina lima vlas kpәl·,
.riṁ pūrṇnama,
.Apan atambәḥ sakpәl·,

1225
.<p n="III.29">hana brata
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">yan amaṅan</lem><rdg wit="#G"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">anūtakǝn</lem><rdg wit="#G">nutakәn</rdg></app>
. vulan,
1230 <app><lem wit="#M #N">lvirnya</lem><rdg wit="#G #U">ṅa</rdg><rdg wit="P"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>,
. taṅgal
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">pisan</lem><rdg wit="#G">1</rdg></app>,
. sakәpǝl,
. <app><lem wit="#M #N">yaniṅ avuvuh taṅgal, avuvuh sakәpǝl</lem><rdg wit="#G"> yan taṅgal, 2, rva kpәl _ _ _ _ </rdg><rdg wit="#U">yan avuvuh taṅgalnya, avuvu sakәpə̄l,</rdg></app>,
1235 <app><lem wit="#G #M #N">makahiṅan</lem><rdg wit="#U">makahina</rdg></app>
. lima vәlas kәpǝl,
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N">yaniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#U">riṅ</rdg></app>
. pūrṇama, apan atambǝh sakǝpǝl
. <app><lem wit="#M #N">irikaṅ sarahina</lem><rdg wit="#G"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg><rdg wit="#U">riṅ</rdg></app>,
1240 <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">kunaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#G">kunәṅ</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#M #U">ri</lem><rdg wit="#G">irikaṅ</rdg><rdg wit="#N">ri</rdg></app> <app><lem wit="#G #N #U">paṅlvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#M">paṅlvaṅā</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N">lvaṅana ta ya sakәpǝl</lem><rdg wit="#U">loṅana saka sakpәl</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N">naṅkǝn rahina</lem><rdg wit="#U"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>,
. avәkasan aṅupavaśa
1245 <app><lem wit="#M #N #N">yaniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#G">yan</rdg></app>
. tilǝm,
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">tәluṅ lek samayanya</lem><rdg wit="#U" cause="lexical">tigaṁ ulan divāśanya</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#M #N">bhaṭāra indra</lem><rdg wit="#G">bhaṭārendra</rdg><rdg wit="#U" cause="additive">ida bhaṭāra Indra</rdg></app>
. hyaṅnya,
1250 ma, Om̐ surendrāya namah, pamit, pha, mantuk iṅ
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N">pada</lem><rdg wit="#U"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app> bhaṭāra śiva,
. sasarnya majanma riṅ
. ratu <app><lem wit="#M #N">prajñan</lem><rdg wit="#G #U"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>,
. mvaṅ viku bahu śiṣya kita.
1255 <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>
. <note>hana brata yan amaṅan anūtakǝn vulan ... śiṣya təka] <note> In P the title of the brata, mantra, and result is same with other witnesses, but tend to different in the technique to perform the observance. This is the complete passage of the ms P.
. "hana bratā hañutakәn hulan·, yan hamaṅan taṅgal hapisan·, sakәpәl·, taṁ, 2, rvaṁ kәpәl·, muṅgah sakәpәl· sadinā, tәkāniṁ taṅgal·, piṁ, 14, pūṛnama hamr̥ti, yan paṅloṁ hapisan·, piṁ, 14, sinuddhana sakәpәl·, tәkaniṁ til̥m hamr̥ti, tigaṁ lek· ṣamayanya, bhaṭārendra hyaṁnya, ma, Ōm̐ surendra ya namaḥ, pamit·. phalanya mantukiṁ bhaṭāra śivā, sasaṛnya mañjanmā riṁ ratu, mvaṁ riṁ vikva bhavu siṣyā kitā."
. </note> <ptr target="#G"/> <ptr target="#U"/> in III.26
. <ptr target="#M"/> <ptr target="#N"/> <ptr target="#P"/> in III.29 </note>
1260</app>
.</p>
.
.<!-- G hana brāta patrahāra, ṅa, hamaṅan saṛvva roṇḍon·, sari sari, bhaṭāra mahesvara hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ Om̐ maheśvara ya namaḥ, pāmit·, phalanya, (ma)ntukiṁ svaṛggā bhaṭāra guru, sasāṛnya maṁjanma riṁ svaṛgā bhaṭāra brahmā, mva viṣṇu kiteṁ dlāhanya-->
.

.
.<!-- N hana brata patraha:ra, ṅa, hamaṅa:n saṛvva roṇḍon·, sari sari, bhaṭa:ra maheśvara: hyaṁnya:, ma, Om̐ Om̐ maheśvara: ya namaḥ, pamit·, pha, mantukiṁ svaṛ [SH] gga: bhaṭa:ra: guru, sasaṛnya: mañjanma: riṁ svaṛgga bhaṭa:ra brahma:, mvaṁ bhaṭa:ra viṣṇu, yaniṁ dla:ha

1270<p n="III.30">
. hana brata pattrāhāra, ṅa, amaṅan sarva roṇḍon, sari-sari, bhaṭāra maheśvara hyaṅnya, ma, Om̐ Om̐ maheśvarāya namah, pamit, pha, mantuk iṅ svarga bhaṭāra guru, sasarnya
. <app><lem wit="#M #N">mañjanma</lem><rdg wit="#G">maṅjanma</rdg></app>
. riṅ svarga bhaṭāra brahmā,

.<!-- G hana brāta, phalahara, ṅa, hamaṅān saṛvva phala, sāri sāri, bhaṭāra brahmā hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ Am̐ brahmāne namaḥ, pamit·, phalanya, muliḥ mareṅ svaṛggā bhaṭāra guru, mvaṁṅ amaṅguḥ śivāpādha, (kurang: sasarnya) maṁjanmeṅ kula putra kita dlāha-->

1300<p n="III.31">hana brata phalāhāra, ṅa,
. <app><lem wit="#M #N">maṅan</lem><rdg wit="#G #P #U">amaṅan</rdg></app>
. sarvaphala, sari-sari, bhaṭāra brahmā hyaṅnya, ma, Om̐
. <app><lem wit="#G #P">Am̐</lem><rdg wit="#M #N #U"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>
. brahmane namah,
1305 <app><lem wit="#G #P #U">pamit</lem><rdg wit="#M #N"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>
. pha, mulih mariṅ
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">svarga</lem><rdg wit="#P">svargan</rdg></app>
. bhaṭāra guru, mvaṅ
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">umaṅgguh</lem><rdg wit="#P">maṅguh</rdg><rdg wit="#P">umuṅguh</rdg></app>
1310 śiva pada,
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #P #U">sasarnya</lem><rdg wit="#G"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #P">mañjanma riṅ</lem><rdg wit="#G">maṅjanmeṅ</rdg><rdg wit="#U">mañjadma riṅ</rdg></app>
. kula
. <app><lem wit="#G #P">putra</lem><rdg wit="#M #N #U">gotra</rdg></app>
1315 <app><lem wit="#M #N #P #U">kiteṅ</lem><rdg wit="#G">kita</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P">dlāha</lem><rdg wit="#U">dlāhan</rdg></app>.
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>
. <note>hana brata phalāhāra ... kiteṅ dlāha] <note>
. </note> <ptr target="#G"/> in III.28
1320 <ptr target="#M"/> <ptr target="#N"/> in III.31 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.14 <ptr target="#U"/> in III.27 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
.
.<!-- G hana brāta nirambu, ṅa, tan pamaṅan saṛvva _ _ _ _ , baṭāra rudrā hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ kadi ṅūni, phalanya, mantukiṁ padha [8r] bhaṭāra rudrā, sasāṛnya Añjanma riṁ lituhayu, prājñā-->
1325
.<!-- M hana bratā hanirambhu, ṅa, tan pamaṅan sarvva hәmba hәmba, baṭāra rudrā hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ namo ru$drā ya namaḥ, pamit·, pha, mantukiṁ padā bhaṭāra rudrā, sasārnya mañjanmā ri listuhāyu paripūṛṇna, prajñān kittha- -->
.
.<!-- N hana brata hanirambu, ṅa, tan pamaṅan saṛvva hǝmba hǝmba, bhaṭa:ra rudra: hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ namo rudra ya namaḥ, pamit·, pha, mantukiṁ pada: [SH] bhaṭa:ra rudra, sasaṛnya mañjanma: riṁ listuhayu prajña: kittha-->
.
1330<!-- P hana brata nirambu, ṅa, kaṁ pinaṅan saṛvva hәmba- -bhaṭāra rudra hyaṁnya, ma, Ōm̐ rudra ya namaḥ. phalanya mantukiṁ svaṛgga bhaṭāra rudra, sasaṛnya mañjanma, listuhayu paripūṛṇna, prajñān·-->
.
.<!-- U hana brata hanirambu, ṅa, bhaṭāra rudra hyaṁnya, tan pamaṅan hәmba hәmba, ma, Om̐ nama rudra ya namaḥ, pamit· pha, mantuk iṁ pada bhaṭāra rudra, sasaṛnya maṁjanma riṁ listvāyu, mvaṁ prajñā kita.-->
.
.<p n="III.32">hana brata
1335 <app><lem wit="#G #P">nirambu</lem><rdg wit="#M #N #U">anirambu</rdg></app>,
. ṅa,
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N">tan</lem><rdg wit="#P">kaṅ</rdg><rdg wit="#U" cause="transposition">tan</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N">pamaṅan</lem><rdg wit="#U">pinaṅan</rdg><rdg wit="#P" cause="transposition">pamaṅan</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P">sarva</lem><rdg wit="#U"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>
1340 <app><lem wit="#M #N">ambә-ambә</lem><rdg wit="#G"><gap reason="illegible"></gap></rdg><rdg wit="#P">әmba</rdg><rdg wit="#U" cause="transposition">әmba-әmba</rdg></app>,
. bhaṭāra rudra hyaṅnya, ma, <app><lem wit="M #N #U">Om̐ namo rudrāya namah, pamit,</lem><rdg wit="#G">Om̐ kadi ṅūni</rdg><rdg wit="#P">Ōm̐ rudraya namah</rdg></app>
. pha, mantuk iṅ
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">pada</lem><rdg wit="#P">svarga</rdg></app>
. bhaṭāra rudra, sasarnya
1345 <app><lem wit="#G">añjanma</lem><rdg wit="#M #N P">mañjanma</rdg><rdg wit="#U">maṅjanma</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">riṅ</lem><rdg wit="#P"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#G">lituhayu</lem><rdg wit="#M #N">listuhāyu</rdg><rdg wit="#U">listvāyu</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#G #N #U">prajña</lem><rdg wit="#M #P">prajñān</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">kita</lem><rdg wit="#G #P"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>.
1350<app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>
. <note>hana...kita] <note>
. </note> <ptr target="#G"/> in III.29
. <ptr target="#M"/> <ptr target="#N"/> in III.32 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.35 <ptr target="#U"/> in III.28 </note>
.</app>
1355</p>
.
.<!-- G hana brāta ṅasaṅa, ṅa, mabrāta ṅkәn kasaṅa, saṁ hyaṁ bhayu devatanya, ma, Om̐ bam̐ tam̐ bāyu ve namaḥ, pamit, phalanya, mantukiṁ bhaṭāra prajapa(t)i, rare mukti tkeṅ atuha-->
.
.<!-- M hana bratā ṅasaṅā, ṅa, habratā yaṅkәn kasaṅha, saṁ hyaṁ bāyu hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ tam̐ bāyu ve namaḥ, pamit, pha, mantukiṁ svargga bhaṭāra prajāpati, rare mukti suka tkeṅ atuvvā-->
1360
.<!-- N hana bratā ṅasaṅha, ṅa, habrata yaṅkǝn kasaṅha, saṁ hyaṁ bayu hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ tām̐ bayu ve namaḥ, pamit, pha, mantukiṁ svaṛgga bhaṭāra prajapāti, rare mukti suka tkeṅ atuha-->
.
.<!-- P hana brata ṅasaṅa, ṅa, mabrata naṅkәn kasaṅā, saṁ hyaṁ basu devatanya, ma, Om̐ bham̐ bayu ve namaḥ, pamit. phalanya mantukiṁ svaṛggan bhaṭāraprajāpati, rare kitā mūkti sukka tәkeṁ hatuhā-->
.
1365<!-- P hana brata ṅasaṅā, ṅa, habratā naṅkәn kasaṅa hamr̥ti bhaṭārabhayu hyaṁnya, phalanya muliḥ riṁ svaṛgan bhaṭāra prajāpati, saṅka rare, bahu mitra, hamukti sukkā riṁ dlahā-->
.
.<!-- U hana brata ṅasaṅa, ṅa, Abrata yanangkәn kasaṅa, saṁ hyaṁ bayu devatanya, ma, Om̐ tam̐ bayu vai namaḥ, pamit, pha, mantuk iṁ svaṛggan bhaṭārā prajapati, rarenyāmukti suka tkeṅ atuha-->
.
.
1370<p n="III.33">hana brata ṅasaṅa, ṅa,
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #P #U">abrata</lem><rdg wit="#G">mabrata</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#U">yan aṅkǝn</lem><rdg wit="#G">ṅkәn</rdg><rdg wit="#M #N">yaṅkәn</rdg><rdg wit="#P">naṅkәn</rdg></app>
. kasaṅa, saṅ hyaṅ
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">bāyu</lem><rdg wit="#P">basu</rdg></app>
1375 hyaṅnya, ma, Om̐ tam̐
. <app><lem type="emn">bāyave</lem><rdg wit="#G #M #N #P #U">bayuve</rdg></app>
. namah, pamit, pha, mantuk iṅ
. <app><lem wit="#P #U">svargan</lem><rdg wit="#G"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg><rdg wit="#M #N">svargga</rdg></app>
. bhaṭāra prajāpati,
1380 <app><lem wit="#M #N">rare</lem><rdg wit="#G"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg><rdg wit="#P" cause="additive">rare kita</rdg><rdg wit="#U">rarenya</rdg></app>
. mukti sukha tәkeṅ atuha.
.<app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>
. <note> hana brata ṅasaṅa ... ṅatuha <note>
. </note>
1385 <ptr target="#G #U"/> in III.30 <ptr target="#M"/> in III.33 <ptr target="#N"/> in III.33 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.36, III.82 <ptr target="#U"/> in III.30 </note>
.</app>
.
.</p>
.
1390
.<!-- G hana brāta mopavaśa, ṅa, Aṅkәn dvadaśi śūklā pakṣa, kalaniṁ kapitu juga, brāta bhaṭāra bhima, ma, Om̐ bham̐ bima ya namaḥ, pamit, phalanya, viṛyyavan kapintuhu deniṁ rat, sugiḥ mās pirak, rare hulun, putra vr̥ddhi, siddha kaṛyya-->
.
.<!-- M hana bratā mopavaśa, naṅkәn dvadaśi sūkla pākṣa, kala niṁ kapitu jugā, bratā bhaṭāra bhīmā, ma, Om̐ bam̐ bhīmā ye namaḥ, pamit, pha, viryyavān kapintuhu deniṁ ratu, sugiḥ mas pirak, mvaṁ rare hulun, putra vr̥ddhi, siddha kaṛyyanta-->
.
1395<!-- N hana brata mopavaśā, naṅkǝn dvā daśi sukla pakṣa, kalaniṁ kapi jugā, bratta bhaṭāra bhīma, ma, Om̐ bām̐ bhīma ye namaḥ, pamit, pha, viṛyyavān kapintuhu deniṁ ratū, sugiḥ mās pirak, mvaṁ rare hulun, putra vr̥dḍi, sidḍa kaṛyyanta-->
.
.<!-- P hana brata-->
.
.<!-- U hana brata mopavaśa, nāngkәn dvadaśi suklā pakṣa, kala niṁ kapitu juga, brata bhaṭāra bhima, ma, Om̐ bhima ye namaḥ, pamit, pha, viṛyyavān kapituhu deniṁ ratu, sugiḥ mas pirak, mvaṁ rare hulun, putra vr̥ddhi, siddha kāṛyanta-->
1400
.
.<p n="III.34">hana brata mopavāsa,
. <app><lem wit="#G">aṅkǝn</lem><rdg wit="#M #N #U">naṅkәn</rdg></app>
. dvadaśi śukla pakṣa, kālaniṅ
1405 <app><lem wit="#G #M #U">kapitu</lem><rdg wit="#N">kapi</rdg></app>
. juga, brata bhaṭāra bhīma, [ṅa], ma, Om̐ bam̐
. <app><lem type="emn">bhīmāya</lem><rdg wit="#M #N">bhīmaye</rdg></app>
. namah, pamit, pha, vīryavan kapintuhu deniṅ
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">ratu</lem><rdg wit="#P">rat</rdg></app>,
1410 sugih mās pirak,
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">mvaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#P"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>
. rare hulun, putra vrәddhi, siddha
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">kāryanta</lem><rdg wit="#G">karyya</rdg></app>.
.<app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>
1415 <note> hana bratā mopavaśa ... siddha kaṛyyanta <note>
. </note>
. <ptr target="#G"/> in III.31 <ptr target="#M"/> in III.34 <ptr target="#N"/> in III.34 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.83 <ptr target="#U"/> in III.31 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
1420
.<!-- G hana brāta hasta, ṅa, hamaṅan haṛyyan, lpa lpaniṁ taṅan kivā, mevaka vuyaḥ, tumpaṅakniṁ taṅanta, sabagya yan tan pauyaḥ, phalanya, Agə̄ṁ kasiddhyanta, Apagәḥ kaprajñan kamedan -->
.
.<!--M hana bratā ṅaṣṭa, ṅa, hamaṅan i yyan, lpa lpaniṁ taṅan kivā, mevaka Uyaḥ, tumpaṅakniṁ taṅan, sabagyan tan paUyaḥ, pha, Agәṁ kasidyanta, hapagәḥ kaprajñanta tan medan -->
.
1425<!-- N hana bratāṅaṣṭā, ṅa, hamaṅan i yyan, lpa lpaniṁ taṅan kivā, mevaka Uyaḥ, tumpaṅakniṁ taṅan, sabagya yan tan paUyaḥ, pha, hagə̄ṁ kasidyanta, hapagǝḥ kaprajñanta tan medan-->
.
.<!-- P hana brata haṣṭa ṅa, yan amaṅan haṛyyaniṁ l̥pa l̥paniṁ taṅan kivā, mewaka huyaḥ, sabagyan tan pahuyaḥ, phalanya magәṁ kasiddhyantā, pagәḥ kaprajñanta -->
.
.<!-- U hana brata ṅasta, ṅa, hamaṅan i ṛyyan, ri lpa lpa niṁ taṅan kivā, mevak Uyaḥ, tumpәṅakniṁ taṅanya, sabhāgya yan tan pahuyaḥ, pha, agə̄ṁ kasiddyanta, apagə̄ḥ kaprajñan tiki denya kamedanya-->
1430
.
.<p n="III.35">hana brata
. <app><lem wit="#M #N">aṅasta</lem><rdg wit="#G #P">hasta</rdg><rdg wit="#U">ṅasta</rdg></app>,
. ṅa, amaṅan
1435 <app><lem wit="#M #N #U">i</lem><rdg wit="#G #P"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#G">haryan</lem><rdg wit="#M #N">yyan</rdg><rdg wit="#P">haryyaniṅ</rdg><rdg wit="#U">ryyan</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P">lәpa-lәpaniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#U" cause="additive">ri lәpa-lәpaniṅ</rdg></app>
. taṅan kiva,
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P">mevaka</lem><rdg wit="#U">mevaka</rdg></app> uyah,
1440 <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">tumpaṅakәn</lem><rdg wit="#P"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>
. iṅ
. <app><lem wit="#M #N">taṅan</lem><rdg wit="#G">taṅanta</rdg><rdg wit="#P"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg><rdg wit="#U">taṅanya</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#G #N #U">sabhāgya</lem><rdg wit="#N #P">sabagyan</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#G #N #U">yan</lem><rdg wit="#M #P"><gap reason="omitted"></gap></rdg></app>
1445 tan pauyah, pha,
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U">agə̄ṅ</lem><rdg wit="#P">magәṅ</rdg></app>
. kasiddhyanta, apagǝh
. <app><lem wit="#M #N #P">kaprajñanta</lem><rdg wit="#G">kaprajñan</rdg><rdg wit="#U">kaprajñan tiki</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#M #N">tan medan</lem><rdg wit="#G">kamedan</rdg><rdg wit="#U">denya kamedanya</rdg></app>.
1450 <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>
. <note> hana bratāṅaṣṭā... tan medan <note>
. </note>
. <ptr target="#G"/> in III.34 <ptr target="#M"/> in III.35 <ptr target="#N"/> in III.35 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.37 <ptr target="#U"/> in III.34 </note>
.</app>
1455</p>
.
.<!-- G hana brāta pratisuptā, ṅa, Aturu pisan tan paturu muvaḥ, phalanya, Ikaṁ abicāryya vdhi ri kita-->
.<!-- M hana bratā pratipāda suptā, ṅa, yan aturū sapisan tan patūru muvaḥ, pha, Ikaṁ habicāryyā vdhi hiri kittha-->
.<!-- N hana bratta prati padā supta, ṅā, yan āturu sapisan, tan paturu muvah, pha, Ikaṅ ābicāryya vdi hiri kittha -->
1460<!-- P hana brata pratipadha suptā, ṅa, haturu sapisan, yan hataṅi tan paturu maliḥ, phalanya hikaṁ habhicari havәdi hiri kitā-->
.<!-- U hana brata pratipaddhā supta, ṅa, yan aturū sapisan tan paturū muvaḥ, pha, Ikaṁṅ abhicāṛyya vdi hiri kita -->
.
.
.<p n="III.36">hana brata pratipāda supta, ṅā, yan aturu pisan, tan paturu muvah, pha, ikaṅ abhicāra vәdi iri kita.
1465 <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>
. <note> hana bratā pratipādasuptā,... vdi hiri kittha <note>
. </note>
. <ptr target="#G"/> in III.35 <ptr target="#M"/> in III.36 <ptr target="#N"/> in III.36 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.38 <ptr target="#U"/> in III.35 </note>
.</app>
1470</p>
.
.<!-- G hana (bra)ta tri sadya, ṅa, madyus piṁ tiga sarahina, mvaṁ vṅi, phalanya, lituhayu, sugiḥ lviḥ saṅkeṁ vijiliṁ tapa-->
.<!-- M hana brata tri sadya, ṅa, madyus piṁ tigā sarahinā, mvaṁ vṅi, pha, listvayu, sugiḥ lviḥ saṅkeṁ tapā vijilnyā -->
.<!-- N hana bratā tri sanḍya, ṅa, madyus piṁ tigā sarahina, mvaṁ vṅi, pha, listvayu, sugiḥ lviḥ saṅkeṁ tapā vijilnya -->
1475<!-- P hana bratā tri sadyā, ṅa, haṅupavaśa madyus piṁ tiga sarahinā, piṁ tiga riṁ ratri, phalanya, listuhayu paripūṛṇna, sugiḥ lviḥ sakeṁ tapānta -->
.<!-- U hana brata tri sāndya, ṅa, madyus piṁ tiga sarahina, mvaṁ vṅi, pha, listvāyu sugiḥ lviḥ sakeṁ tapa vijilnya-->
.
.
.<p n="III.37">hana brata trisādhya, ṅa, madyus piṅ tiga sarahina, mvaṅ vәṅi, pha, lituhayu, sugih lәvih sakiṅ tapa vijilnya.
1480<app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>
. <note> hana bratā tri ... tapa vijilnya <note>
. </note>
. <ptr target="#G"/> in III.36 <ptr target="#M"/> in III.37 <ptr target="#N"/> in III.37 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.39 <ptr target="#U"/> in III.36 </note>
.</app>
1485</p>
.
.<!-- G hana brāta mr̥ta māsa, ṅa, mahāṛyyan rvaniṁ vuṅlon, makadi hañcaṅkokiṁ vaḥnya, satahun samayanya, phalanya, siddha siṁ sakaṛyyanta, lituhayu, sugiḥ subhāga kita -->
.
.<!-- M hana bratā mr̥tta māsā, ṅa, mahāryyan rva niṁ vuṅlon, makadi hañcaṅkokiṁ vvaḥnya, pha, siddha siṁ sakaryyanta, listvayū, sugiḥ subhāga kittha -->
1490
.<!-- N hana bratta mr̥tta masā, ṅa, mahāṛyyan rvaniṁ vuṅlon, makadi yañ caṅkokiṁ vvaḥnya, pha, sidḍa siṁ sakaṛyyanta, listvayu, sugiḥ subhaga kita-->
.
.<!-- P hana brata hamr̥ta maṣa, ṅa, mahaṛyyan rvaniṁ huṅlon makādi yan caṅkokiṁ vahyā, satavun samayanyā siddha siṁ kāṛyyanta, listuhayu paripuṛṇnā, sugiḥ subhaga kitā -->
.
1495<!-- U hana bratā mratāmāsa, ṅa, mahaṛyyan rva niṁ vuṅlon, makādi yañ cangkok iṁ vvaḥnya, pha, sidā siṁ sakaṛyyanta, listvāyu, sugiḥ subhaga kita. -->
.
.
.<p n="III.38">hana brata amr̥ta māsa, ṅa, maharyan rvaniṅ vuṅlon, makādi añcaṅkokiṅ vvahnya, pha, siddha siṅ sakāryanta, lituhayu, sugih subhaga kita.
.<app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>
1500 <note> hana bratta mr̥tta ... subhaga kita <note>
. </note>
. <ptr target="#G"/> in III.37 <ptr target="#M"/> in III.38 <ptr target="#N"/> in III.38 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.40 <ptr target="#U"/> in III.37 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
1505
.<!-- G hana bratā narahan, ṅa, tan pamaṅan saṛvva vr̥ddhi niṁ strī, vnaṁ sar_ _ _ ṅsa paṅanәna, phalanya, siddhā sapinalakunta, kinahyunaniṁ stri kita -->
.
.<!-- M hana bratā narahan, ṅa, tan pamaṅan savr̥ddhi niṁ grī, vnaṁ sarvva maṅśa paṅanәnta, pha, siddha siṁ pinalākunta, kunayuna niṁ stri kittha -->
.
1510<!-- N hana bratā narahan, ṅa, tan pamaṅan savr̥dḍiniṁ srī, vnaṁ saṛvva maṅśa paṅanǝnta, pha, sidḍa siṁ pinalakunta, kinahyunaniṁ stri kittha -->
.
.<!-- U hana brata narahan, ṅa, tan pamaṅan savr̥ddi niṁ stri, vnaṁ saṛvva maṅsa paṅanәnta, pha, siddā siṁ pinalakunta, kinahyuna niṁ stri kita -->
.
.
1515<p n="III.39">hana brata narahan, ṅa, tan pamaṅan savrәddhiniṅ srī, vәnaṅ sarva maṅśa paṅanǝnta, pha, siddha siṅ pinalakunta, kinahyunaniṅ strī kita.
.<app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>
. <note> hana bratā narahan ... stri kittha <note>
. </note>
. <ptr target="#G"/> in III.38 <ptr target="#M"/> in III.39 <ptr target="#N"/> in III.39 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.11 <ptr target="#U"/> in III.38 </note>
1520</app>
.</p>
.
.
.<!-- G hana brata niramiṣa, ṅa, tan pamaṅan saṛvva maṅśa, kbo, sap(i), cele(ṁ), panadanya _ _ _ _ _ valā siṁ tan kneṁ kolaḥ dhagiṁnya, hisiniṁ lvaḥ pinakadhinya, kunə̄ṅ sesiniṁ tambak, mvaḥ karaṁ karaṅan, vnaṁ buktinta, pituṁṅ lek samayanya, phalanya, lviḥ saṅkeṁ lviḥ samanta janma, tan hanā liriṅane kita, hayu tmәn -->
1525
.<!-- M hana bratā miṣā, ṅa, tan pamaṅan sarvva maṅśā, lvirre, kbo, sapi, celeṁ, makadinya tan paṅanәnta, kevala siṁ tan kneṁ holaḥ, hivak kaṁ kna paṅanәnta, hisiniṁ lvaḥ, mvaḥ tambak, hisi niṁ sagāra, kakaraṅan, hiku vnaṁ bhuktinta, pituṁṅ lek ṣamayanyā, pha, lviḥ sakeṁ samā samanta janmā, tan āna niriṅane kittha, tūṛ mantukiṁ svaṛggān bhaṭāra viṣṇu, sasāṛnya mañjanmā riṁ viku bavu siṣya, hayū tmәn -->
.
.<!-- N hana bratta miramiśa, ṅa, tan pamaṅan saṛvva maṅśa, lvire, kbo, sapi, celeṁ, makadīnya tan paṅanǝnta, kevalya siṁ tan kneṅ olaḥ, hivak kaṁ kna paṅanǝnta, hisiniṁ lvaḥ, mvaṁ tambak, hisiniṁ saghara, kakaraṅan, hiku vnaṁ bhuktinta, pituṅ lek ṣamayanya, pha, lviḥ saṅkeṁ samā samanta janmā, tan āna niriṅane kittha, tuṛ mantukiṁ svaṛggan bhaṭāra viṣṇu, sasaṛnya mañjanma riṁ viku bahu sisyā, hayu tmǝn -->
.
1530<!-- P hana brata nira misā, ṅa, tan pamaṅan, saṛvva maṅsa, kәbo, sapi, celeṁ, kevala siṁ tan kәneṁ holaḥ dagiṁnya paṅanәnta, hisiniṁ lva pinakādinya, kunaṁ sahihiniṁ tambak pinakādinya mvaṁ karaṁ karam juga vnaṁ bhuktinta, pituṁ lek ṣamayanya, phalanya lviḥ sakeṁ samanta janma, taneniriṅa kita, hayu tәmәn -->
.
.<!-- P hana brata niṛmaṅśā, kramanya tan pamaṅān, kәbo, celeṁ, sāpi, vәdus, salviriṁ kәna vәlaḥ dagiṁnyātan pamaṅanta kevala siṁ tan kәneṁ holaḥ dagiṁnya paṅanәn, hasiniṁ lvaḥ pinakādinya hisiniṁ tambak kunaṁ, karaṁ karaṁ vәnaṁ paṅa:nәnta, pituṁ tavun samayanya, phalanya l̥viḥ sakeṁ samanta janmā tanana haṅilaṅi sukanta -->
.
.<!-- U hana bratā mira mira miśa, ṅa, tan pamaṅan sarva kәbo sapi, celeng, makādinya tan pangәnanta, kekava tan kneṅ olaḥ, Ekanya, isi niṁ lvaḥ, pinakādinya, kunaṁ sesi niṁ tambak, mvaṁ karaṁ karaṅan, vnaṁ bhukti, pituṁ lek samayanya, pha, lviḥ sakeng lvih riṁ sama samanta janma, tan hana niriṅane kita, hayu tmәn -->
1535
.
.<p n="III.40">hana brata nirāmiṣa, ṅa, tan pamaṅan sarva maṅśa, lvire, kәbo, sapi, celeṅ, makādinya tan paṅanǝnta, kevalya siṅ tan kәneṅ olah, ivak kaṅ kәna paṅanǝnta, isiniṅ lvah, mvaṅ tambak, isiniṅ sāgara, kakaraṅan, iku vәnaṅ bhuktinta, pituṅ lek samayanya, pha, lәvih sakiṅ sama samanta janma, tan hana niriṅane kita, tur mantuk iṅ svargan bhaṭāra viṣṇu, sasarnya majanma riṅ viku bahu śiṣya, hayu tәmǝn.
.<app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>
. <note> hana bratta miramiśa,... hayu tmǝn <note>
1540 </note>
. <ptr target="#G"/> in III.39 <ptr target="#M"/> in III.40 <ptr target="#N"/> in III.40 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.34, III.92 <ptr target="#U"/> in III.39 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
.
1545<!-- M hana bratā niramiṣā, yan amaṅan mevakā huyaḥ, satavun tigāṅ lek ṣamayanyā, hyaṁ Iśvara hyaṁnya, ma, Om̐ mam̐ ya namaḥ, pamit pha, siṁ pinriḥ meṅgal katmu, tūr kinasihan deni rāt kittha, mvaṁ deva bhuṭā shi ri kittha-->
.
.<!-- N hana bratta niramiṣā, yan āmaṅa mevaka huyaḥ, satahun tigaṅ lek ṣamayanya, hyaṁ Iśvara hyaṁnyā, ma, Om̐ mam̐ Iśvara ya namaḥ, pamit, pha, siṁ pinriḥ meṅgal katmu, tuṛ kinasihan deniṁ rāt kittha, mvaṁ deva bhūṭā sih iri kittha-->
.
.
1550<p n="III.41">hana brata nirāmiṣa, yan amaṅan mevaka uyah, satahun tigaṅ lek samayanya, hyaṅ īśvara hyaṅnya, ma, Om̐ mam̐ īśvarāya namah, pamit, pha, siṅ pinrih meṅgal katәmu, tur kinasihan deniṅ rāt kita, mvaṅ deva bhūṭāsih iri kita.
. <app><lem wit="#M #N"></lem>
. <note> hana bratta niramiṣa,... deva bhūṭā sih iri kittha <note>
. </note>
. <ptr target="#M"/> in III.41 <ptr target="#N"/> in III.41 </note>
1555</app>
.</p>
.
.<!-- G hana bratā cakra vratti, ṅa, vr̥ttti ginave cankrā rūpa, panunu skul saśiraḥniṁ vanāra gə̄ṁnya, yan kalanta maṅa _ _ pasaṁ taṁ vr̥ti, tumpaṅakniṁ skul, saśiraḥniṁ vanara gə̄ṁnya, Umar̥p vetan kita maṅan, hayva pjaḥ hikaṁ vr̥ti, pavusan kita maṅan, yan ahurip ikaṁ vr̥ti, huvusakәn denta maṅan, _ _ _, nya, meṅgal asiṁ sakaṛyyanta, siddhā katmū sapinakṣa, subaga kita, kinasihaniṁ pāṇḍita, mvaṁ saṁ prabhu, r̥si padha siḥ kabeḥ -->
.
1560<!-- M hana bratā candrā vr̥tti, ṅa, ginave candrā rūpa, panunu skul saśirah iṁ vanara gə̄ṁnyā, yan kalanta maṅan, pasaṁ taṁ vr̥tti, tumpaṅākniṁ skul, saśiraḥ iṁ vanara gə̄ṁnya, Umar̥p vetan kita pamaṅan, yan mati ghni hika vr̥ti, havusanā dentāmaṅan, pha, siṁ kaṛyyanta meṅgal siddha katmu siṁ pinakṣa, subhagā kittha, kinasiha niṁ saṁ pāṇdhita, mvaṁ saṁ prabhū, r̥sәp āsiḥ kabeḥ -->
.
.<!-- N hana bratā, candrāvr̥tti, ṅa, ginave candrā rūpā, panunu skul saśirahiṁ vanara gə̄ṁnya, yan kalanta maṅan, pasaṁ taṁ vr̥tti, tumpaṅakniṁ skul¸ saśirahiṁ vanarā, Umar̥p vetan kita pamaṅan, yan mati ghni hika riṁ vr̥tti, havusāna denta hamaṅan, pha, siṁ kaṛyyanta meṅgal katmu sidḍa siṁ pinakṣa, subhagā kittha, kinasihaniṁ saṁ pāṅḍita, mvaṁ saṁ prabhū, r̥sǝp asiḥ kabeḥ -->
.
.<!-- P hana brata ñakravaṛtti, ṅa. vr̥ti ginave cakrā rūpānya manunu sәkul sasirahiṁ vanara gәṁnya, yan kālaniṁ hamaṅan pasaṁ hikaṁ vr̥tti, tumpaṅakna riṁ sәkul, śiraḥniṁ vanara gәṁnya humar̥p vetan, kita hamaṅan, hayva pәjaḥ hikaṁ vr̥tti, husan kita hamaṅan, yan hurip hikaṁ vṛti huvusakna dlәntāmaṅan, phalanya siṁ sakāṛyyanta siddha katәmu saṁ pinakṣanta, subhaga kitā, kinaptihan deniṁ pāṇdhitā mvaṁ saṁ prabhu, r̥ṣi kabeḥ holasiḥ -->
1565
.<!-- U hana brata candra vr̥ti, ṅa, ginave candra rupa, panunu skul ṣasirah iṁ vānarā gə̄ṁnya, yan kālantāmaṅan savataṁ vr̥ti, tumpaṅakәn iṁ skul, sasirah iṁ vānāra, Umakar̥p vetan sira maṅan, hayva pjah ikaṁ vr̥tti yapvan pjah ikaṁ vr̥tti, pahuvusan kita maṅān, yan urip ikaṁ vr̥tthi, huvusakәn dentāmaṅan, pha, siṁ kāṛyyanta meṅgal, sidda kitā siṁ pinakṣa, subhaggā kita, kinasiha niṁ pāṇdhita, mvaṁ saṁ prabhu, r̥sәp hasiḥ kabeḥ -->
.
.
.<p n="III.42">hana brata candra vr̥tti, ṅa, ginave candra rūpa, panunu sәkul saśirahiṅ vānara gə̄ṅnya, yan kālanta maṅan, pasaṅ taṅ vr̥tti, tumpaṅakәn iṅ sәkul, saśirahiṅ vānara, umarәp vetan kita pamaṅan, yan mati agni ika riṅ vrәtti, avusana denta amaṅan, pha, siṅ kāryanta meṅgal katәmu siddha siṅ pinakṣa, subhaga kita, kinasihaniṅ saṅ paṇḍita, mvaṅ saṅ prabhu, rәsǝp asih kabeh.
1570<app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>
. <note> hana bratā, candrāvr̥tti,... asiḥ kabeḥ <note>
. </note>
. <ptr target="#G"/> in III.40 <ptr target="#M"/> in III.42 <ptr target="#N"/> in III.42 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.41 <ptr target="#U"/> in III.40 </note>
.</app>
1575</p>
.
.<!-- G hana brāta harakta, ṅa, hamaṅan laktan baṁ, satahun divasanya, phalanya, mantukiṁ svaṛgga bhaṭāra brahmā, sasāṛnya maṁjanma vvaṁ bhaṇyaga sugiḥ -->
.
.<!-- M hana bratā ṅraktā, ṅa, hamaṅan ktan bāṁ, satavun divasanyā, pha, siṁ kaṛyyanta siddha, mvaṁ mantukiṁ svaṛggā bhaṭāra brahmā, sasāṛnya mañjanmā riṁ vvaṁ baṇyagā sugiḥ -->
1580
.<!-- N hana bratta ṅrakta, ṅa, hamaṅan laktan bāṁ, satahun divaśanya, pha, siṁ kaṛyyanta sidḍa, mvaṁ mantukiṁ svaṛgga bhaṭāra brahmā, sasaṛnya mañjanmā riṁ baṇyaga sugiḥ -->
.
.<!-- P hana brata ṅrakta, ṅa, hamaṅan kәtan bāṁ, satahun ṣamayanya, phalanya mantukiṁ svaṛggān bhaṭāra brahmā, sasaṛnya mañjanma riṁ voṁ bhagya hasugiḥ-->
.
1585<!-- U hana brata ṅrakta, ṅa, hamaṅan laktan bāṅ, satahun divaṣanya, pha, siṁ kāṛyyanta siddā, mvaṁ mantukiṁ svaṛgga bhāṭāra brāhmā, sasaṛnya maṁjanma riṁ vvaṁ banyā sugiḥ -->
.
.
.<p n="III.43">hana brata ṅrakta, ṅa, amaṅan kәtan baṅ, satahun divasanya, pha, siṅ kāryanta siddha, mvaṅ mantuk iṅ svarga bhaṭāra brahmā, sasarnya majanma riṅ baṇyaga sugih.
.<app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>

. </note>
. <ptr target="#G"/> in III.41 <ptr target="#M"/> in III.43 <ptr target="#N"/> in III.43 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.42 <ptr target="#U"/> in III.41 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
1595
.<!-- G hana brata duṛggā, ṅa, hamaṅan skul jahli, limaṁṅ lek samayanya, phalanya, mantukiṁ svaṛggā bhaṭāra viṣṇu, sasaṛnya paṁjanma riṁ viku bahu sisya kita-->
.<!-- M hana bratānduṛggā, ṅa, hamaṅan skul jali, limaṅ lek samayanyā, pha, mantukiṁ svaṛggā bhaṭāra viṣṇu, sasāṛnya mañjanmā riṁ viku bahusiṣya -->
.<!-- N hana bratta ndurgga, ṅa, hamaṅan skül jali, limāṅ lek ṣamayanya, pha, mantukiṁ svārgga bhaṭāra viṣṇu, sasāṛnya mañjanmā riṁ viku bahu sisya-->
.<!-- P hana brata dūṛgga, ṅaranya hamaṅan sәkul jali, limaṁ lek ṣamayanya, phalanya mantukiṁ bhaṭāra viṣṇu, sasaṛnya mañjadma riṁ viku bhahu siṣya, kitā-->
1600<!-- U hana brata ndurgga, ṅa, hamaṅan skul juli, limaṅ lek samayanya, pha, mantuk iṁ svaṛgga bhaṭāra viṣṇu, sasaṛnya maṁjanma riṁ viku bāhu śiṣya-->
.
.<p n="III.44">hana brata ndurgga, ṅa, amaṅan sәkul jali, limaṅ lek samayanya, pha, mantuk iṅ svārgga bhaṭāra viṣṇu, sasarnya majanma riṅ viku bahu śiṣya.

.</p>
.
1610<!-- G hana brāta kanaka drāva, ṅa, hamaṅan skul kuniṁ, tigaṁ tahun samayanya, phalanya, mantukiṁ svaṛggā bhaṭāra saṁ mahadeva, sasaṛnya _ _ nma riṁ dhampvavaṁ sugiḥ -->
.
.<!-- M hana bratā kanakā drava, ṅa, hamaṅan sga kuniṁ, tigaṁ tavun samayanya, pha, mantukiṁ svaṛggā saṁ hyaṁ mahādevā, sasāṛnya mañjanmā riṁ dampvavaṁ sugiḥ -->
.
.<!-- N hana bratta kanaka drava, ṅa, hamaṅan skl kuniṁ, tigaṁ tahun samayanya, pha, mantukiṁ svaṛgga saṁ hyaṁ mahādeva, sasaṛnya mañjanma riṁ dampvavaṁ sugiḥ-->
1615
.<!-- P hana brata kanakadravā, ṅa, hamagan sәkul kuniṁ, tigaṁ tavun samayanya, phalanya mantukiṁ svaṛggān bhaṭāra mahādeva, sasaṛnya mañjanma riṁ vvaṁ sugiḥ -->
.
.<!-- U hana brata kanaka drāvā, ṅa, hamaṅan skul kuniṁ, tigaṁ tahun samayanya, pha, mantuk iṁ svaṛgga sa hyaṁ mahādeva, sasaṛnya maṁjanma riṁ dampvavaṁ sugiḥ -->
.
1620
.<p n="III.45">hana brata kanaka drava, ṅa, amaṅan sәkul kuniṅ, tigaṅ tahun samayanya, pha, mantuk iṅ svarga saṅ hyaṅ mahādeva, sasarnya majanma riṅ da mpu havaṅ sugih.

.</p>
.
.<!-- G hana brāta phalahara, ṅa, hamaṅan saṛvva phala, tigaṅ lek samayanya, phalanya mantukiṁ padha bhaṭāra sāddhā śiva, sasaṛnya maṁjanma riṁ janma sugiḥ bahu vadva -->
1630
.<!-- M hana bratā phalahāra, ṅa, hamaṅan saṛvva phalā, tigāṅ lek ṣamayanyā, pha, mantukiṁ svāṛgga bhaṭāra śaddha śiva, sasāṛnya mañjanma riṁ vvaṁ sugiḥ bahu siṣya, bahu vadvā -->
.
.<!-- N hana bratta phalahāra, ṅa, hamaṅan saṛvva phalā, tigāṅ lek ṣamayanya, pha, mantukiṁ svaṛgga bhaṭāra śadḍā śiva, sasaṛnya mañjanma riṁ vvaṁ sugiḥ, bahu sisya, bahu vadva -->
.
1635<!-- U hana brata phalahāra, ṅa, hamaṅanhā saṛvva phala, tigaṁṅ lek samayanya, pha, mantuk iṁ svaṛgga bhaṭāra sadā śiva, sasaṛnya maṁjanma riṁ vvaṁ sugiḥ saṅkan rare, listvahayu paripūṛṇna -->
.
.
.<p n="III.46">hana brata phala āhāra, ṅa, amaṅan sarva phala, tigaṅ lek samayanya, pha, mantuk iṅ svarga bhaṭāra sadāśiva, sasarnya majanma riṅ vvaṅ sugih, bahu śiṣya, bahu vadvā.

. </note>

.</app>
.</p>
1645
.<!-- G hana brata nduma, ṅa, tan paṅan tampakiṅ apuy, tigāṁ tahun samayanya, phalanya, mantukiṁ śvaṛggā bhaṭāra brahmā, sasāṛnya maṁjanma riṁ vaṁ sugiḥ saṅkan rare, lituhayu paripūṛṇna -->
.
.<!-- M hana bratāndumā, ṅa, tan pamaṅan tampakiṁ ṅapuy, tigāṁ tavun samayanya, pha, mantukiṁ svāṛggā bhaṭāra brahmā, sasāṛnya mañjanmā riṁ vvaṁ sugiḥ saṅkan rare, listvayu paripūṛṇna-->
.
1650<!-- N hana bratāndumā, ṅa, tan pamaṅan tampakiṅ apuy, tigaṁ tahun samayanya, pha, mantukiṁ svaṛgga bhaṭāra brahmā, sasāṛnya mañjanmā riṁ vvaṁ sugiḥ saṅkan rare, listvayu paripūṛṅna-->
.
.<!-- P hana brata, ndumā, ṅa, tan pamaṅan huṛyyaniṁ hapuy, phalanya, muliḥ riṁ svaṛggan bhaṭāra Iśvarā, mañjanma riṁ kula putra riṁ dlahā-->
.
.
1655<p n="III.47">hana brata ndhūma, ṅa, tan pamaṅan tampakiṅ apuy, tigaṅ tahun samayanya, pha, mantuk iṅ svarga bhaṭāra brahmā, sasarnya majanma riṅ vvaṅ sugih saṅkan rare, lituhayu paripūrṅa.

1660</app>
.</p>
.
.<!-- G hana brāta ṅalivon, ṅa, moliha pituṁ tumpәk kalivon, phalanya, priḥ maṅgal katmu -->
.<!-- M hana bratā ṅalivon, ṅa, moliha pituṁ tumpәk kalivon, pha, priḥ meṅgal katmu -->
1665<!-- N hana bratta ṅalivon, ṅa, molihā pituṁ tumpǝkalivon, pha, priḥ meṅgal katmu -->
.<!-- P hana bratā ṅalivonn, ṅa, ṅupavaṣa naṅkәn kalivon, phalanya siṁ priḥ Eṅgal katәkān sagaventa dinuluriṁ rahayu, tigaṁ tavun ṣamayanya -->
.<!-- P hana brata numpәk kalivon, ṅa, manaṅkәn tumpәk kalivon hamr̥ti habratā, habratā, habrata pituṁ vaṛṣa samayanya, phalanya haguṁ mrihanya kedhәp kapintuhu, siṁ kār̥p katәkan subhaga riṁ dlahā -->
.<!-- U hana brata ṅalivon, ṅa, moliha pituṁ tumpәk kalivon, pha, priḥ meṅgal katmu -->
.
1670
.<p n="III.48">hana brata ṅalivon, ṅa, moliha pituṅ tumpǝk kalivon, pha, prih meṅgal katәmu.
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>

.
.</p>
.
1680
.<!-- G hana brāta maṅan saṛvva vija, ṅa, mvaṁ pucukiṁ ṅalalaṁ, phalanya, vak bājrā siddhi mantra, jayeṁ satru kita-->
.<!-- M hana bratā maṅan saṛvva vija, mvaṁ pucukiṁ halaṁ halaṁ pha, vāk bhajrā, siddhi mantra, jaya kittha-->
.<!-- N hana bratā maṅan saṛvva vijā, mvaṁ pucukiṅ halalaṁ, pha, vāk bhajra, sidḍi mantra, jaya kitthā -->
.<!-- U hana bratā maṅan saṛvva vijā, muvaṁ pucuk iṅ alaṁ ṅalaṁ, pha, vak bajra, siddi mantrā, jaya si kita -->
1685
.<p n="III.49">hana brata maṅan sarva vīja, mvaṅ pucukiṅ halalaṅ, pha, vāk bajra, siddhi mantra, jaya kita.
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #U"></lem>

. </note>

. </app>
.</p>
.
.<!-- G hana brata bhūmi patra, ṅa, saṅaṁ tahun divasanya, phalanya, kasambega de saṁ paṇdhita, sugiḥ ḷmaḥ sima, vr̥ddhi kadaṁ vaṛggānta makveḥ -->
1695
.<!-- M hana brata bhūmi patra, ṅa, yan amaṅan tan pahrāyyan, saṅaṁ tavun samayanyā, pha, kasambhega deniṁ saṁ pāṇdhitā, sugiḥ lmaḥ simā, vr̥ddhi kaṁ vāṛgga kadhaṁtā, pinituhu deniṁ rāt, bahu siṣyā, viddhyagamā, kinatvaṅan de saṁ prabhū, yogānya śila gaṇa jugā, maṅkana phalanya -->
.
.<!-- N hana bratā bhūmi patra, ṅa, yan ā maṅan tan parāṛyan, saṅaṁ tahun samayanya, pha, kasāmbhega de saṁ pāṅḍita, sugiḥ lmaḥ śimā, vr̥dḍi kaṁ vaṛggā kaḍaṁta, pinituhu deniṁ rāt, bahu siṣya, vidyagama, kinatvaṅan de saṁ prabhū, yoganya śila gaṅa jugā, maṅkana phalanya-->
.
1700<!-- P hana brata bhumi patra, ṅa, hamaṅan mar̥piṁ hibu, riṁ l̥maḥ tan paharyyan, pәtaṁ tavun samayanya, phalanya kasambhega deniṁ saṁ pāṇdhitā, sugiḥ l̥maḥ, mvaṁ śima bahu vaṛggā, pinituhu deniṁ rāt, pāṇdhitā bahu siṣyā, vidya samanta, rāja guru sira, dr̥ve gama, kinatvaṅan deniṁ prabhu, yogya silaṅgana juga maṅkana phalanya -->
.
.<!-- U hana brata bhūmi putra, ṅa, saṅaṁ tahun samayanya, pha, kasambega de saṁ pāṇdita, sugiḥ lmah sima, vr̥ddi kaṁ kadaṁ vaṛgganta, pinituhu deniṁ rāt, bāhu sisyā, vidya samaptā, vidyāgama, kinatvaṅan de saṁ prabhu, yoganyā śilagaṇa juga, maṅkana phalanya -->
.
.<p n="III.50">hana brata bhūmi patra, ṅa, yan amaṅan tan paharyan , saṅaṅ tahun samayanya, pha, kasambega de saṅ paṇḍita, sugih lәmah sīma, vrәddhi kaṅ varga kadaṅta, pinituhu deniṅ rāt, bahu śiṣya, vidyā āgama, kinatvaṅan de saṅ prabhu, yoganya śila gaṇa juga, maṅkana phalanya.
1705<app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>
. <note> hana bratā bhūmi ... maṅkana phalanya <note>
. </note>
. <ptr target="#G"/> in III.48 <ptr target="#M"/> in III.50 <ptr target="#N"/> in III.50 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.2 <ptr target="#U"/> in III.47 </note>
.</app>
1710</p>
.
.<!-- M hana bratānūtakәn puṣpā bhaṭāra gāṇa, hamaṅan moliha nәm kpәl, pisan naṅkәn dinā, pha, mantukiṁ padā bhaṭāra guru, sasārnya mañjanma riṁ viku Ijo, sakti dura dāṛśśaṇa, sojarīra kedhәp -->
.
.<!-- N hanā bratta nūtakǝn puṣpā bhaṭāra ghaṅā, hamaṅan moliha nǝm, kpǝl pisan aṅkǝn dinā, pha, mantukiṁ pada bhaṭāra guru, sasaṛnya mañjanma riṁ viku Ijo, śakti durā darśśaṅa, sojarīra keḍǝp -->
1715
.<!-- P hana brata nutakәn puṣpa bhaṭāra gaṇa, ṅa, hamaṅan nәm kәpәl, sadinā dina, phalanya mantukiṁ padhā bhaṭāra guru, sasaṛnya mañjanmā riṁ viku hijo, śakti duradaṛṣaṇa, sojar ira kedhәp-->
.
.<!-- P hana brata hanutākәn puṣpa bhaṭāra gaṇa, hamaṅana holiḥ nәm kәpәl hapisan nāṅkәn dinā, phalanya mantuk riṁ padha bhaṭāra guru, sasaṛnya mañjanma riṁ viku hijo śakti dhira dhaṛśaṇa, kaedhәp. -->
.
1720<!-- U hana brata hanutakәn puṣpa bhāṭāra ghaṇa, hamaṅan holihā nәm kpәl, sapisan aṅkәn dina, pha, mantuk iṁ paddā bhaṭāra guru, sasaṛnya maṁjanma riṁ viku Ijo, śakti dura dārśśaṇa, kedhәp-->
.
.
.<p n="III.51">hana brata nūtakǝn puṣpa bhaṭāra gaṇa, amaṅan moliha nǝm kәpǝl pisan aṅkǝn dina, pha, mantuk iṅ pada bhaṭāra guru, sasarnya majanma riṅ viku ijo, śakti dūradarśaṇa, sojar ira keḍәp.
. <app><lem wit=" #M #N #P #U"></lem>
1725 <note> hanā bratta nūtakǝn ... sojarīra keḍǝp <note>
. </note>
. <ptr target="#M"/> in III.51 <ptr target="#N"/> in III.51 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.45, III.140 <ptr target="#U"/> in III.48 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
1730
.<!-- G hana brāta tan paṅinum bañu yan huvus amaṅan, pituṁ samayanya, phalanya, priḥ meṅgal katmu -->
.<!-- M hana bratā tan paṅinum bañu ri vuvusniṅ amaṅan, pituṁ tavun samayanya, pha, tan kacalan phalanta -->
.<!-- N hana bratā tan paṅinum bañu, ri huvusniṅ amaṅan, pituṁ tahun samayanya, pha, tan kacalan phalanta -->
.<!-- P hana brata tan paṅinum bañu yan havuvus hamaṅan pituṁ tavun samayanya, phalanya tan kacalan saventa-->
1735<!-- U hana brata tan paṅinumma bañu ri vusiṅ amaṅan, pituṁ tahun samayanya, pha, tan kavalan phalanta-->
.
.<p n="III.52">hana brata tan paṅinum bañu, ri huvusniṅ amaṅan, pituṅ tahun samayanya, pha, tan kacalan phalanta.
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>
. <note> hana bratā tan ... kacalan phalanta <note>
1740 </note>
. <ptr target="#G"/> in III.50 <ptr target="#M"/> in III.52 <ptr target="#N"/> in III.52 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.19 <ptr target="#U"/> in III.49 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
.
1745
.<!-- G hana brāta tan paṅinum bañu, Aṅinaṁ sәrәḥ tan vinalik satahun samayanya, phalanya, cinavәtan deniṁ stri, yan strī tinapihan deniṁ jalunya, thәṛ tan mandi Ikaṁ viṣa Iri ya -->
.
.<!-- M hana bratā tan paṅinum bañu, haṅinaṁ sr̥ḥ tan vinalik, satavun samayanya, pha, cinavәtan deniṁ histri, yanīm strī tinapihan deniṁ kakuṁ, thәṛ tan mandi hikaṁ viṣya hiri kitthā -->
.
1750<!-- N hana bratā tan paṅinum bañu, haṅinaṁ sr̥ḥ tan vinalik, satahun samayanya, pha, cinavǝtan deniṁ histrī, yaniṁ strī tinapihan deniṁ kakūṁ, thǝṛ tan mandi Ikaṁ viṣyā hiri kittha -->
.
.<!-- P hana brata tan paṅinum toya, haṅinaṁ sәr̥ḥ tan vinalik, satavun ṣamayanya, phalanya cinavәtan deniṁ histri, yan histri tinampihan deniṁ kākūṁnya, tәhәṛ tan mandi ya hikaṁ viṣā ya hiri yā -->
.
.<!-- U hana bratā tan paṅinum bañu, ṅinaṁ spaḥ tan vinalik, sātahun samayanya, pha, cinavәtan deniṁ stri, yann iṁ stri, yaniṁ stri tinapihan deniṁ kakuṁ, thәṛ tan mandi hikaṁ viṣya hiri kita -->
1755
.
.<p n="III.53">hana brata tan paṅinum bañu, aṅinaṅ sәrәh tan vinalik, satahun samayanya, pha, cinavǝtan deniṅ strī , yaniṅ strī tinapihan deniṅ kakuṅ, tәhәr tan mandi ikaṅ viṣya iri kita.
.<app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>
. <note> hana bratā tan ... hiri kittha <note>
1760 </note>
. <ptr target="#G"/> in III.49 <ptr target="#M"/> in III.53 <ptr target="#N"/> in III.53 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.46 <ptr target="#U"/> in III.50 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
.
1765<!-- M hana bratā ṅekadaśi, ṅa, yan taṅgal piṁ savlas ikaṁ kasapuluḥ, kita matihāra, moliha tigaṁ kasupuluḥ, pha, mantukiṁ padā bhaṭāra Iśvara, sasāṛnya mañjanma riṁ ratu sakti -->
.<!-- N hana brata ṅekadaśi, ṅa, yan taṅgal piṁ savlasiṁ kasāpuluḥ, kita matihāra, molihā tigaṁ kaśapuluḥ, pha, mantukiṁ padā bhatāra Iśvara, sasaṛnya mañjanma riṁ ratū śakti -->
.<!-- P hana brata ṅekadaśi, ṅa, yan taṅgal piṁ savәlas, hikaṁ sapuluḥ, hamatihara, hmoliḥ hikaṁ tigaṁ sapuluḥ, phalanya, mantukiṁ padhā bhaṭāra Iśvara, sasaṛnya mañjanma riṁ ratu śakti -->
.<!-- U hānā brata ṅekadaśi, ṅa, yan taṅgal piṁ savlasi ka sapuluḥ, kitā matihāra, molihā tigaṁ ka śapuluḥ, pha, mantuk iṁ pada bhaṭāra Iśvara, sasaṛnya maṁjanma riṁ śugiḥ ratu śakti -->
.
1770<p n="III.54">hana brata ṅekadaśi, ṅa, yan taṅgal piṅ savәlas iṅ kasapuluh, kita matiāhāra, moliha tigaṅ kasapuluh, pha, mantuk iṅ pada bhaṭāra īśvara, sasarnya majanma riṅ ratu śakti.
.<app><lem wit=" #M #N #P #U"></lem>
. <note> hana brata ṅekadaśi ... ratu sakti <note>
. </note>
. <ptr target="#M"/> in III.54 <ptr target="#N"/> in III.54 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.47 <ptr target="#U"/> in III.51 </note>
1775</app>
.</p>
.
.<!-- M hana bratā lviḥ sakeṁ bratā kabeḥ, pāñca mūna, hikaṅ amunā sada kāla, haṅraṅku bratā kabeḥ, pha, kapaṅgiḥ suka magə̄ṁ, mañjanmā riṁ sugiḥ saṅkan rare, sugiḥ skul, Athәṛ saśabdanta kedәp denim rāt kabeḥ-->
.
1780<!-- N hana bratā lviḥ saṅkeṁ brata kabeḥ, pañca muna, ṅa, Ikaṅ hamuna sadḍa kāla, Aṅraṅkus bratā kabeḥ, pha, kapaṅgiḥ suka magə̄ṁ, mañjanmā riṁ sugiḥ saṅkan rare, sugiḥ skul, Athǝṛ saśabdanta keḍǝp deniṁ rat kabeh-->
.
.<!-- P hana brata lviḥ saṅkeṁ pañca muṇnā, hikaṁ hamuka saddha kāla, haṅrakṣabrata kabeḥ, phalanya mamaṅgiḥ suka magə̄ṁ, phala bhoga, phala bhoja, mamukti saṅkā rare, tәhәṛ kedhәpiṁ rāt kabeḥ -->
.
.<!-- U hana brata lviḥ sakeṁ pañcamuna, Ikaṅ amuna sadākāla, haṅraṅkul brata kabeḥ, pha, kapaṅgiḥ muka magə̄ṁ, mañjadmā riṁ sugiḥ saṅkan rare, sugiḥ skul, athәṛ sabdanta kedhәp deniṁ rāt kabeh -->
1785
.
.<p n="III.55">hana brata lәvih sakiṅ brata kabeh, pañca mona , ṅa, ikaṅ amona sadā kāla, aṅraṅkus brata kabeh, pha, kapaṅgih suka magə̄ṅ, majanma riṅ sugih saṅkan rare, sugih sәkul, atәhәr saśabdanta keḍәp deniṅ rāt kabeh.
. <app><lem wit=" #M #N #P #U"></lem>
. <note> hana bratā lviḥ ... keḍǝp deniṁ rat kabeh <note>
1790 </note>
. <ptr target="#M"/> in III.55 <ptr target="#N"/> in III.55 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.48 <ptr target="#U"/> in III.52 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
.
1795<!-- M hana bratā vadak, ṅa, tan pamaṅan skul vadāṁ, pituṁṅ lek samayanyā, pha, hakveḥ vvaṁ harse kittha -->
.<!-- N hana bratā vaḍan , ṅa, tan pamaṅan skul vadāṁ, pituṅ lek ṣamayanya, pha, Akveḥ vvaṅ ārṣe kitthā -->
.<!-- P hana bratā hanvanda ṅaranya, tan pamaṅan sәkul vadaṁ, pitum lek ṣamayanya, kevala nasi jakan, paṅan sakavasā, phalanya hakveḥ hasiḥ hiri kitā -->
.<!-- P hana brata vadhak, ṅa, tan pamaṅān sәga vadaṁ, pituṁ tavun ṣamayanya, phalanya listuhayu paripūṛṇna, kinasihan deniṁ samanta janma-->
.<!-- P hana bratā vandha, ṅaranya, tan pamaṅan sәkul vadaṁ pituṁ lek ṣamayanya, kevala nasi jākan paṅan sakava, phalanya kveḥ masiḥ hiri kitā -->
1800<!-- U hana brata dhadhak, ṅa, tan pamaṅan sgā vadaṁ, pituṁ lek samayanya, pha, Akveḥ vvaṁ harṣe kita -->
.
.
.<p n="III.56">hana brata maḍaṅ , ṅa, tan pamaṅan sәkul madaṅ , pituṅ lek samayanya, pha, akveh vvaṅ harṣe kita.

.</p>
1810
.<!-- M hana bratā tan kneṁ dyus, tan kneṁ lṅā, tigāṅ lek ṣamayanya, pha, listvayu paripūṛṇna, vicakṣaṇa, kinasihan deniṁ samanta janmā -->
.<!-- N hana bratta tan kneṁ dyus, tan kneṁ lǝṅhā, tigāṅ lek ṣamayanya, pha, listvāyu paripuṛṅna, vicakṣaṅā, kinasihan deniṁ samānta janmā -->
.<!-- U brata tan kneṁ l̥ṅa, tatan kneṁ dyus, tigaṅ lek samayanya, pha, listvāyu paripūrṇna, vicakṣāṇa, kinasiha deniṁ sāmanta janmā -->
.
1815<p n="III.57">hana brata tan kәneṅ dyus, tan kәneṅ lǝṅa, tigaṅ lek samayanya, pha, lituhayu paripūrṇa, wicakṣaṇa, kinasihan deniṅ samanta janma.

. </note>
