1820</app>
.</p>
.
.<!-- M hana bratā maṅan tan pinakevuhan, tān kar̥ṇan, tan vnaṁ hakarvan, satavun samayan ya, pha, kedhәp deniṁ rat, lvīstvayu paripūṛṇna, priḥ meṅgal katmu -->
.<!-- N hana bratta maṅan tan pinakevuhan, tan kar̥ṇān, tan vnaṁ hakarvan, satahun ṣamayanya, pha, keḍǝp deniṁ rāt, listvayu paripuṛṅna, priḥ meṅgal katmu -->
1825<!-- P hana brata bhukti tan kinimbuhan, tan kar̥ṇan tan vәnaṁ hakaṛvvan satavun samayanya, phalanya kedhәpa deniṁ rāt, listuhayu paripūṛṇna, siṁ priḥ katәkan -->
.<!-- U hanā bratā tan pakevuhan, tan kar̥ban, tan vnaṁ hakāṛvvan, satahun sāmayanya, pha, kedhәp dheniṁ rāt listuhayu, paripūrṇna, priḥ meṅgal katmu -->
.
.<p n="III.58">hana brata maṅan tan pinakevuhan, tan karәṇan, tan vәnaṅ akarvan, satahun samayanya, pha, keḍәp deniṅ rāt, lituhayu paripūrṅa, prih meṅgal katәmu.

1835
.
.<!-- M hana bratā maṅan tan pahimbuḥ, pituṁ tavun samayanya, pha, priḥ meṅgal katmu -->

1850
.<!-- G hana brāta ṅadite, ṅa, Aṅkәn· radhite ma—tihara, satahun samayanya, phalanya vāk bajra, siddhi mantrā, jaya satru -->
.<!-- M hana bratā ṅradite, ṅa, Aṅkәn radite hamatihara, satavun ṣama yanya, pha, vāk bhajrā sidi mantra, jayeṁ satru kittha -->
.<!-- N hana bratā, Aṅradite, ṅa, Aṅkǝn radite hamatihāra, satahun samayanya, pha, vāk bhajrā, sidḍi mamantra, jayeṁ śatru kittha -->
.<!-- P hana brata ṅandhite, ṅa, manaṅkәn radite hamitiharā satavun ṣamayanya, phalanya vak bajrā siddhi mantra jaya śatru -->
1855<!-- U hana brata hangr̥dite, ṅa, Aṅkәn radite hamātihārā, satahun samayanya, pha, vak bajrā, siddi mantrā, jaya savruhantā -->
.
.<p n="III.60">hana brata aṅradite, ṅa, aṅkǝn radite amatiāhāra, satahun samayanya, pha, vāk bajra, siddhi mantra, jayeṅ śatru kita.

.</p>
.
1865<!-- G hana brata maṇḍava, ṅa, hamaṅan limaṁ kpәl, sāri sāri, limaṁ vulan samayanya, phalanya, kaṣṭāgunan tkā, viṛyyavan tkā, subhaga paripūṛṇna -->
.<!-- M hana bratāmāṇdhava, ṅa, hamaṅan limaṁ kpәl sari sari, limaṁ lek ṣamayanya, pha, Aṣṭa guṇā, subhaga paripūṛṇna -->
.<!-- N hana bratā maṇḍava, ṅa, hamaṅan limaṁ kpǝl, sari sari, limāṅ lek ṣamayanya, pha, Aṣṭāguṇa, subhagā paripuṛṅna -->
.<!-- P hana brata maṇdhava ṅaranya, hamaṅan limaṁ ṅan limaṁ kәphәl, sari sari, limaṁ lek ṣamayanya, phalanya kaṣṭaguṇanya padhā tәkā, kaviṛyyavan subhaga paripuṛṇna -->
.<!-- U hāna brāta hamaṇdhava, ṅa, hamaṅan limāṁ kpәl sāri sāri, limaṅ lek samayanya, pha, Asṭā gūṇā, paripūrṇna -->
1870
.<p n="III.61">hana brata maṇḍāva, ṅa, amaṅan limaṅ kәpǝl sari sari, limaṅ lek samayanya, pha, aṣṭa guṇa, subhaga paripūrṇa.

. </note>

.</p>
.
.<!-- G hana brāta saṁ bhima, ṅa, yan taṅgal _ _ _ _ _ siṁ kapitu, Amatihara sāri-sāri, phalanya, suka vr̥ddhi, siddhi mantra, jaya satru kedhәp deniṁ rat, prājña biṣā gamәl, aṅiduṁ, sugiḥ _ _ _ rak, mvaṁ rare hulun, vnaṁ vnaṁ kbo sapi, Akveḥ punpunanya, krama nihan, yan tәṅaḥ vṅi maṅadәṅ aṅekapadha, tan kneṁ turu, mvaṁ ṅasaṅguṇi, siddhi kita-->
1880
.<!-- M hana brata saṁ bbhīmā, ṅa, yen taṅgal piṁ pat blasiṁ kapitu, hamatihara, pha, suka vr̥ddhi, siddhi mantra, jayeṁ satru, kedhәp deniṁ rāt, prajñā biṣa gamәl hāṅidu, sugiḥ mas pirak, mvaṁ rare hulun, vnaṁ vnaṁ kbo sapi, harakaḥ punpunanya, kramanya, kramanya yaniṁ tṅaḥ vṅi haṅadәg haṅekapadā, tan kәna turu, mvaṁ hasaṅguṇī, siddhi kittha -->
.
.<!-- N hana bratta saṁ bhīmā, ṅa, yen taṅgal piṁ pat bǝlasiṁ kapitu, hamatihāra, pha, suka vr̥dḍi, sidḍi mantra, jayeṁ śatru, keḍǝp deniṁ rāt, prajña biṣāgamǝl, haṅiduṁ, sugiḥ mās pirak, mvaṁ rare hulun, vnaṁ vnaṁ, kbo sapi, hakeḥ punpunanya, kramanya, yaniṁ tṅaḥ vṅi haṅadǝg aṅeka padā, tan kna turu, mvaṅ hasaṅguni, sidḍi kittha-->
.
1885<!-- P hana brata saṁ bhima, ṅa, yan riṁ taṅgal piṁ rva vәlasiṁ kapitu, hamatiharā, sari sari, phalanya suka vr̥ddhi siddhi mantra, jaya śatru kedhәp deniṁ rāt, prajñān bisa hagamәl muvaṁ haṅiduṁ, sugiḥ mās pirak, rare hulun vәnaṁ vәnaṁ, kәbo sapi, hakveḥ hulunya, yaniṁ tәṅaḥvәṅi haṅadәga ṅeka padhā, tan kәneṁ turu mvaṁ hasaṅguliṁ, phalanya, siddhi kitā -->
.
.<!-- U hanā brāta sāṁ bhima, ṅa, yen taṅgal piṁ pāt blas iṁ ka pitu, hāmātihāra, pha, suka vr̥ddi, siddhi mantra, jayeṁ śatru, kedhәp deniṁ rāt, prajñā bisā gamәl, aṅidhuṁ, sugiḥ mās pirāk, mvaṁrare Ulun, vnaṁ vnaṁ kbo sapi, hakeḥ punpunanya, makakramanya, yaniṁ tṅaḥ vṅi, haṅadhәg haṅekā pada, tān kneṁ turu, mvaṁṅ asaṁguni, siddi kitā -->
.
.
1890<p n="III.62">hana brata saṅ bhīmā, ṅa, yen taṅgal piṅ pat bǝlas iṅ kapitu, amatiāhāra, pha, suka vrәddhi, siddhi mantra, jayeṅ śatru, keḍәp deniṅ rāt, prajña bisa agamǝl, aṅiduṅ , sugih mās pirak, mvaṅ rare hulun, vәnaṅ vәnaṅ, kәbo sapi, akeh punpunanya, kramanya, yaniṅ tәṅah vәṅi aṅadǝg aṅeka pāda, tan kәna turu, mvaṅ asaṅguni, siddhi kita.
.<app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>
. <note> hana bratta saṁ ... sidḍi kittha <note>
. </note>
. <ptr target="#G"/> in III.53 <ptr target="#M"/> in III.62 <ptr target="#N"/> in III.62 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.52 <ptr target="#U"/> in III.60 </note>
1895</app>
.</p>
.
.<!-- M hana bratā tan pamaṅan hivak bavi, pha, tan kataman deniṁ saṛvva viṣya, mvaṁ tilā vudug, sakveḥnya pada doḥ, siddhi mantra kittha, devā bhūṭā pāṇdhitā manuṣa padha siḥ -->
.<!-- N hana bratā tan pamaṅan hivak bavi, pha, tan katamānā deniṁ saṛvva viṣya, mvaṁ Ilā vudug, sakveḥnya paḍa doḥ, sidḍi mantrā kittha, devā bhūṭā paṇḍita manuṣā paḍa siḥ -->
1900
.<p n="III.63">hana brata tan pamaṅan ivak bavi, pha, tan kataman deniṅ sarva viṣya, mvaṅ ila vuḍug, sakvehnya paḍa doh, siddhi mantra kita, deva bhūṭa paṇḍita mānuṣa paḍa sih.
. <app><lem wit="#M #N"></lem>
. <note> hana bratā tan ... paḍa siḥ <note>
. </note>
1905 <ptr target="#M"/> in III.63 <ptr target="#N"/> in III.63 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
.
.<!-- M hana bratāmgat raṣa, ṅa, tan pamaṅan hivak celeṁ, tan pamaṅana siyuṅan, tan pamaṅan hivak taṅiri, tan pamaṅan ktan gajiḥ, tan pamaṅanā dūṛyyan mvaṁ naṅkā, mvaṁ gdhaṁ varaṅan, tan pamaṅana kacaṁ hijo, kunaṁ pala buṅkaḥ, pala gantuṁ, pha, śakti l̥viḥ, sakar̥pta katkan, tәmbe-->
1910
.<!-- N hana bratāmgat raṣā, ṅa, tan pamaṅan hivak celeṁ, tan pamaṅanā siyuṅan , tan pamaṅan hivak taṅiri, tan pamaṅan ktan gajiḥ, tan pamaṅana duṛyyan, mvaṁ naṅka, mvaṁ gḍaṁ varaṅān, tan pamaṅana kacaṁ hijo, kunaṁ phala buṅkaḥ, phala gantuṁ, pha, śakti l̥viḥ, sakār̥ptā katkan tǝmbe -->
.
.
.<p n="III.64">hana brata mәgat rasa, ṅa, tan pamaṅan ivak celeṅ, tan pamaṅan asiyuṅ, tan pamaṅan ivak taṅiri, tan pamaṅan kәtan gajih, tan pamaṅan duryan, mvaṅ naṅka, mvaṅ gәḍaṅ varaṅan, tan pamaṅan kacaṅ hijo, kunaṅ phala buṅkah, phala gantuṅ, pha, śakti lәvih, sakārәpta katəkan tǝmbe.
1915<app><lem wit="#M #N"></lem>
. <note> hana bratāmgat raṣā ... katkan tǝmbe <note>
. </note>
. <ptr target="#M"/> in III.64 <ptr target="#N"/> in III.64 </note>
.</app>
1920</p>
.
.<!-- M hana bratā ṅasapuluḥ, ṅa, bratānirā saṁ sinuhun iṁ panatāran, kramanya, kramanya, nkul bañu, tan paṅinaṁ, hamvitane ri taṅgal pisaniṁ kadaśa, havusana ri til̥mi kaśapuluḥ, salek ṣamayanya, rehiṁ caru hamit, yan alkasa bratā, hanәmbaḥiṁ saṅgar, ca, tumpə̄ṁ guriḥ, Ikvak lambharaṅ iṭik, dulurana graṁ griḥ, kapitim, hantigan, kacambaḥ, pelas lalab, Uraṅīṅa sinan, pisaṁ kәmbaṁ raka vovohan, duvgan, tbu, bañu kuvuṁ, skar maṅle, gambirr inaṅgit, maṅle tuñuṁ, campaka, salviraniṁ kәmbaṁ vaṅi, haturakniṁ devā, l̥ṅa vaṅi burat vaṅi, vurap ūrap, jajā, sakālviṛraniṁ hamik amikan, vastra piṅhe saparadәg, harttha, 225, dhūpā dhipa mñan candāna, mvaṁ sandānenasab, vija kәmbaṁ skārūrā, nihan deniṅ āmantra, mvitā sәsәdәp, rumuvun, kavr̥tta rok lavan madhū, sәsәdәpaknā, dukāmvitā ya, hanәmbahakna kavaṅi, ri saṅgaṛ, ma, Om̐ śrī mahādevā ya namaḥ, tlas, ṅaturi carū, ma, Om̐ devā darū veddha dhami, sā ba ta A I, nāmā śiva ya, A U mā, Aḥ, Om̐ deva sukambavantu, tlasta ṅәmaṅūrā, hanambuta bratā , savulan hankul toya, Ambasaneṁ til̥m, sәsәdhәpi samaṅkana, Uyah ar̥ṁ, ma, Om̐ namo mahādeva ya namaḥ, nāma śivaya, Avighnamāstu -->
.
.<!-- N hana bratā ṅaśapulu, ṅa, brattanirā saṁ sinuhuniṁ panātharan, kramanya nkul bañu, tan paṅinaṁ, Amvitāneṁ ri taṅgal pisaniṁ ka daśā, havusāna ri tīlǝmi ka śapuluḥ, salek ṣamayanya, rehi caru hamit, yanalkasābrata, hanǝmbahi saṅgar·, ca, tumpə̄ṁ guriḥ, Ivak lambharaṅ hitik, dulurā nā graṁ griḥ, kapitiṁ, hantigā, kacambaḥ, pelas lalab, Uraṅiṅ asinan, pisaṁ kǝmbaṁ, raka vovohan , duvgan , tbu, bañu kuvuṁ, skār maṅle, gambir iṅaṅgit, maṅle tuñjuṁ, campaka, salviraniṁ kǝmbaṁ vaṅi, hatuṛakniṁ devā, lṅā vaṅī burat vaṅi, hurap uṛap jajā, sakalvirāmikāmikan , vastra piṅe saparadǝg, sasaṛi gnǝp, hartha, 225, ḍūpa ḍipā mñan caṅḍanā, mvaṁ caṇḍanenasab, vija kǝmbhaṁ skār urā, nihan deniṅ amantrā, mvītā sǝsǝḍǝp ru muhun , kavr̥ttā rok lavan maḍu, sǝsǝḍǝpaknā, dukāmvitī taya, hanǝmbahakna kavaṅī, riṁ saṅgar·, ma, Om̐ śrī mahā deva ya namaḥ, tlas , ṅatuṛi carū, ma, Om̐ devadaru veḍaḍāmi, sa ba ta A I, nama śiva ya, A U mā, Aḥ, Om̐ deva sukam bavantu, tlasta ṅǝmbaṅurā, hanambuta bratta, savulan hankul bañu, Amkasāneṁ tīl̥m, sǝsǝḍǝpi samaṅkana, Uyaḥ har̥ṁ, ma, Om̐ namo mahā deva ya namaḥ, nāma śiva ya, Avighnamāstu -->
1925
.
.<p n="III.65">hana brata ṅasapuluh, ṅa, bratanira saṅ sinuhun iṅ panatharan, kramanya nәkul bañu, tan paṅinaṅ, amvitana riṅ taṅgal pisaniṅ kadaśa, avusana ri tilǝmi kasapuluh, salek samayanya, rehiṅ caru amvit , yan alәkasa brata, anǝmbah iṅ saṅgar, ca, tumpәṅ gurih, ivak lambaraṅ itik, dulurana gәraṅ grih, kapitiṅ, antiga , kacambah, pelas lalab, uraṅ iṅasinan, pisaṅ kǝmbaṅ, raka vovohan, duvәgan, tәbu, bañu kuvuṅ, sәkar maṅle, gambir iṅaṅgit, maṅle tuñjuṅ , campaka, salviraniṅ kǝmbaṅ vaṅi, aturakәn iṅ deva, lәṅa vaṅi burat vaṅi, hurap urap jajā, sakalvirāmikāmikan, vastra piṅe saparadǝg, sasari gnǝp, hartha, 225, dhūpa dhipā mñan caṅdhanā, mvaṅ caṇdhanenasab, vija kǝmbhaṅ skār urā, nihan deniṅ amantrā, mvītā sǝsǝdhǝp rumuhun, kavrәttā rok lavan madhu, sǝsǝdhǝpaknā, dukāmvitī taya, hanǝmbahakna kavaṅī, riṅ saṅgar, ma, Om̐ śrī mahādevāya namah, tlas, ṅaturi carū, ma, Om̐ devadaru vedhadhāmi, sa ba ta A I, nama śiva ya, A U mā, Ah, Om̐ deva sukam bavantu, tlas ta ṅǝmbaṅurā, anambuta brata, savulan ankul bañu, amkasāneṅ tīlәm, sǝsǝdhǝpi samaṅkana, Uyah harәṅ, ma, Om̐ namo mahā devāya namah, nāma śivāya, avighnamāstu. caruniṅ labahanābrata, sapuluṅ sapuluṅ mevakǝmbaṅ, kadi ṅūnī mantra. yan āṅarddhānakǝñ caru, kadi duk amvitṭa juga, huvusan, ma, Om̐.
.<app><lem wit="#M #N"></lem>
. <note> hana bratā ṅaśapulu ... nāma śiva ya, Avighnamāstu <note>
1930 </note>
. <ptr target="#M"/> in III.65 <ptr target="#N"/> in III.65 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
.
1935<!-- M hana bratā kodara, ṅa, savulan lavasnya, hamvitane taṅgal apisaniṅ karo, tan pamaṅanā saṛvva praṇi, mvaṁ salviriṁ vijiliṁ sagāra, santa veśa ta kittha, mavastra piṅe, hagәglaṅ a lave kinunirān, taṅan tәṅәn, hayva mamati mati saṛvvambәkan, makacarunya mvita bratā, skuliṁ tamas, hulamāna sāṛvva gaṅan, vadaḥ limas, tuhuṁ salvirnya, papare, baligo, sambәl, salvirnya tan pataraṣi, gogoreṅan, kolantaṁ, cacaṅanon ginoreṁ, mvaṁ papare ginoreṁ, pada hembanāna sasavi, hәmbasa kalor huvus ratə̄ṁ, tumpaṅākniṁ skuliṁ tamas, makadi yanānapәhan, miñak mavadaḥ limas, den asṛi deni ṅ aniṅkaḥ caru, sdhaḥ voḥ raka raka vovohan, pisaṁ kәmbaṁ den asaṅkәp, dūvgan, Upacara, dhupa dhipā, vija candāne nasab, sajekna parāniṁ caru, riṁ bhaṭāra gaṇa pati, saṁ bhr̥giriti, saṁ hyaṁ Iśvarā, bhaṭārī Umā, sira padha hatūranā caru, lumkas kita hanambutana bratā, masucya radina śarīra, haṅabakti riṁ saṅgar·, ma, Om̐ nāndiśvarā mahakala ya namaḥ, Om̐ śrī bhraṅgiriti ya namaḥ, Om̐ sam̐ sāpta r̥ṣi bhyo namaḥ, Om̐ maheśvara ya namaḥ, Om̐ śrī Umāye namaḥ, tlas haturakәn carunta riṁ deva, ma, Om̐ Im̐ namaḥ, Om̐ devāscarāve namaḥ, Amr̥tātmakā ya svahā|| yan halabvana bratā kadi ṅūni, duk vavu lumkas abratā, luvarana glaṁ save kuniṁ, mahuvusanā ri tīl̥miṁ bhadravadā jugā-->
.
.<!--N hana bratta kodara, ṅa, savulan lavasnya, hamvitāne taṅgal pisaniṅ karo, tan pamaṅana sārvva praṇī, mvaṁ salviriṁ vijiliṁ śagāra, śantāveṣā ta kitthā, mavastra piṅe, hagәglaṅā lave kinuniran , taṅan tṅǝn , hayva mamati mati saṛvva mbə̄kan , makācarunya mvitā bratta, skuliṁ tamās, hulamāna saṛvva gaṅān, vaḍaḥ limās, tuhuṁ salvirnya, papare, baligo, sambǝl, salviranya tan pataraṣi, gogoreṅan koleṇṭaṁ, cacaṅanon ginoreṁ, mvaṁ papare ginoreṁ, paḍa hǝmbanāna sasavi, hǝmba sakalor·, huvus ratǝṁ tumpaṅakniṁ skul iṁ tamas , makadi yanānaphān, miñak, mavaḍaḥ limās, den aśrī deniṅkaḥ caru, sḍaḥ voḥ, raka vovohan, pisaṁ kǝmbaṁ den āsaṅkǝp, duvgan, Upacara ḍūpā ḍipā, vija caṅḍanenasab, sājekna paraniṁ caru, riṁ bhaṭāra gaṅāpati, saṁ bhr̥ṅgiritī, saṁ hyaṁ Iśvarā, bhaṭāri Umā, sira paḍa atuṛana caru, lumkas kita hanambuta bratta, masucya radinā śarīra, Aṅabakti riṁ saṅgar·, ma, Om̐ nāndiśvara mahākāla ya namaḥ, Om̐ bhr̥ṅgiritī ye namaḥ, Om̐ sam̐ sāpta r̥ṣi bhyo namaḥ, Om̐ maheśvara ya namaḥ, Om̐ śrī Umā ye namaḥ, tlas haturākǝñ carunta riṁ deva, ma, Om̐ Im̐ namaḥ, Om̐ deva carave namaḥ, Amr̥ttātmaka ya svāha|| yan halabvana bratā kadi ṅūni, duk vahu lumkasā bratta, luvarana glaṁ lave kuniṁ, mahuvusana ri tīlǝmiṁ bhadravadā jugā -->
.
.<p n="III.66">hana brata kodara, ṅa, savulan lavasnya, hamvitāne taṅgal pisaniṅ karo, tan pamaṅana sarva praṇī, mvaṅ salviriṅ vijiliṅ śagāra, śantāveṣā ta kita, mavastra piṅe, hagәglaṅā lave kinuniran, taṅan tṅǝn, hayva mamati mati sarva mbə̄kan, makācarunya mvitā brata, sәkuliṅ tamās, hulamāna sarva gaṅān, vadhah limās, tuhuṅ salvirnya, papare, baligo, sambǝl, salviranya tan pataraṣi, gogoreṅan koleṇṭaṅ, cacaṅanon ginoreṅ, mvaṅ papare ginoreṅ, padha hǝmbanāna sasavi, hǝmba sakalor, huvus ratǝṅ tumpaṅakniṅ sәkul iṅtamas, makadi yanānaphān, miñak, mavadhah limās, den aśrī deniṅkah caru, sәḍah voh, raka vovohan, pisaṅ kǝmbaṅ den āsaṅkǝp, duvgan, Upacara dhūpā dhipā, vija caṅdhanenasab, sājekna paraniṅcaru, riṅ bhaṭāra gaṅāpati, saṅ bhrәṅgiritī, saṅ hyaṅ Iśvarā, bhaṭārī Umā, sira padha aturana caru, lumkas kita hanambuta brata, masucya radinā śarīra, Aṅabakti riṅ saṅgar, ma, Om̐ nāndiśvara mahākāla ya namah, Om̐bhrәṅgiritī ye namah, Om̐ sam̐ sāpta rәṣi bhyo namah, Om̐ maheśvarāya namah, Om̐ śrī Umāye namah, tlas haturākǝñ carunta riṅ deva, ma, Om̐ Im̐ namah, Om̐ deva carave namah, Amrәttātmakāya svāhā. yan halabvana brata kadi ṅūni, duk vahu lumkasā brata, luvarana glaṅ lave kuniṅ, mahuvusana ri tīlǝmiṅ bhadravadā juga.
1940<app><lem wit="#M #N"></lem>
. <note> hana bratta kodara ... bhadravadā jugā <note>
. </note>
. <ptr target="#M"/> in III.66 <ptr target="#N"/> in III.66 </note>
.</app>
1945</p>
.
.
.<!-- G nihan paṅastutiniṁ brata, riṁ vulan āmr̥ttamaśa, kavruhakna, ḷkasnyā hamatighni, sarahina, yaniṁ vulan kaphaṭ, hamr̥ttamaśanya, riṁ pūrṇnama, mantra stutinira, yan aṅabakti åmvitiṁ saṅgar·, ma, Om̐ tvaṣṭa vai devā mr̥tta tvam, porṇnamāsi namo stute, mamocya sarvva papebhyā, candra ….{lo}kaṁ sagaccāti, saṁ hyaṁ ṅāsmara devatanya, bratanya ayva maṅan sarvva rondon, phalanya dhadi śiṁ tinandhurtā. Caru sarvva pavitra, tumpәṁ putiḥ, papaṅgaṅ itik, graṁ griḥ, yantiga, sdhaḥ vho, raka vo-vohan, pisaṁ kәmbaṁ, dhupa den asaṅkәp, mantraniṁ ṅhaṅaturakәñ caru, ma, Om̐ devācara ve namaḥ, candra deva ya svāha || yaniṁ vulan, 5, riṁ tiḷm amr̥ttamaśanya, saṁ hyaṁ mahadeva devatanya, bratanya, ayva vuvus ala, ayva nәmbaṁ boñcaḥ, phalanya, dr̥man āvәvәkasan. Caru tuṅgal kadi ṅuni, mantra stutinira, Om̐ mitra vai devāmr̥tta tvaṁ, åpavasya damostute, mamocyā sarvva papebhyā, åghnilokaṁ sagaccāti. Aturakna carunta riṁ deva kadi ṅuni, ma, Om̐ devā cara ve nāmaḥ, ådeva ya svaha || yaniṁ vulan, 6, riṁ piṁ volu amr̥ttamaśanya, bratanya, tuṅgal kadi ṅuni, saṁ hyaṁ ṅatanu devatanya, bratanya yva ṅinәp, yan aluluṅā, phalanya sugiḥ tan kahilaṅan, caru kadi ṅuni, mantra stutinya, Om̐ kr̥ṣṇā ve devā mr̥tta tvaṁ, åṣṭamyantu namo stute, mamocyā sarvva papebhyā, viṣṇu lokaṁ sagacchati. Åturākna caruntā kadi ṅuni, ma, Om̐ devācara ve namaḥ, viṣṇu devā ya svaha || yaniṁ kapitu, riṁ piṁ tiga vlas, amr̥ttamaśanya, bratanya tuṅgal kadi ṅūni, saṁ hyaṁ manasija devatanya, bratanya, åṅrakā, phalanya sugiḥ kedhәp, kātkan siṁ sinadyanta, caru kadi ṅūni, mantra stutinira, Om̐ bāruṇā devā mr̥tta tvaṁ, trayodaśya namostute, mamocya sarvva papebhyā, rudrālokaṁ sagacchati. Åturakna carunta kadi ṅūni, ma, Om̐ devācara ve nāmaḥ, rūdrā devāta ya svaha || yaniṁ vulan kavolu, piṁ ro åmr̥ttamāśanya, brata tuṅgal kadi ṅūni, saṁ hyaṁ anaṅga devatanya, bratanya, ayva maṅan suku paṭ, phalanya sugiḥ patik vnaṁ, caru kadi ṅūni, mantra stutinira, Om̐ vivāśvandevā mr̥tta tvaṁ, dvitiyaccha namo stute, mamocyā sarvva pāpebhyā, sūryyālokaṁ sagacchati, aturakna carunta riṁ devā, ma, Om̐ devā cara ye namaḥ, sūryyā devāta ya svāha || yaniṁ vulan kasaṅa, riṁ piṁ ṅәnәm amr̥ttamasanya, brata tuṅgal kadi ṅūni, saṁ hyaṁ ravi devatanya, ayva maṅan āsu, phalanya pәkik rāspati, poliḥ prajurit, caru kadi ṅūni, mantra stutinira, Om̐ åṅśaḥ ve devā mr̥tta tvaṁ, ṣaṣtyāñceva nāmostute, mamoccha sarvva papebhyā, årkkalokaṁ, sagacchati, åtūrakna taṁ caru riṁ devā, mantra, Om̐ devācara ve namaḥ, årkkā devā ya svāha || yaniṁ vulan kaśapuluḥ, riṁ piṁ paṭ āmr̥ttamaśanya, saṁ hyaṁ brahmā devatanya, ayva ndәḷṁ ruhūr·, phalanya kinasihaniṁ hyaṁ, caru kadi ṅūni, māntra stutinira, Om̐ dāta devā mr̥tvaṁ, catūrttyantu namo stute, mamocyā sarvva papebhyā, brahmalokaṁ sagacchati, brata kadi ṅūni, haṅaturākna taṁ caru, ma, Om̐ devācara ve nāmaḥ, dhatr̥ devā ya nāmaḥ svāhva || yaniṁ vulan jyeṣṭā, riṁ piṁ limā amr̥ttamāśanya, brata kadi ṅuni, saṁ hyaṁ ekājaya hyaṁnya, bratanya, ayva ñampat, phalanya, kedhep mandi kcāpta, caru kadi ṅuni, mantra stutinira, Om̐ indra ve devāmr̥tta tvaṁ, pañcamyantu namo stute, mamocya sarvva pāpebhyā, indralokaṁ sagacchati, atūrakna carunta, ma, Om̐ devācara ve nāmaḥ, indra devā ya svaha || yaniṁ ṅulan sadha, riṁ pratipadha śuklā amr̥ttamaśanya, bratanya, tuṅgal kadi ṅuni, saṁ hyaṁ virāyoddha devatanya, bratanya, ayva turu lavan istrīnya, phalanya, ke……ḥ omahta || caru kadi ṅuni, mantra stutinira, Om̐ åryya madevā mr̥tta tvaṁ, pratipadha namo stute, mamocya sarvva pāpebhyo, årkkalokaṁ sagacchati. Haturakna carunta, mantra, Om̐ devācara ve namaḥ, årkkā devā ya svaha || yaniṁ vulan kaśa, riṁ piṁ sapuluḥ amr̥ttamasanya, bratanya, tuṅgal kadi ṅūni, saṁ hyaṁ virakusuma devatanya, bratanya, ayva maṅan phala buṅkaḥ, phalanya, sugiḥ anom, dr̥man avәvәkasan, caru tuṅgal kadi ṅūni, mantra stutinira, Om̐ bhāganaḥ devāmr̥tta tvaṁ, daśamyantu namo stute, mamocyā sarvva pāpebhyo, viśvalokaṁ sagacchati. Atūrakna caru, ma, Om̐ devācara ve namaḥ, bhaga deva ya svaha || yaniṁ vulan karo, riṁ piṁ pitu ama tka maśanya, bratanya kadi ṅūni, saṁ hyaṁ jaya kusuma devatanya, bratanya, ayva maṅan sapi, phalanya luputiṁ tuju tlu, dr̥man ātiven-iven, caru kadi ṅūni, mantra stutinira, Om̐ puṣyā ve devā mr̥tta tvaṁ, saptāmyantu namostute, mamocyā sarvva pāpebhyā, sūryyalokaṁ sagacchati. Aturakna carunta, Om̐ devācara ve nāma, puṣya deva ya svaha || yaniṁ vulan katiga, riṁ piṁ saṅa hamr̥ttamaśanya, brata kadi ṅuni, saṁ hyaṁ manobhāva devātanya, bratanya, ayva maṅan celeṁ, phalanya luputiṁ griṁ ṅāguṁ, caru kadi ṅuni, mantra stutinira, Om̐ parjjādyaḥ devā mr̥tta tvaṁ, nāvamyantu namostute, mamocyā sarvva pāpebhyā, indralokaṁ sagacchati, hatūrakna ya caruntā, ma, Om̐ devācara ve namaḥ, indra devā ya svāha ||0|| gnap ikaṁ brata samaṅkana, rva vlas vulan ri kalaniṁ kāhamr̥ttamaśanya, hamatighni, hiṁhanta phalanya, kapaṅguḥ denira saṁ maṅhanakәn brata, dirghyayuṣā paripūrṇna, riṁ dlāha maṅdadyakәn rātu viśeṣā, ayvā cavuḥ, yan kalaniṁ abrata ||0|| -->
.<!-- M nihan tiṅkahiṅ ābratā ri mr̥tta maśa, ṅa, hal̥kasā kittha hamati ghni, samaptā rahinā, mvaṁ caru saṛvva pavitra, tumpə̄ṁ putiḥ, papaṅgaṁ Iṭik, graṁ griḥ hantigan, sdhaḥ voḥ, rakā vovohan, pisaṁ kәmbaṁ dhūpa den asaṅkәp ||0|| nihan paṅvijiknya, yan riṁ vulan, ka, 4, pūṛṇnamā, stutinira riṁ saṅgaṛ, ma, Om̐ ṣṭace devā mr̥tṭatvaṃ, pūṛṇnama sinamostute, mamocya saṛvva pāpebhyaḥ, ta candrā leki gaccata, hāturakna carunta kadi ṅūni, ma, Om̐ deva sarave namaḥ, candrā deva ya svāhā||0|| yaniṁ vulan ka limā, til̥m, paṅastuti nira riṁ saṅgaṛ, ma, Om̐ mitridevā mr̥ttatvaṃ, Avamasya namostute, mamocya saṛvva pāpebhyoḥ, Aghna lokaṃ sagaccate, hatu rakna carunta kadi ṅuni, ma, Om̐ devācārave namaḥ, Aghni devā ya svāha ||0|| yaniṁ vulan ka nәm, taṁ, piṁ, 8, stuti nirā ri saṅgaṛ, ma, Om̐ kr̥ṣṇarava devāmr̥ttatvaṃ, mastamyantu nāmostute, mocya saṛvva pāpebhyoḥ, viṣṇu lokaṃ sagaccati, hatūrakna carunta kadi ṅuni, ma, Om̐ devā carāve namaḥ, rudrā deva ya svāhā ||0|| yaniṁ vulan kavolu, taṁ, piṁ, 2, stutinira riṁ saṅgaṛ, ma, Om̐ vivasvā deva mr̥tṭatvaṃ, dvāti yawonamostute, mamocya saṛvva pāpebhyoḥ, sūṛyya lokaṃ sagācati, hatūrakna carunta kadi ṅuni, ma, Om̐ devā carave nāmaḥ, sūṛyya devata ya namaḥ svahā ||0|| yaniṁ vulan kasaṅha, taṁ, piṁ, 4, stuti nira riṁ saṅgaṛ, ma, Om̐ Astu nateva mr̥tṭatvaṃ, ṣaṣṭyentevā namostute, mamocya saṛvva papebhyo, Aṣālokaṃ sagāccati, haturakna carunta kādi ṅūni, ma, Om̐ deva cārave namaḥ, Aṛkka deva ya svāhā ||0|| yaniṁ vulan ka daśa, taṁ, piṁ, 4, stuti nira riṁ saṅgaṛ, ma, Om̐ yagāvvei deva mr̥tṭatvaṃ, catūṛ dyantu nāmostute, mamocya saṛvva papebhyoḥ, brahma lokaṃ sagācati, hatūrakna carunta kadi ṅūni, ma, Om̐ deva carave namaḥ, datr̥deva ya svāhā ||0|| yaniṁ vulan jyeṣṭā, taṁ, piṁ, 5, stuti nira riṁ saṅgaṛ, ma, Om̐ Indrave devā mr̥tṭatvaṃ, pañcamyantu nāmostute, mamocya saṛvva pāpebhyoḥ, Indrā lokaṃ sagāccati, haturakna carunta kadi ṅuni, ma, Om̐ deva carave namaḥ, Indrā devā ya svāhā|| 0|| yaniṁ vulan sadā, taṁ, piṁ, 1, stuti nira riṁ saṅgaṛ, ma, Om̐ Aṛyyā madevā mr̥tṭatvaṃ, pratipadi nāmostute, mamocya saṛvva pāpebhyoḥ, Aṣṭa lokaṃ sagāccati, hatūrakna carūnta kadi ṅūni, ma, Om̐ deva carāve namaḥ, Arkkā de vā ya svāhā||0|| yaniṁ vulan kaṣā, taṁ piṁ, 10, stuti nira riṁ saṅgaṛ, ma, Om̐ bhaghanā deva mr̥tṭatvaṃ, bhaṣamyantu nāmostute, mamocya saṛvva pāpebhyo, sūṛyya lokaṃ sagāccanti,, hatūrakna carunta kadi ṅuni, ma, Om̐ deva carāve namaḥ, bhaghanā deva ya svāhā ||0|| yaniṁ vulan karo, taṁ, piṁ, 7, stutinira riṁ saṅgaṛ, ma, Om̐ puṣya dve devā mr̥tṭa tvaṃ, saptā myantu nāmostute, mamocya saṛvva pāpebhyo, sūṛyya lokaṃ sagāccatti, hatūrakna carunta kaddi ṅūni, ma, Om̐ devā cararave namaḥ, puṣya devā ya svahā ||0|| yaniṁ vulan katigā, taṁ, 9, stutinira riṁ saṅgaṛ, ma, Om̐ sājjadyaḥ devā mr̥tṭatvaṃ, nava santu nāmostute, mamocya saṛvva pāpebhyo, Indrā lokaṃ sagāccati, hatūrakna carunta kadi ṅūni, ma, Om̐ deva carave namaḥ, Indrā deva ya svāhā ||0|| gnәp tiṅkahiṁ bratā samaṅkanā, rva vlas vulan kala niṁ hamr̥tta masa hamate ghni, kapaṅgiḥ de saṁ haṅanakәn bratā, dīrggha yuṣa, paripūṛṇna, riṁ dlāha mandādi ratu viśeṣā, hayva cavuḥ yan kala niṅ habratā, tlas, sma ta bratāṅkәna mravani siṁ pravani, Utamā dahat, tuhā gana ta ya bāratā, byakta tuṣṭātmakā saṁ piṭara nirā, tka riṁ kāki buyut īra suka, nītya sukātma ka vaneḥ, Ika ta den agatikna ddheniṅ amaṅunāyu niṁ śarirātma -->
1950
.<!-- N nihan tiṅkahiṁ habratā riṁ mr̥tta maśā, ṅa, halǝkasa kita hamati ghni, samaptā rahinā, mvaṁ caru sāṛvva pavitra, tumpə̄ṁ putiḥ, papaṅgaṁ Iṭik, graṁ gri hāntigā, sḍaḥ voḥ, rakā vovohan , pisaṅ kǝmbaṁ, ḍūpā den asaṅkǝp||0|| nihan paṅvijinyā, yan riṁ vulan , ka, 4, puṛṇnamā, stuti nira riṁ saṅgar·, ma, Om̐ ṣṭacedevamr̥ttatvaṃ, puṛṅnamā si namostute, mamocyā saṛvva papebhyoḥ, ta candrā leki gaccata. Hatuṛakna carunta kadi ṅūni, ma, Om̐ deva carave namaḥ, candrā deva ya svāhā||0|| yaniṁ vulan , kalīma, tīlǝm , paṅastunira riṁ saṅgar , ma, Om̐ mitri deva mr̥ttatvaṃ, Avamasya namostute, mamocya saṛvva papebhyoḥ, Aghnalokaṃ sagaccate. saṛvva papebbhyoḥ, brahma lokaṃ sagacāti|| hatuṛakna carunta kadi ṅūni, ma, Om̐ deva carave namaḥ, ḍatr̥ deva ya svāhā||0|| yaniṁ vulan jyeṣṭa, ta ṅgal piṁ, 5, stutinira riṁ saṅgar, ma, Om̐ Indrāve deva mr̥tṭatvaṃ·, mañcamyāntu namostute, mamocya saṛvva papebhyo, Indralokaṃ sagaccati|| hatuṛakna carunta kadi ṅūnī, ma, Om̐ deva cārave namaḥ, Indra deva ya svāhā||0/ yaniṁ vulan sadḍā, taṁ, piṁ, 1, stutinirā riṁ saṅgaṛ, ma, Om̐ Aṛyya madeva mr̥tṭatvaṃ, praṭipadī namostute, mamocya saṛvva papebhyo, Aṣṭalokaṃ sagaccati. hatuṛakna carunta kadi ṅūni, ma, Om̐ de va carave namaḥ, Arkkā deva ya navaṣyantu namostute, mā moccya saṛvva papebhyo, Indrā lokaṃ sagaccati|| hatuṛakna carunta kadi ṅūni, ma, Om̐ deva carave namaḥ, Indrā devā ya svāhā||0|| gnǝp tiṅkahiṁ bratā samaṅkana, rva vlas vulan .<!-- P nihan tiṅkahiṁ habratā riṁ mr̥ta maṣā hal̥kasa kitā hamati gәni, samapta rahinā. mvaṁ caru saṛvva pavitra, tumpәṁ putiḥ papaṅgaṁ hitik. gәraṁ griḥ, hantigā, sәdaḥ voḥ kavovohan. pisaṁ kәmbaṁ, dupa denāsaṅkәp ||0|| nyan paṅriñcinya, yan riṁ hulan kapat, pūṛṇnammmā. stutinira riṁ taṅgal, ma, Om̐ haṣṭā cedeva mr̥tatvaṃ, pūṛṇnama sināmostute, mamocya saṛvva papebhyaḥ, candra lekaṃ sagacati. haturākna carunta kādi ṅūni, ma, Ōm̐ devā carave namaḥ, candrā deva ya svahā. yan riṁ hulan, ka, 5, til̥m, paṅastutunira riṁ saṅgaṛ, ma, Ōm̐ mitrita devā prathanuṃtvaṃ, hamavasyā namostute, mamoca saṛvva papebhyaḥ, viṣṇu lokaṃ sagacati. haturakna carunta kādi ṅūni, riṁ deva, ma, Ōm̐ deva carave namaḥ, viṣṇu deva ya svahā. yan riṁ vulan kapitu taṅgal piṁ tlulas, stutinira riṁ saṅgaṛ, ma, Ōm̐bharaṇa deva mr̥tatvaṃ, trayodhaṃ namostute, mamocya saṛvva papebhyoḥ, rudra lokaṃ sagacati. haturākna carunta kādi ṅūni, ma,Ōm̐ deva rudrā deva ya svahā||0|| yan riṁ vulan kavulu taṅgal pindo, stutinira riṁ saṅgaṛ, ma, Ōm̐ vivāśva mratatvaṃ, dvityā ve namostute, mamocya saṛvva papebhyoḥ, sūṛyya lokaṁ sagacati. haturakna carunta kādi ṅūni, ma, Ōm̐ deva caraya ve namaḥ, sūṛyya devata ya svahā||0|| yaniṁ vulan kasaṅā taṅgal piṁ nәm stutinira riṁ saṅgāṛ, ma, Ōm̐ hastu nātha deva hamratatvaṃ, saṁ ptyen heva namostute, mamoca saṛvva papebhyoḥ, hata lokaṃ sagacati. haturākna carunta kādi ṅūni, ma, Ōm̐ deva carave namaḥ svahā||0|| yan riṁ vulan kadaśa taṅgal piṁ pat, stutinira riṁ saṅgaṛ, ma, Ōm̐ ya gave deva hamr̥tatvaṃ, catuṛ dyantu namostute, mamocyā saṛvva papebhyoḥ, brahmā lokaṃ saṅgacati. haturākna carunta kādi ṅūni, ma, Ōm̐ deva carave namaḥ, cakra deva ya svahā||0|| yaniṁ vulan jyeṣṭā taṅgal piṁ lima, stutinira riṁ saṅgaṛ, ma, Ōm̐ Indra deva ya mr̥tatvaṃ, pañcamyantu namostute, mamocya saṛvva papebhyo, Indra lokaṃ saṅgacati. haturākna carunta kādi ṅūni, ma, Ōm̐ deva carave namaḥ, Indra deba yā svahā||0|| yaniṁ vulan saddhā taṅgal hapisan, stutinira riṁ saṅgaṛ. ma, Ōm̐ harya madeva ya mr̥tatvaṃ, pratipadha namostute, mamocya saṛvva papebhyo haṣṭa lokaṃ sagacati. haturakna carunta kāni ṅūni, ma, Ōm̐ deva carave namaḥ, haṛkka deva ya svahā||0|| yaniṁ vulan kaṣā taṅgal piṁ daśā, stutinira riṁ saṅgaṛ, ma, Ōm̐ bhagana deva mr̥tatvaṃ, bha śamyāntu namostute, mamoca saṛvva papebhyo, sūṛyya lokaṃ sagacati. haturākna carunta kādi ṅūni, ma, Ōm̐ devacara ve namaḥ, bhagaṇa deva ya svahā||0|| yaniṁ vulan karo taṅgal piṁ pitu, stutinira riṁ saṅgāṛ, ma, Ōm̐ puṣpa dve deva mr̥tātvaṃ, saptamyantu namostute, mamoccya saṛvva papebhyo, sūṛyya lokaṃ sagacati. haturākna carunta kādi ṅūni, ma, Ōm̐ deva carave namaḥ, puṣpa deva ya svahā. yaniṁ vulan katigā taṅgal piṁ saṅā, stutinira riṁ saṅgaṛ, ma, Ōm̐ sajja dyaḥ deva mratatvaṃ, nāmasyantu namostute, mamocya saṛvva papebhyo, Indra lokaṃ sagacati. haturaknacarunta kādi ṅūni, ma, Ōm̐ deva carave namaḥ, puṣpa deva ya svahā||0|| gәnәpniṁ tiṅkaḥniṁ brata, samaṅkana rva vәlas vulan kalaniṁ hamr̥ta maṣa, hamati gәnine saṁ haṅanakākәn brata, diṛgha yuṣa paripūṛṇna, ri dlahan mandadi ratu śakti maviśeṣa, hayva cavuḥ kālaniṁ yan habratā -->
.<!-- U nihan tingkah iṁṅ abrata riṁṅ amrata māṣa, ṅa, haṅkәsakәn kita hāmati gni, samapṭā rahina, mvaṁ caru saṛvva pavitra, tumpәṁ putiḥ, papaṅgāṁaṅ itik graṁ griḥ hantiga, sdaḥ voḥ rakā vovohan, pisaṁ kәmbāṁ, dhupa den asaṅkәp. nihan paṅuvijinya, yaniṁ vulan, ka, 4,pūrṇnama, stuti nira riṁ saṅgar·, ma, Om̐ tvasta cedevā mr̥tatvam, pūrṇnama si namostute, mamoccya saṛvva pāpebhyo, candra leka sagaścati. haturakna carunta kadi ṅuni, ma, Om̐ deva caru ve namaḥ, candra deva ya svāhā. yeniṁ vulan ka lima, til̥m, paṅustitinira riṁ saṇgaṛ, ma, Om̐ mitrita devāmr̥tatvam, Amavasya namostute, mamocchya saṛvva pāpebhyo, aghni lokam sagaścati. hāturakna caruntā kādi ṅūni, ma, Om̐ devā caru ve namaḥ, Agni devā ya svāhā. yaniṁ vulan ka nәm, taṁ, piṁ, 8, stuti nira riṁ saṅgār·, ma, Om̐ kr̥ṣṇa ravadevā mr̥tatvaṃ, Aṣṭām yantu namostute, mamoccya saṛvvā pāpebyā, viṣṇu lokaṃ sagaścati. aturakna caruntā kadi ṅūni, ma, Om̐ devā carave namaḥ, viṣṇu devā ya svahā. yaniṁ vulan ka pitu, taṁ, piṁ, tiga vlas, stuti nira riṁ saṅgār·, ma, Om̐ baruṇa devā mratatvam, trayodaśa namostute, mamoccyā sarvvā pāpebyo, rudr̥ lokaṃ sagaścati. aturakna caruntā kadi ṅuni, ma, Om̐ deva carave namaḥ, rudra deva ya svāhā. yaniṁ vulan ka volu, tang, piṁ, 2, stuti nira riṁ saṅgār·, ma, Om̐ vivaśva devā mr̥tatvaṃ, dvatiyeva namostute, mamoccya saṛvva pāpebhyā, sūṛyya lokam sagaścati. aturakna carunta kadi ṅuni, ma, Om̐ deva carave nama suryya devatā yasvāhā. yaniṁ vulan ka saṅa, tang, piṁ, 6, stuti nira riṁ saṅgar·, ma, Om̐ Astu katevāmr̥tatvaṃ, ṣaṣmyente va namostute, mamoccya saṛvva pāpebhyo, Arṭha lokaṃ sagaścati. aturakna carunta riṁ saṅgar kadi ṅuni, ma, Om̐ deva carave namaḥ, suryya devata ya svāhā. yaniṁ vulan ka daśa, tang, piṁ, 4, stuti nira riṁ saṅgar·, ma, Om̐ ya gave devā mratatvam, catur dyantu namostute, mamoccya saṛvva pāpebyo, brāhmā lokaṃ sagaścati. haturaknā carunta kadi ṅuni, ma, Om̐ deva carave namaḥ, dhatra deva ya svāhā. yaniṁ vulan jyeṣtha, taṁ, piṁ, 5, stuti nira riṁ saṅgar·, ma, Om̐ Indrave devā mr̥tatvam, pañcamyantu namo stute, mamocyya saṛvva papābhyo, Indra lokaṃ sagaścati. aturakna carunta kadi ṅūni riṁ deva , ma, Om̐ deva carave namaḥ, Indra deva ya svāhā. yaniṁ vulan sadda, taṁ, 1, stuti nira riṁ saṅgar·, ma, Om̐ Aṛyya madevā mr̥tatvaṃ, prati padi namo stute, mamoccya saṛvva pāpebhyo, Arṣṭālokaṃ sagaścati. haturakna carunta kadi ṅuni, ma, Om̐ devacarave, arṭha deva ya svāhā. yaniṁ vulan kasa, taṁ, piṁ, 10, stuti nira riṁ saṅgar·, ma, Om̐ bhavagan devā ya sthāmr̥tatvaṃ, daśimyuntu namo stute, mamoccya saṛvva pāpebhyo, suṛyya lokaṃ sagaścati. haturakna carunta kadi ṅuni, Om̐ deva carave namaḥ, bhāgana deva ya svāhā,. yaniṁ vulan karo taṅgal, piṁ, 7, stuti nira riṁ saṅgar·, ma, Om̐ puṣyadve devā mr̥tatvaṃ, saptamyantu namostute , mamoccya sarvvā pāpebhyo, sūṛyya lokaṃ sagaścati. haturakna carunta kadi ṅuni, ma, Om̐deva carave namaḥ, puṣya deva ya svāhā. yaniṁ vulan ka tiga, taṁ, 9, stuti nira riṁ saṅgar·, ma, Om̐ ṣarjja dyaḥ devā mr̥tatvaṃ, navaṣyantu namo stute, mamoccyā saṛvva pāpebyo, Indra lokaṃ sagaścati. haturakna caruntā kadi ṅūni riṁ devā, ma, Om̐ deva carave namaḥ, Indra deva ya svāhā. Om̐ diṛgghāyur āstu, tat astu, Astu. gnap tiṅkah iṁ brāta maṅkana, rva vlas vulan kāla niṁ amr̥ta māsa, hamāti gni, kapaṅgiḥ de saṁ haṅanakәn brata, dirgghā yuṣa paripūrṇna, riṁ dlahan maṅdadi ratu viśeṣā, hayva cahuḥ yan kākāla niṁṅ abrata|-->
.
1955
.<p n="III.67">nihan tiṅkahiṅ abrata riṅ mrәtta maśā, ṅa, halǝkasa kita hamati ghni, samaptā rahinā, mvaṅ caru sarvapavitra, tumpə̄ṅputih, papaṅgaṅ Iṭik, graṅ gri hāntiga, sәḍah voh, rakā vovohan, pisaṅ kǝmbaṅ, dhūpā den asaṅkǝp. nihan paṅvijinyā,</p>
.
.<p><lb n="1"/>riṅ vulan, ka, 4, purṇnamā, stuti nira riṅ saṅgar, ma, Om̐ ṣṭacedevamrәttatvaṃ, purṅnamā sinamostute, mamocyā sarvapapebhyoh, ta candrā leki gaccata. haturakna carunta kadi ṅūni, ma, Om̐ deva carave namah, candrā deva ya.</p>
.
1960<p><lb n="2"/>yaniṅ vulan, kalīma, tīlǝm, paṅastunira riṅ saṅgar, ma, Om̐ mitri deva mrәttatvaṃ, Avamasya namostute, mamocya sarva papebhyoh, Aghnalokaṃ sagaccate. hatūrakna carunta kadi kadi ṅūnī, ma, Om̐ deva carave namah, Aghni deva ya.</p>
.
.<p><lb n="3"/>yaniṅ vulan ka nǝm, taṅgal piṅ, 8, stuti nira riṅ saṅgar, ma, Om̐ krәṣṇā ravā deva mrәtṭvam, Aṣṭāmyantu namostute, mamocya sarva papebhyoh, viṣṇu lokaṃ sagāccati. haturakna carunta kadi ṅūni, ma, Om̐ deva carave namah, viṣṇu devā ya svāhā.</p>
.
.<p><lb n="4"/>yaniṅ vulan kapitu, taṅ piṅ, 13, stutinira riṅ saṅgar, ma, Om̐ baruṇā deva mrәtvam, trayodāmna namostute, mamocya sarva papebhyoh, ṅudra lokaṃ sagaccāte. haturakna carunta kādī ṅūnī, ma, Om̐ deva cārave namah, rudra deva ya svāhā.</p>
1965
.<p><lb n="5"/>yaniṅ vulan kavolu, taṅ, piṅ, 2, stutinira riṅ saṅgar, ma, Om̐ vivasvā deva mrәttatvam, dvātiyeva namostute, mamocya sarva papebhyo, sūryyalokaṃ sagaccate. haturakna carunta kadi ṅūni, ma, Om̐ deva carāve namah, suryyā devata ya namah svāhā.</p>
.
.<p><lb n="6"/>yaniṅ vulan kasaṅā, taṅ, piṅ, 6, stutīnira ri saṅgār, ma, Om̐ Astu nā teva mrәtṭatvaṃ, pāṣṭyente vānamostute, mamocya sarva papebhyo, Athalokaṃ sagaccati. haturakna carunta kadi ṅūnī, Om̐ deva caraveiya namah, Arkkā deva ya.</p>
.
1970<p><lb n="6"/>yaniṅ vulan kadaśa, tāṅ, piṅ, 4, stutinira riṅ saṅgar, ma, Om̐ yāgave deva mrәttatavam, catur ddhyantu namostute, mamocya sarva papebbhyoh, brahma lokaṃ sagacāti. haturakna carunta kadi ṅūni, ma, Om̐ deva carave namah, dhatrә deva ya.</p>
.
.<p><lb n="7"/>yaniṅ vulan jyeṣṭa, taṅgal piṅ, 5, stutinira riṅ saṅgar, ma, Om̐ Indrāve deva mrәtṭatvaṃ, mañcamyāntu namostute, mamocya sarva papebhyo, I ndralokaṃ sagaccati. haturakna carunta kadi ṅūnī, ma, Om̐ deva cārave namah, Indra deva ya.</p>
.
.<p><lb n="8"/>yaniṅ vulan saddhā, taṅ, piṅ, 1, stutinirā riṅ saṅgar, ma, Om̐ Aryya madeva mrәtṭatvaṃ, praṭipadī namostute, mamocya sarva papebhyo, Aṣṭalokaṃ sagaccati. haturakna carunta kadi ṅūni, ma, Om̐ deva carave namah, Arkkā deva ya svāhā. yaniṅ vulan kaṣā, taṅ, piṅ, 10, stutinira riṅ saṅgar, ma, Om̐ bhaghā na devā mrәtṭattvaṃ, bhaṣāmyantu namostute, mamocya sarva papebhyo, sūryya lokaṃ sagaccati. haturākna carunta kadi ṅūni, ma, Om̐ deva carave namah, bhaghana deva ya.</p>
1975
.<p><lb n="9"/>yaniṅ vulan karo, taṅ, piṅ, 7, stutinira riṅ saṅgar, ma, Om̐ puṣya dvei deva mrәtṭatvaṃ, sapta myantu nāmostute, mamocya sarva papebhyo, sūryyālokaṃ sagaccāti. haturakna carunta kadi ṅūni, ma, Om̐ deva carave namah, puṣya deva ya.</p>
.
.<p><lb n="10"/>yaniṅ vulan ka tiga, taṅgal piṅ, 9, stutinira riṅ saṅgar, ma, Om̐ ṣajjā dyah deva mrәṭṭatvaṃ, navaṣyantu namostute, māmoccya sarva papebhyo, Indrā lokaṃ sagaccati. haturakna carunta kadi ṅūni, ma, Om̐ deva carave namah, Indrā devā ya.</p>
.
1980<p>gnǝp tiṅkahiṅ brata samaṅkana, rva vlas vulan, kalaniṅ hamrәtta maśa, Amati ghni,kapaṅgih de saṅ haṅanakǝn brata, dīrgghā yuṣa paripurṇna, riṅ dlāha, mandadi ratu viśeṣā, hayva cavuh yan kalaniṅ ābrattta, tlas, smā, tabrataṅkǝna mravani siṅ pravani, Uttamā dahat, tuhvā gana ta ya bharaṭā, byakta tuṣṭātmakāsaṅ pitārannirā, təka rīṅ kaki buyutira suka, nītya sukātmaka vaneh, Ika ta den agatiniṅ amaṅun ayuniṅ śarīrātma.
.<app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>
. <note> nihan tiṅkahiṁ habratā ... ayuniṁ śarīrātma <note>
. </note>
. <ptr target="#G"/> in III.89 <ptr target="#M"/> in III.67 <ptr target="#N"/> in III.67 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.141 <ptr target="#U"/> in III.61 </note>
1985</app>
.</p>
.
.
.<!-- G hana brāta adyus anuṅkura, ṅa, yaniṁ śravaṇamāsa, ådyus davuḥ, 7, pisan, riṁ sore, phalanya, hulun masiḥ ri kita. Yaniṁ bhadravada, ådyus da{vuh}….. phalanya, kasubhagan. Yaniṁ ṅasuji, ådyus dhavuḥ, 5, phalanya, sarvva salaka tkā. 1990
.<!-- M hana bratā hadyus hanuṅku rāt, ṅa, yaniṁ śravaṇa maśa, hadyusā dhavuḥ, 7, pisan riṁ sore, pha, hulun masihi ri kittha|| yan riṁ bhadravadā, hadyusā dhavu ḥ, 4, kasubhāgā nuṅku rāt|| yaniṅāsuji hādyusā dhavuḥ, 5, pha, saṛvva salaka tka|| yaniṁ kāṛttikā, hadyusa dhavuḥ. 8, pha, bavu putra|| yaniṁ māṛggā sirā, hadyusā dhavuḥ, 4, riṁ ratri, pha, prabhū masiḥ|| yaniṁ poṣya masa, hadyusā dhavuḥ, 6, sore, pha, viṛyyavan|| yaniṁ magā masa, hadyusa dhavuḥ, 8, vaṅun rahina jugā, pha, sugiḥ pari|| yaniṁ phalgunā maśā, hadyusa dhavuḥ, 2, rahinā, pha, bhoga gə̄ṁ tmu|| yaniṁ cetra māśa, hadyusā dhavuḥ, 3, rahinā, pha, devā masiḥ saṛvva kaṛyyanta siddha|| yaniṁ veśakā masa, madyusā dhavuḥ, 4, pha, laraniṅ hati hilaṁ|| yaniṁ jyeṣṭā, hadyuṣā dhavuḥ, 4, pha, siṁ kaṛyyanta katkan|| yaniṁ hāsadā masa, madyuśa dhavuḥ, 7, pha, hañjrahakәn mās pi rak, maṅkana kramanya|| Iti śarīra śuddha bhūmi socca, ṅa|| -->
.
.<!-- N hana bratā hadyus hanuṅku rāt, ṅa, yan riṁ śravaṇā maṣā, hadyusā davuḥ, 7, pisa n riṁ sore, pha, hulun masihi ri kitthā|| yan riṁ bhadravadā, hadyusā davuḥ, 4, pha, kasubhagā nuṅku rāt|| yaniṅ hasuji, hadyusā ḍavuḥ, 5, pha, saṛvva salaka tkā|| yaniṁ kaṛttikā, hadyusā ḍavuḥ, 8, riṁ ratri, pha, bahu putra|| yan riṁ maṛgghā sirā, hadyusā davuḥ, 4, riṁ ratri, pha, prabhū masiḥ|| yaniṁ poṣya maśa, hadyusa davuḥ, 6, sore, pha, viṛyyavan || yaniṁ maghā maṣā, hadyusa davuḥ, 8, vaṅun rahina jugā, pha, sugiḥ pari|| yaniṁ phalguṇa maṣā, hadyusā davuḥ, 2, rahina, pha, bhoga gə̄ṅ katmu|| yaniṁ cetra maśa, madyusa davuḥ, 3, rahina, pha, devā masiḥ saṛvva kaṛyyanta sidḍa|| yaniṁ veśaka maṣā, madyusa ḍavuḥ, 4, pha, laraniṅāti hilaṁ|| yaniṁ jyeṣṭā, hadyusā ḍavuḥ, 4, pha, siṁ kaṛyyanta katkan || yaniṁ hasadḍa maśa, madyusā davuḥ, 7, pha, hañjrahakǝn mās pirak, maṅkāna kramanya|| Itī śarīra śudḍa, bhūmi socca, ṅa-->
.
1995<!-- P hana bratā dyus hañuṅku rāt, ṅa, yaniṁ śravana masā hadyus davuḥ, 7, riṁ sore, phalanya hulun māsiḥ hiri kitā. yaning badravada hadyus davuḥ, 4, lanya kaṁ subhāgan. yaniṁ hasucji, dyus davuḥ, 5, phalanya, saṛvva salakā tәka. yaniṁ kaṛttikā hadyus davuḥ, 8, riṁ ratri, phalanya bahu putra mvaṁ mās pirak kapaṅgiḥ, maṅkana kramanya||0|| Iti sarasuddha, bhūmi suddha, ṅa. Iti saṁ hyaṁ tatva bratā, vnaṁ kayatnakna de saṁ sevaka dhaṛmma, saṁ hamet kasiddhān, hamahayvaniṁ śariranirā, marapvān kapaṅgiḥ sukanta maṅke mvaṁ tәmbenta. hana brata naraśvati,ṅa, tan paṅan sәkul hinikiran, kevalya tumpәṁ jugā, tan pahivak, kevala huyaḥ jugā, satavun tigaṁ lek ṣamayanya, ma, Ōm̐ rāja lakṣmya namaḥ, pamit. phalanya tәka guṇna mvaṁ siddha saprayojñānanta tәhәṛ subhaga kita mvaṁ sihaniṁ malakya marabi. yaniṁ maṛgga sira madyus davuḥ, 4, riṁ ratri, phalanya prabhu masiḥ. yaniṁ poṣya davuḥ, 6 sore, phalanya viṛyyavan. yaniṁ magha madyus davuḥ, 8, vaharahinā guṇa, phalanya sugiḥ pari kitā. yaniṁ phalguṇa madyus davuḥ, 2, rahinā phalanya deva masiḥ, saṛvva siddha kāṛyyanta. yaniṁ vesaka madyus davuḥ, 4, phalanya, laraniṁ hati hilaṁ denya. yaniṁ jyeṣṭā madyus davuḥ, 4. yaniṁ hasaddha madyus davuḥ, 7. phalanya, haṅajakәn bagya. -->
.
.<!-- U hana brāta hadyus hanuṅkurāt, yen iṁ śravaṇa māsa, hadyusa dhavuḥ pitu, pisān riṁ sore, pha, hulun masiḥi ri kita. yaniṁ bhadravāda, hadyusa dhavuḥ pāt, pha, kasubhāgan. yan iṁṅ asuji, hadyusa dhavuḥ lima, pha, saṛvva slaka tkā. yan iṁ kaṛtṭikā, hadyusa dhavuḥ volu, riṁratri, pha, bāhu putra. yan iṁ mārgga śira, hadyusā dhavuḥ phat riṁ ratri, pha, saṁ prabhū masiḥ. yan iṁ poṣya māsa, hadyusa dhavuḥ nәm sore, pha, viryyavān. yan iṁ maghā māsa, hadyusa dhavuḥ volu, vaṅun rahina juga, pha, sugiḥ pari. yan iṁ phalguṇa, madyusā dhavuḥ ro, rahina, pha, bhoga katmu. yan iṁ cetra mādyusā, mādyusā, mādyusa dhavuḥ tiga rahina, pha, devā masiḥ, mvaṁ svakāṛyyanta kasidda. yan i veśaka māsa, madyusa dhavuḥ pāt, pha, lara niṁ hati hilaṁ. yan iṁ jyeṣṭā, madyusa dhavuḥ pāt, pha, yan iṁ asiṁ katkan kaṛyyanta. yan iṁ asadda, madyusā dhavuḥ pitu, pha, aṁjrahakәnmās pirak. maṅkāna kramanya -->
.
.
2000
.
.<p n="III.68">hana brata hadyus hanuṅku rāt, ṅa,</p>
.<p>yan riṅ śravaṇā maṣā, hadyusā davuh, 7, pisan riṅ sore, pha, hulun masihi ri kita.</p>
.<p>yan riṅ bhadravadā, hadyusā davuh, 4, pha, kasubhaganuṅku rāt.</p>
2005<p>yaniṅ hasuji, hadyusā dhavuh, 5, pha, sarva salaka tkā.</p>
.<p>yaniṅ karttikā, hadyusā dhavuh, 8, riṅ rātri, pha, bahuputra.</p>
.<p>yan riṅ margghā sira, hadyusā davuh, 4, riṅ rātri, pha, prabhu masih.</p>
.<p>yaniṅ poṣya maśa, hadyusa davuh, 6, sore, pha, viryyavan.</p>
.<p>yaniṅ maghā maṣā, hadyusa davuh, 8, vaṅun rahina juga, pha, sugih pari.</p>
2010<p>yaniṅ phalguṇa maṣā, hadyusā davuh, 2, rahina, pha, bhoga gə̄ṅ katәmu.</p>
.<p>yaniṅ cetra maśa, madyusa davuh, 3, rahina, pha, devā masih sarva kāryanta siddha.</p>
.<p>yaniṅ veśaka maṣā, madyusa dhavuh, 4, pha, laraniṅāti hilaṅ.</p>
.<p>yaniṅ jyeṣṭā, hadyusā dhavuh, 4, pha, siṅ kāryanta katəkan.</p>
.<p>yaniṅ hasaddha maśa, madyusā davuh, 7, pha, hañjrahakǝn mās pirak, maṅkāna kramanya.</p>
2015<p>Itī śarīra śuddha, bhūmi socca, ṅa.
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>
. <note> hana bratā hadyus ... bhūmi socca, ṅa <note>
. </note>
. <ptr target="#G"/> in III.57 <ptr target="#M"/> in III.68 <ptr target="#N"/> in III.68 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.55 <ptr target="#U"/> in III.66 </note>
2020</app>
.</p>
.
.
.<!-- G || ka, 2, tan pamaṅan sapi, polihnya, luput riṁ griṁ sasab, || ka, 3, tan paṅan bavi, polihnya luput riṁ ṅapuṁ || ka, 4, tan pamaṅan roṇḍon, polihnya, daḍdhi siṁ tinandur· || ka, 5, yen aluluṅa tan paṅinәp, polihnya, sugiḥ dr̥vyā riṁ padhaṅan, mvaṁ rare hulun || ka, 6, tan pamәṅ iṁ rare, polihnya, dr̥man ahanak || ka, 7, aṅraka, polihnya, apkik tūr śugiḥ pari || ka, 8, tan pamaṅan va…. polihnya, sugiḥ vnaṁ-vnaṁ || ka, 8, tan pamaṅan asu, polihnya, abckik iṁ mahakon, ayu pkik, luputiṁ tuju tluḥ || ka, 10, tan tumәṅeṅ laṅit, polihnya, ha…..… pahakon, thәr darggāyuṣā, tan āna vani || jyeṣṭā, aṅlavar·, polihnya, kedhapa savinuvus, labḍa va……da, tan paturu lavan stri, polihnya, dr̥man omahhe || -->
2025
.<!-- M hana bratā ṅulante, ṅa, hamilaṁ vulan, kaṣa, tan pamaṅan saṛvva buṅkaḥ, pha, dadi saṛvva tinanduṛ|| vulan, 2, tan pamaṅan sapi, pha, sugiḥ sapi, tan kagәriṅә n,|| vulan, 3, tan pamaṅañ celeṁ, pha, sugiḥ vvit, tan gәriṅāguṁ, halaṅalaṁ|| vulan, 4, tan pamaṅan saṛvva rondon, pha, dadi saṛvva rumambat, saṛvva gumantuṁ|| vulan, 5, tan patukāṛ, tan panәmbuṁ rare sili, pha, kedәp mavkā paṅucapta|| vulan, 6, tan paluluṅha, tulak vali yan luṅa, pha, sugiḥ kavula vr̥ddhi yakeḥ|| vulan, 7, tan pamaṅan sgā, pha, sugiḥ pari tan kakuraṅan tajak|| vulan, 8, haja maṅan ṣuku pat, pha, sugi ḥ duve saṛvva tәdə̄|| vulan, 9, haja maṅan añjiṁ, pha, hapkik tan pahes|| vulan, 10, tan tumṅeṁ tavaṁ, pha, prajñan kittha|| vulan, jyeṣṭa, tan pamaṅana gar̥m, pha, sugiḥ bhumi, tan hilaṁ takonaknā, tuṛ kedhәp kapintu hu|| vulan saddhā, tan paturu lavan istri, histri tan paturu lavan lanaṁ, pha, dr̥man alaki, kinasihaniṁ lanaṁ, lanaṁ kinasiha niṁ vvadon, tūr̥ kedәp sapaṅucapta-->
.
.<!-- N hana bratta ṅulante, ṅa, hamilan vulan , kaṣa, tan pamaṅan saṛvva buṅkaḥ, pha, dadi saṛvva tinandur·|| vulan , 2, tan pamaṅan sapi, pha, sugiḥ sapi, tan kagǝriṅǝn,|| vulan , 3, tan pamaṅañ celeṁ, pha, sugiḥ vvit, tan gǝriṅ āguṁ, halaṅ halaṁ|| vulan , 4, tan pamaṅam sāṛvva roṇḍon , pha, dadi saṛvva rumambat, saṛvva gumantuṁ|| vulan , 5, tan patukar·, tan panǝmbuṁ rare cili, pha, keḍǝp havkasa paṅūcapta|| vulan , 6, tan paluluṅha, tulak vali, yen luṅha, pha, sugiḥ kavulā, vr̥dḍi kabeḥ tuṛ ākeḥ|| vulan , 7, tan pamaṅan sgā, pha, sugiḥ pari, tan kakuraṅan tajak|| vulan , 8, haja maṅan suku phat, pha, sugiḥ dr̥vve sarvǝ vḍa|| vulan , 9, haja maṅan āñjiṁ, pha, hapkik tan pahes || vu lan , 10, tan tumṅeṁ tavaṁ, pha, prajñān kitthā|| vulan , jyeṣṭa, tan pamaṅan gar̥m , pha, sugiḥ bhūmi, tan ilaṁ takonakna, tuṛ keḍǝp kapintuhu|| vulan , sadḍā, tan paturū lavan strī, histri tan paturu lavan lanaṁ, pha, dr̥mmam hala ki, kinasihaniṁ lanaṁ, lanaṁ kinasihaniṁ vadon , tuṛ keḍǝp sapaṅucapta -->
.
2030<!-- P hana brata haniti vulan, ṅa, kramanya, vulan kaṣa tan kavaṣā hamaṅan saṛvva buṅkāḥ. hulan karo tan kavasa hamaṅan sapi.0 katiga, tan kavasa hamaṅan bavi||0|| kapat. tan kavasa hamaṅan saṛvva rondon||0|| kalimā, tan kavasa haṅinәp riṁ paluṅayan||0|| kanәm, haja mәṅiṁ rare. kapitu tan kavasa hamaṅan saṛvva vijā kevala saṛvva phala bhuktinәn||0|| kavolu, tan kavasa hamaṅan suku pat||0|| kasaṅa tan kavasa hamaṅan hasu.0.kadaśa.tan kavasa nәṅeṁ hakaśa||0|| jyeṣṭa, hajā haturiṁ histri, yan histri haja haturu riṁ kakuṁ||0|| hasadhā, hayvaha tumuṅkuliṁ pr̥thivi. phalanya siṁ tinanduṛ dadi mvaṁ siṁ hiṅiṅon dadi luputiṁ griṁ haguṁ, kedhәpiṁ hanakānak, halaki rabi kinatoṅa:n, tan hamaṅgiḥ maru, sugiḥ dlahā, tan kelaṅan tan pavicara tuṛ kinasihan padhanta janmā mvaṁ kinasihan tuvan mvaṁ kavivicakṣaṇa, kinasihan deniṁ paṇdhita, vraddhi putrā, bavu vaṛggā diṛgha yuṣa -->
.
.<!-- U hana bratā ṅulaṇṭeṁ,ṅa, hamilaṁ vulān, kasa, tan pamaṅan saṛvva bungkah, pha, dadi kang saṛvva tinandur, vulan, ka, 2, tan pamaṅan sapi, pha, sugi sapi, tan gәgәriṅәn. vulan, ka, 3, tan pamaṅan celeṁ, pha, sugiḥvit, tan griṁṅ aguṁ, mvaṁ halala. vulan, ka, 4, tān amaṅan sāṛvvā ron don, pha, dadi kaṁ sāṛvvā rumambat, mvaṁ phala gantuṁ. vulan, ka, 5, tan patukar tan pәmbaṁ rare cili, pha, pha, kedhәp havka paṅucape. vulan, ka, 6, tan aluluṁṅha tulak vali, yen huluṅhā, pha, sugiḥ kavula vr̥ddi akeḥ. vulan, ka, 7, tan pamaṅan sgā, pha, sugiḥ riṁ tan kakuraṅan tajak. vulan, ka, 8, haja hamaṅan suku phat, pha, sugiḥ dr̥ve saṛvva vr̥ddi. vulan, ka, 9, hajā hamaṅan hañjiṁ, pha, hapkik tan pahesan. vulan, ka, 10, tan tumṅeṁ tavaṁ, pha, prajñān kitā. vulan, jyeṣṭā, tan pamaṅan gar̥m, pha, sugiḥ bhūmi, tān ilaṁ tākonakna, tūr kedhәp kapintuhu. vulan Asadda, tan paturu lavan istri, histri tan patūru lavan lanaṁ, pha, dr̥man malāki, kinasihānniṁ lānaṁ, lānaṁ kninasihan iṁ vadon, tūr kekedhәp sapaṅucaptā-->
.
.
2035<p n="III.69">hana brata ṅulante, ṅa, hamilan vulan,</p>
.<p>kaṣa, tan pamaṅan sarva buṅkah, pha, dadi sarva tinandur.</p>
.<p>vulan, 2, tan pamaṅan sapi, pha, sugih sapi, tan kagǝriṅǝn.</p>
.<p>vulan, 3, tan pamaṅañ celeṅ, pha, sugih vvit, tan gǝriṅ āguṅ, halaṅ halaṅ.</p>
.<p>vulan, 4, tan pamaṅam sarva roṇḍon, pha, dadi sarva rumambat, sarva gumantuṅ.</p>
2040<p>vulan, 5, tan patukar, tan panǝmbuṅ rare cili, pha, keḍәp havkasa paṅūcapta.</p>
.<p>vulan, 6, tan paluluṅha, tulak vali, yen luṅha, pha, sugih kavulā,vrәddhi kabeh tur ākeh.</p>
.<p>vulan, 7, tan pamaṅan sәga, pha, sugih pari, tan kakuraṅan tajak.</p>
.<p>vulan, 8, haja maṅan suku phat, pha, sugih drәvve sarvǝ vdha.</p>
.<p>vulan, 9, haja maṅan āñjiṅ, pha, hapkik tan pahes.</p>
2045<p>vulan, 10, tan tumṅeṅ tavaṅ, pha, prajñan kita.</p>
.<p>vulan, jyeṣṭa, tan pamaṅan garәm, pha, sugih bhūmi, tan ilaṅ takonakna, tur keḍәp kapintuhu.</p>
.<p>vulan, saddhā, tan paturū lavan strī, histri tan paturu lavan lanaṅ, pha, drәmmam halaki, kinasihaniṅ lanaṅ, lanaṅ kinasihaniṅ vadon, tur keḍәp sapaṅucapta.
. <app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>
. <note> hana bratta ṅulante ... keḍǝp sapaṅucapta <note>
2050 </note>
. <ptr target="#G"/> in III.58 <ptr target="#M"/> in III.69 <ptr target="#N"/> in III.69 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.149 <ptr target="#U"/> in III.115 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
.
2055<!-- G …..ṇnamaniṁ kanәm, saṁ hyaṁ ṅantanu, minakasanakiṅ ūlun saṁ gulu, habagus puruṣa vicakṣaṇa suka sugiḥ. Pūrṇnamaniṁ kapitu, saṁ hyaṁ manasijā, minaka sanakiṁ ṅulun pamadhe, habagus puruṣa vicakṣaṇa viśeṣa suka sugiḥ. Pūrṇnamaniṁ kavolu, saṁ hyaṁ kāmajaya, mina{ka}sanakiṅ ūlun, habagus puruṣa viśeṣa, vicakṣaṇa suka sugiḥ. Pūrṇnamaniṁ kasaṅa, saṁ hyaṁ hamadapa, minakasanakiṅ ūlun habagus puruṣa viśeṣa vicakṣaṇa suka sugiḥ. Pūrṇama ni sapuluḥ, saṁ hyaṁ kumarapaḥ, minaka sanakiṅ ūlun uragil, habagus puruṣa viśeṣa, vicakṣaṇa, suka sugiḥ. Pūrṇnamaniṁ deṣṭa, saṁ hyaṁ……..ka…..n lanaṁ, habagus puruṣa vaśeṣa, vicakṣaṇa, suka su…{gih}, pū..{r}ṇnama na{iṁ} saddha, ya komara, minaka hanakiṅ ulun vadon, hayu dr̥man kedhәp suka sugiḥ. Ĩti haji tutuk, phalaniṁ haṅlampahakәn brata ṅaji tutuk, habapa hababu hasanak hanak-anak suka sugiḥ, ya mukti tan kalaṅ-alaṅan, ma, Om̐ sa ba ta å ĩ, na ma śa va ya-->
.
.<!-- M nihan haji tutug kavruhakna, pūṛṇnāma niṁ kaṣa, saṁ hyaṁ hamūṛvva bhuvana, pi naka bapa, hasiḥ ri pinakeṅ hulun|| pūṛnama niṁ karo, saṁ hyaṁ madhu suddhanā pinaka babu, hasiḥ ri pinakeṅ hulun|| pūṛṇnamā niṁ katigā, saṁ hyaṁ madu kusumā, pinakiṅ hulun, listvayu paripūṛṇna, dr̥mman kedhәp puruṣa viśeṣa, prajñā n vicakṣaṇā, suka sugiḥ|| pūṛnnama niṁ ṅkapat, saṁ hyaṁ hasmara, pinaka laki niṁ hulun, hapkik prajurit vicakṣanā, puruṣa viśeṣā, prajñan ṣuka sugiḥ jayeṁ śatru, hasiḥ pinakeṅ hulun|| pūṛṇnama niṁ kalimā, saṁ hyaṁ manoba vā, pinaka hanak iṅhulun, panәṅgek lanaṁ, hapkik prajurit, hasiḥ pinakeṅ hulun, pūṛṇnama niṅ ka nәm, saṁ hyaṁ hantanu pinaka sanak iṅ hulun lanaṁ, paṅgulu, suka sugiḥ hasiḥ pinakeṅ hulun||pūṛṇnamā niṁ kapitu, saṁ hyaṁ kāma jaya pina ka sanak iṅhulun lanaṁ panṅaḥ, hasiḥ pinakeṅ hulun|| pūṛṇnamāni kavolu, saṁ hyaṁ kama ratiḥ, pinakā sanak iṅhulun lanaṁ vuruju, suka sugiḥ hasiḥ ri pinakeṅ hulun|| pūṛṇnama niṁ kasaṅha, saṁ hyaṁ kumara, pinakākṣaṇa, dukiṅ hulu nāpapaṅanten pinaslaṁ|| pūṛṇnama niṁ kaśapuluḥ, saṁ hyaṁ hamadapā, samanā duk dukiṅ hulun abobot|| pūṛṇnama nim jyeṣṭa, saṁ hyaṁ kumara, pinakā hanak lanaṁ pambayun, hapkik prajurit, hasih iṁ pinakeṅ hulun, puruṣa viśeṣa, prajñan vicakṣaṇā, jayeṁ śatru, hahidhәp pinakeṅ hulun|| pūṛṇnama niṁ hāsaddhā, saṁ hyaṁ komari, pinakā hanak vadon paṅgulu, listvayu paripūṛṇna, dr̥man kedәp, puruṣa viśeṣā, prajñan vicakṣaṇa hahidәp pinakeṅ hulun||0|| phala niṁ hulun āṅajī tutug, haṅavruhakәn tanutugā bapa, hababu, tutugga malakya rābi, hanak ānak, tutug asanak, tugu ākaki hanini, tutug āputu habuyut, tumus riṁ tәmbe, habagus kalavān hayu, paripūṛṇna, dr̥mman kedhәp, suka sugiḥ śri sadāna, mas manik, dodot l̥lmәs, hakveḥ daśaḥ vnaṁ vnaṁ hasuku pat, hasuku ro, sugiḥ tanyakna hiren, siddha sāprayojñanā, siddha salāmpaḥ salaku, l̥viḥ kapaṅgiḥ riṁ tәmbe pañjanman, l̥viḥ kapaṅgiḥ maṅke, bhaghavan pañarikan hanulisakәn, saṁ hyaṁ triyo daśa sakśi hanakṣeni, bhaṭāra hyaṁ kabayan hañәnәṅī-->
.
.<!-- N nihan hajī tutug kavruhakna, puṛṇnamaniṁ kaṣa, saṁ hyaṁ hamuṛvva bhuvaṅna, pinaka bala, hasiḥ ri pinakeṅ huluṅ·|| puṛṅnamaniṅ karo, saṁ hyaṁ maḍu śudḍaṇā, pinaka babu, hasiḥ ri pinakeṅ hulun ||0|| puṛṇnamaniṁ katigā, saṁ hyaṁ maḍu kusuma, pinakavakiṅ hulun listvayu paripuṛṇna, dr̥mman keḍǝp puruṣā viśeṣa, prajñān vicakṣaṇā, suka sugiḥ|| puṛṇnamaniṅ kapat, saṁ hya ṅ āsmara pinaka lakiniṁ hulun , hapkik prajurit vicakṣaṇā, puruṣā viśeṣa, prajñān suka sugiḥ jayeṁ śatru, hasiḥ pinakeṅ hulun || puṛṇnamaniṁ kalimā, saṁ hyaṁ manobhava, pinakā hanakiṅ hulun , panǝṅgǝk lanaṁ, hapkik prajurit hasiḥ pinakeṅ hulun || puṛṇnamāniṅ kanǝm , saṁ hyaṅ hantanū, pinaka sanakiṅ hulun lanaṁ, paṅgulu, suka sugiḥ, hasih pinakeṅ hulun ||0|| puṛṇmaniṁ kapitu, saṁ hyaṅ kama jaya, pinakā sanakiṅ hulun lanaṁ panṅaḥ, hasiḥ pina keṅ hulun || puṛṇnamaniṁ kavolu, saṁ hyaṅ kamā ratiḥ pinaka sanakiṅ hulun lanaṁ vuruju, suka sugiḥ hasiḥ ri pinakeṅ hulun || puṛṇnamaniṁ kasaṅha, saṁ hyaṁ kumarā, pinakā kṣanā , dukiṅ hulun hāpapaṅanten pinaslaṁ|| puṛṇnamaniṁ kaśapuluh, saṁ hyaṅ hamaḍapā, samanā dukiṅ hulun ābobot|| puṛṇnamaniṅ jyeṣṭā, saṁ hyaṁ kumara, pinakāhanak lanaṅ pambayun , hapkik prajurit, hasihiṁ pinakeṅ hulun , puruṣā viśeṣā, prajñān vicakṣaṇā, jayeṁ śatru, hahiḍǝpinakeṅ hulun || puṛṇnamaniṁ hasadḍā, saṁ hyaṅ komari, pinakā hanak vadon paṅguṅgulu, listvasyu paripuṛṇnā, ḍr̥man keḍǝp, puruṣa viśeṣā, prajñān vicakṣaṇā, hahiḍǝpinakeṅ hulun ||0|| phalaniṅ hulun āṅajī tutug, haṅavruhākǝn hanutuga bapa, hababu, tutugā malakya rabi, hanak ānak tutugā sanak, tutugākaki hanini, tutugāputu habuyut, tumus riṁ tǝmbe, habagus kalava nāyu, paripuṛṅnā, dr̥man keḍǝp, suka sugiḥ, śrī sadanā, mās maṇik, dodot l̥mǝs , hakveḥ daśiḥ , vnaṁ vnaṁ hasuku pat, hasuku ro, sugiḥ tanyakna hiren , sidḍa saprayojñaṇā, sidḍa salampaḥ salaku, lǝviḥ kapaṅgiḥ riṁ tǝmbe pañjanman, l̥viḥ kapaṅgiḥ maṅke, bhagavan pañarikan hanulisākǝn , saṁ hyaṁ triyodaśa sākṣi hanakṣeni, bhaṭāra hyaṁ kabayan hañjǝnǝṅi-->
2060
.<!-- P nihan bratā ṅaji tutug, ṅa, satavun lavasnya, kramanyā hacaru sudi, sadandanan, bras, 2, kulak, haṛtha, 225, kampuḥ gәnәp sasāri, carokәna riṁ saṅgāṛ, kramanya manaṅkәn pūṛṇnama, pūṛṇnamaniṁ kaṣā, saṁ hyaṁ hamūṛvva bhuvana, ṅa, pūṛṇnamaniṁ karo, saṁ hyaṁ manusudhana, ṅa, pinaka babu||0|| pūṛṇnamaniṁ katigā saṁ hyaṁ madhukusuma, ṅa, pinaka havak||0|| pūṛṇnamaniṁ kapat, saṁ hyaṁ smarā pina svami. pūṛṇnamaniṁ kalima saṁ hyaṁ manobhava, ṅa, pinaka sanak hatuha hanom||0|| pūṛṇnamaniṁ kanәm, saṁ hyaṁ hantanu pinakā sanaka kabeḥ. pūṛṇnamaniṁ kapitu saṁ hyaṁ kama jaya pinaka sānak vaṛgghā||0|| pūṛṇnamaniṁ kavolu pinaka sānak saṁ hyaṁ kama ratiḥ pūṛṇnamaniṁ kasaṅā saṁ hyam manasija pinaka sānak||0|| pūṛṇnamaniṁ kadaśa saṁ hyaṁ hamadhapa vuragil. pūṛṇnamaniṁ jyeṣṭa saṁ hyaṁ kumarā pinakā sanak lanaṁ||0|| pūṛṇnamaniṁ saddhā hyaṁ kumari pinaka sanak vadon, phalanya suka sugiḥ, tәkaniṁ hanak putu buyut, hantuka paripūṛṇna -->
.
.<!-- P nihan haji tutug kavruhakna, pūṛṇnamaniṁ kāṣā, saṁ hyaṁ hamūṛvva bhuvanā pinaka bapā, hasiri pinakeṁ hulun.o. pūṛnamaniṁ karo saṁ hyaṁ madhu sudhana, pinaka babu, hasiḥ riṁ pinakeṁṅ hulun, listuhayu paripuṛṇna dr̥man kedhәp puruṣa viśeṣa prajñan vicakṣaṇa, suka sugiḥ||0|| pūṛṇnamaniṁ kapat, saṁ hyaṁ svara pinaka lakiniṅ hulun, hapәkik śakti prajurit vicakṣaṇa, prajñan suka sugiḥ, hasiḥ riṁ pinakeṁ hulun||0|| pūṛṇnamāniṁ kalimā saṁ hyaṁ manobhava pinakā hanak iṅhulun, panәṅkәk lanaṁ, hapәkik prajurit, hasiḥ riṁ pinakeṅ hulun||0|| pūṛṇnamaniṁ kәnәm, saṁ hanatanu pinaka sānak iṅhulun lanaṁ paṅggulu, suka sugiḥ, hasiḥ riṁ pinakeṅ hulun||0|| pūṛṇnamaniṁ kapitu, saṁ hyaṁ kamajaya pinaka sanakiṁ hulun lanaṁ, panәṅaḥ, hasiḥ ri pinakeṁ hulun||0|| pūṛṇnamaniṁ kavulu, saṁ hyaṁ kama ratiḥ pinaka sanak iṅhulun lanaṁ wuruju, suka sugiḥ, hasiḥ riṁ pinakeṅ hulun||0|| pūṛṇnamaniṁ kasaṅā, saṁ hyaṁ kumara pinaka sanakiṅ hulun, dukiṁ hulun hapaṅanten pinasәlaṁ||0|| pūṛṇnamaniṁ kasapuluḥ, saṁ hyaṁ hamadhapa samaṇa dukiṁ hulun habobot||0|| pūṛṇnamaniṁ jyeṣṭa saṁ hyaṁ kumarā pinaka hanakānaṁ pambayun, hapәkik prajurit, hasiḥ ri pinakeṅ hulun, puruṣa viśeṣa prajñan, vicakṣaṇa jayeṁ śatru, hahidhәp pinakeṅ hulun||0|| pūṛṇnamaniṁ hasaddha, saṁ hyaṁ komari pinakā hanak vadon paṅggulu, listuhayu, paripūṛṇna dr̥man kedhәp , puruṣa viśeṣa, prajñan vicakṣaṇa hahidhәp pinakeṅ hulun||0|| phalaniṁ haṅaji tutug haṅavruhakәn hanutuga bapā, hababu tutuga malakyā rabi, mahanakānak, tutug asānak, tutug akaki hanini, tutug aputu habuyut, tumus riṁ tәmnbe habagus kalavan hayu, paripūṛṇna, dr̥man sahidhәp , suka sugiḥ, śri sadhana, mas maṇik dodot l̥l̥mes, kveḥ dasiḥ, vәnaṁ vәnaṁ hasuku pat, hasuku ro, sugihanya kәnahiren, siddha saprayojñāna, siddha salampah salaku,l̥viḥ kapaṅgiḥ maṅke, l̥viḥ kapaṅgiḥ kaṁ maṅko, tәmbe pañjanman bhagavān pañarikan hanulisakәn, saṁ hyaṁ triyodaśa sākṣi, hinakṣeni bhaṭāra hyaṁ kabhayan hañjәnәṅi-->
.
2065<!-- U nihan haji tutug kavruhakna, pūrṇnama niṁ kasa, saṁ hyaṁ hamurvvā bhūvana, pinaka bapa, hasiḥ riṁ pinakeṁṅ hulun. pūrṇnama niṁ karo, saṁ hyaṁ madhu suddanā, pinakā bābu, hasiḥ riṁ pinakeṁṅ hulun. pūrṇnama niṁ ka tiga, saṁ hyaṁ madhu kusuma, pinakāvak iṅ hulun, listvā paripūrṇna, dr̥man kedhәp puruṣa viśeṣa, pragan vicākṣaṇa, suka sugiḥ. pūrṇnama niṁ ka pāt, saṁ hyaṁ hasmara pinakā laki niṁṅ hulun, hapkik prajurit vicaksaṇā, puruṣa viśeṣa, prajñan suka sugiḥ jayeṁ śatru, hasiḥ ri pinakeṅ hulun. pūrṇnama niṁ kalimā, saṁ hyaṁ manobhāva, pinaka hanak iṁṅ hulun, panәṅgәk lanaṁ, hapkik prajurit, hasiḥ pinakeṁṅ hulun.pūrṇnama niṁ kā nәm, saṁ hyaṁ Atanu, pinaka sānak iṅ hulun lanāṁ, paṅgulu, hasiḥ ri pinakeṅ hulun. pūrṇnama niṁ ka pitu, saṁ hyaṁ kāmajaya, pinakā sanāk iṅ hulun lānaṁ panṅaḥ, hasiḥ ri pniṁkeṅ hulun. pūrṇnama niṁ kavolu, saṁ hyaṁ kāma ratiḥ, pinakā sānak iṅ hulun lanaṁ varuju, sukā sugiḥ hasiḥ ri pinakeṁṅ hulun. pūrṇnama niṁ kasaṅa, saṁ hyaṁ kumāra, pinaka sānak, duk iṅhulun hapapaṅanten ināslaṁ. pūrṇnamā niṁ kasapuluḥ, saṁ hyaṁ hamādapa, samana duk iṅ hulun abobot. pūrṇnama niṁ jyeṣṭā, saṁ hyaṁ kumāra, pinaka sānak lanāṁ pambayun, hapkik prajurit,hasiḥ riṁ pinakeṅ hulun, puruṣa viśeṣa, prajñān vicaksaṇa, jayeṁ śatru, Aidhәp pinakeṁṅ hulun. pūrṇnama niṁ Asadda, saṁ hyaṁ komari, pinakā hanak vadon paṅgulu, listvāyu, paripūrṇnādr̥man kedhәp puruṣa viśeṣa, prajñan vicakṣaṇa, Aidhәpinākeṅ hulun. phala niṅ hulun aṅaji tutug, haṅavruhakәn hanutuga malakyārabi, hanak anak, tutug asānak, tutug akaki hanini, tutug aputu habuyut, tumus riṁ tәmbe, habagus kalavan hayu, paripūrṇna, dr̥man kedhәp, suka sugiḥ śri sādhanā, mās maṇik, dodot hul̥mәs kveh dasi, vnaṁ vnaṁ hasuku pat, hasuku ro, sugiḥ tan kna hiren, sidda saprayojana, sidda salampaḥ laku, l̥viḥ kapaṅgiḥ riṁ tәmbe pañjanman, l̥vih kapaṅgiḥ maṅke, bhagavān pañarikan nulisakәn,saṁ hyaṁ triyodaśa sakṣi anakṣeni, bhaṭāra hyaṁ kabayan hañjәnәṅi-->
.
.
.<p n="III.70">nihan hajī tutug kavruhakna, </p>
.<p>pūrṇamaniṅ kaṣa, saṅ hyaṅ hamurvva bhuvaṅna, pinaka bala, hasih ri pinakeṅ huluṅ</p>
2070<p>purṅnamaniṅ karo, saṅ hyaṅ madhuśuddhaṇā, pinaka babu, hasih ri pinakeṅ hulun.</p>
.<p>pūrṇamaniṅ katiga, saṅ hyaṅ madhu kusuma, pinakavakiṅ hulun listvayuparipurṇna, drәmman keḍәp puruṣā viśeṣa, prajñan vicakṣaṇā, suka sugih.</p>
.<p>pūrṇamaniṅ kapat, saṅ hyaṅ āsmara pinaka lakiniṅ hulun, hapkik prajurit vicakṣaṇā, puruṣā viśeṣa, prajñan suka sugih jayeṅ śatru, hasih pinakeṅ hulun.</p>
.<p>pūrṇamaniṅ kalimā, saṅ hyaṅ manobhava, pinakā hanakiṅ hulun, panǝṅgǝk lanaṅ, hapkikprajurit hasih pinakeṅ hulun.</p>
.<p>purṇnamāniṅ kanǝm, saṅ hyaṅ hantanū, pinaka sanakiṅ hulun lanaṅ, paṅgulu, suka sugih, hasih pinakeṅ hulun.</p>
2075<p>purṇmaniṅ kapitu, saṅ hyaṅ kama jaya, pinakā sanakiṅ hulun lanaṅ panṅah, hasih pinakeṅ hulun.</p>
.<p>pūrṇamaniṅ kavolu, saṅ hyaṅ kamā ratih pinaka sanakiṅ hulun lanaṅ vuruju, suka sugih hasih ri pinakeṅ hulun.</p>
.<p>pūrṇamaniṅ kasaṅha, saṅ hyaṅ kumarā, pinakā kṣanā , dukiṅ hulun hāpapaṅanten pinaslaṅ.</p>
.<p>pūrṇamaniṅ kaśapuluh, saṅ hyaṅ hamadhapā, samanā dukiṅ hulun ābobot.</p>
.<p>pūrṇamaniṅ jyeṣṭā, saṅ hyaṅ kumara, pinakā hanak lanaṅ pambayun, hapkik prajurit, hasihiṅ pinakeṅ hulun, puruṣā viśeṣā, prajñan vicakṣaṇā, jayeṅ śatru, hahidhǝpinakeṅ hulun.</p>
2080<p>pūrṇamaniṅ hasaddhā, saṅ hyaṅ komari, pinakā hanak vadon paṅguṅgulu, listvasyu paripurṇnā, dhrәman keḍәp, puruṣa viśeṣā, prajñan vicakṣaṇā, hahidhǝpinakeṅ hulun.
.</p>
.
.<p>phalaniṅ hulun āṅajī tutug, haṅavruhākǝn hanutuga bapa, hababu, tutugā malakya rabi, hanak ānak tutugā sanak, tutugākaki hanini, tutugāputu habuyut, tumus riṅ tǝmbe, habagus kalavanāyu, paripurṅnā, drәman keḍәp, suka sugih, śrī sadanā, mās maṇik, dodot lәmǝs, hakveh daśih , vәnaṅ vәnaṅ hasuku pat, hasuku ro, sugih tanyakna hiren, siddha saprayojñaṇā, siddha salampah salaku, lǝvih kapaṅgih riṅ tǝmbe pañjanman, lәvih kapaṅgih maṅke, bhagavan pañarikan hanulisākǝn, saṅ hyaṅ triyodaśa sākṣi
.hanakṣeni, bhaṭāra hyaṅ kabayan hañjǝnǝṅi.
2085<app><lem wit="#G #M #N #P #U"></lem>
. <note> nihan hajī tutug ... kabayan hañjǝnǝṅi <note>
. </note>
. <ptr target="#G"/> in III.114 <ptr target="#M"/> in III.70 <ptr target="#N"/> in III.70 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.128, III.142 <ptr target="#U"/> in III.62 </note>
.</app>
2090</p>
.
.<!-- M nyan krama niṁ habratā riṁ śaśiḥ, ka, 4, riṁ pradipadā śukla, caru suci riṁ saṅgar·, sadan danan sovaṁ, riṁ sor pupulā, skaṛ sataman, hnahakna ri har̥piṁ saṅ amūja, vus niṅ aṅabakti, tiniṛtthan, thaṛ haṅupavaśa, sadinā saratri, Ikaṁ pupulā mvaṁ skaṛ sataman, thәṛ vinaveṁ patuṛvan pinajaṁ pajaṅan, mne riṅ dhavuḥ ro, tka niṁ dhavuḥ, 7, haṅar̥pakna labahan sga pitā, hivak hiṭik ginoreṁ, saha sasahuṛ·,-->
.
.<!-- N nihan kramaniṁ habratā riṁ śaśiḥ, ka, 4, riṁ praṭipadā śukla, caru suci riṁ saṅgar·, sadaṇḍanan sovaṁ, riṁ sor pupulāskar sataman, hnahakna riṅ har̥piṁ saṅ amujā, vusniṅ ābhakti, tinirtthan, thǝṛ haṅupavaśā, sadinā saratri, Ikaṁ pupulā mvaṁ skaṛ sataman, thǝṛ vvināveṁ paturvan pinajaṁ pajaṅan, mne riṁ ḍavuḥ, 2, tkaniṁ ḍavuḥ, 7, haṅar̥pakna labahan sgā pitā, Ivak hitik ginoreṁ sahā sasahuṛ·, yan tan ānaniṁ Iṭik, hantigā kunaṁ, gar̥m , hantajinya, catūṛ daśa dinā, ta n dadi hanapak rigǝd, hasiḍǝmpati, ṅa ||0|| mne ri puṛṇnamaniṁ kapat, yan āhyun āmūjā smarā, hinyasan tikaṁ yaśa riṁ pamarantyan pinajaṁ pajaṅān , huṅgvaniṅ ābratā, yan vala pitambharā, yan vr̥dḍa śvetāmbharā, hamar̥m pva saha parāgi, ryuvusniṁ hasuci hadyus , riṁ saṅgar·, ca, rvaṁ daṅḍanan deñ jaṅkǝp sahā catuṛ·, limas āguṁ, hiseni sgā kuniṁ, hivak hiṭik ginoreṁ, vinaṅgun hurip, gegembon , ṅa, hantigā pinlut, ka mpuhi cicirupan , tañcǝbi skār tlǝṁ, tumpāṅana riṁ limas āguṁ, tetebhogan hiseni sgā kuniṁ, masasahur·, mevak hiṭik ginoreṁ, vinaṅun hurip, lalamaka daluvaṁ, tulisi śvara vyañjana, riṁ hibu dṅǝn , caru mada ṇḍanan sovaṁ deñ jaṅkǝp, caru riṁ sumuṛ·, tumpə̄ṁ, 1, lalampadan , sasamuhan taḍaḥ pavitra, caru riṁ sor kadi hisiniṁ pasiliḥ, tan kari pupulā, skār sstaman , tlasniṁ caru trapakna sir̥miṅa skār, lumkas ḍaṁ gurv amūjā sūṛ yya śevana, kadi ṅrahina, taṅ abhakti sūṛyya, candrā, saṅgar·, Ibu, ḍṅǝn , kabasə̄ṁ sumur·, tiṅkahiṁ haṅabhakti, dukiṁ sore, tṅaḥ vṅi, meḥ rahinā, vusnīṅ aṅabakti, kinonta dyus āsucya taṅ abratā, thǝṛ hiṅaskaran si naṇḍiṅan pras , tiniṛtthañ jinaya jaya, tlas || halabuhana bratā, padamə̄l , sgā livәt, tiṅkahiṅ āṅlivәt, ḍaṅḍaṅ tulisana padmā, vusniṅ ānajeni, syoknīṅ antiga tambhar·, tutupi, yan vus matәṅ hnahanā muṅgviṅ ta pi, jinaya jaya, muvaḥ jaṅan raratusan, sabhageyan moliḥ, 108, vārṇna, paruko tulis padmā, Ikaṁ nasi linivǝt tinumpaṅan gaṅan, muvaḥ tumpǝṁ, hisenāna jǝbug ārūm , kaṁ vutuḥ, sadǝk, duk āṅaroni tini tisan maḍu, phān , Ivaknya cārmmaniṁ kbo yos baraṇā, hiṅǝmbanā don , mvaṁ jǝbug ārūm , sami rincaḥ, tlas, nhǝṛ tan kneṁ turu, riṁ rahinanya, samaṅkana jugā sakottamanya, satutugiṁ reḥ|| kunaṁ phalanya, Ilaṁ hikaṁ saṛvva vyadḍi, sāṛvva duṣṭā, saṛvva bhāya, saṛvva bhoga kapaṅguḥ, kakarṣaṇa rikeṁ rāt, lituhayu paripuṛṇna, svāṛgga kapaṅgguḥ, mvaṁ kaniśreyaśan , dulurāna Ulaḥ rahayu, tan paṅambaḥ laraṅān , matvaṁ riṁ vvaṅā tuhā, priyǝmbadā, tan vāk paruṣya, haglə̄m ataṅi, mabratāṅkǝn vei hayu, mvaṁ katpǝtaniṁ kasamyajñanan -->
2095
.
.<p n="III.71">nihan kramaniṅ habrata riṅ śaśih, ka, 4, riṅ praṭipadā śukla, caru suci riṅ saṅgar, sadaṇdhanan sovaṅ, riṅ sor pupulāskar sataman, hnahakna riṅ harәpiṅ saṅ amujā, vusniṅ ābhakti, tinirtthan, tәhәr haṅupavaśā, sadinā sarātri, Ikaṅ pupulā mvaṅ skar sataman, tәhәr vvināveṅ paturvan pinajaṅ pajaṅan, mne riṅ dhavuh, 2, təkaniṅ dhavuh, 7, haṅarәpakna labahan sәga pitā, Ivak hitik ginoreṅ sahā sasahur, yan tan ānaniṅ Iṭik, hantiga kunaṅ, garәm, hantajinya, catūr daśa dinā, tan dadi hanapak rigǝd, hasidhǝmpati, ṅa.
.mne ri pūrṇamaniṅ kapat, yan āhyun āmūjā smarā, hinyasan tikaṅ yaśa riṅ pamarantyan pinajaṅ pajaṅān, huṅgvaniṅ ābrata, yan vala pitambharā, yan vrәddha śvetāmbharā, hamarәm pva saha parāgi, ryuvusniṅ hasuci hadyus, riṅ saṅgar, ca, rvaṅ daṅdhanan deñ jaṅkǝp sahā catur, limas āguṅ, hiseni sәga kuniṅ, hivak hiṭik ginoreṅ, vinaṅgun hurip, gegembon, ṅa, hantiga pinlut, kampuhi cicirupan, tañcǝbi skār tlǝṅ, tumpāṅana riṅ limas āguṅ, tetebhogan hiseni sәga kuniṅ, masasahur, mevak hiṭik ginoreṅ, vinaṅun hurip, lalamaka daluvaṅ, tulisi śvara vyañjana, riṅ hibu dṅǝn, caru madaṇdhanan sovaṅ deñ jaṅkǝp, caru riṅ sumur, tumpə̄ṅ, 1, lalampadan, sasamuhan tadhah pavitra, caru riṅ sor kadi hisiniṅ pasilih, tan kari pupulā, skār sstaman , tlasniṅ caru trapakna sirәmiṅa skār, lumkas dhaṅ gurv amūjā sūryya śevana, kadi ṅrahina, taṅ abhakti sūryya, candrā, saṅgar, Ibu, dhṅǝn, kabasə̄ṅ sumur, tiṅkahiṅ haṅabhakti, dukiṅ sore, tәṅah vәṅi, meh rahinā, vusnīṅ aṅabakti, kinonta dyus āsucya taṅ abrata, tәhәr hiṅaskaran sinaṇdhiṅan pras, tinirtthañ jinaya jaya, tlas.halabuhana brata, padamə̄l, sәga livәt, tiṅkahiṅ āṅlivәt, dhaṅdhaṅ tulisana padmā, vusniṅ ānajeni, syoknīṅ antiga tambhar, tutupi, yan vus matәṅ hnahana muṅgviṅ tapi, jinaya jaya, muvah jaṅan raratusan, sabhageyan molih, 108, vārṇna, paruko tulis padmā, Ikaṅ nasi linivǝt ti numpaṅan gaṅan, muvah tumpǝṅ, hisenāna jǝbug ārūm, kaṅ vutuh, sadǝk, duk āṅaroni tinitisan madhu, phān, Ivaknya cārmmaniṅ kәbo yos baraṇā, hiṅǝmbanā don, mvaṅ jǝbug ārūm, sami rincah, tlas, nhǝr tan kneṅ turu, riṅ rahinanya, samaṅkana juga sakottamanya, satutugiṅ reh.kunaṅ phalanya, Ilaṅhikaṅ sarva vyaddhi, sarva duṣṭā, sarva bhāya, sarva bhoga kapaṅguh, kakarṣaṇa rikeṅ rāt, lituhayu paripurṇna, svārgga kapaṅgguh, mvaṅ kaniśreyaśan, dulurāna Ulah rahayu, tan paṅambah laraṅān, matvaṅ riṅ vvaṅātuhā, priyǝmbadā, tan vāk paruṣya, haglə̄m ataṅi, mabrataṅkǝn vei hayu, mvaṅ katpǝtaniṅ kasamyajñanan.
.<app><lem wit="#M #N"></lem>
2100 <note> nihan kramaniṁ habratā ... katpǝtaniṁ kasamyajñanan <note>
. </note>
. <ptr target="#M"/> in III.71 <ptr target="#N"/> in III.71 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
2105
.
.<p n="III.72">
. madhū parkka tuyat bhakṣaṃ, sarva deva samanvitah, na sthama canarajñatva, sarva deva samānvitaṃ. Ikaṅ devata hana sanidva, ri saṅ hyaṅ madhū parkka, sira juga hidhpan raṣananta, kadilihñca mahādeva, Artthanya, Ikaṅ madhū viṣṇu devatanya, air tbhu brahmā devatanya, phan hiśvara devatanya, punti mahādeva devatānya. lavaṇo rudra mityuktaṃ, bhrәmgure sambhu mucyate, patraśvaṣā śivojñeyah, Ityetat devatāsthitah
.</p>
2110
.<p>hyaṅniṅ Uyah rudra, hyaṅniṅ bhrәm guru, hyaṅniṅ layaṅ sambhu, hyaṅniṅ lvā śiva, nihan taṅ devatā sanidya, hana riṅ madhū parkka.
.vituh pāpa dahet sarpih, vituh pāpañca madhūkaṃ, svātipāpa dahet kṣiraṃ, gatraṃ pāpaṃ kadalisaṃ.</p>
.
.<p>Arthanya, Ilaṅ deniṅ air tbu pāpaniṅ bapa, kavisarjja denya, Ilaṅ deniṅ madhū parkka, pāpaniṅ babu, kavisarjja denya, Ilaṅ deniṅ phan, pāpaniṅ śarīranta, Ilaṅ deniṅ punti, pāpaniṅ vvaṅ sanakta kaḍaṅ varga, kavisarjja denya, mataṅyan kayatnakna deniṅ mantra madhū parkka, mā, Om̐ madhū pakaṃ Idhaṃ puṇyaṅ, pavitraṃ pāpanaśanaṃ, Iśvara nagisaṅśrәṣṭah, punanti sakalañjagat, mam̐, piṅ, 3, mamaṅan, piṅ, 3, masucya.</p>
2115
.<p>saha pūja parikrama karәhǝn, tәhәr haṅupavaśā, vusniṅ pinūja, haṅabhakti kadi haṅabhāktiniṅ habrattā.</p>
.
.<p>ṅhadva kadva kādevye namah, pūr, Om̐ kusuma yudā mamakā devye namah, da, Om̐ kadārppa daśa paddha devye namah svāhā, pa, Om̐ manobhava strī mandha devye namah , bā, Om̐ makara dvajamandoratha devye namah svāhā, U, Om̐ mantra tatu bhaṅgā devye namah, ai.</p>
.
2120<p>Iti saṅ hyaṅ haṣṭa Devî.Om̐ hyaṅ hyaṅniṅ hyaṅ smara deva ya namah, Om̐ Indrā ya namah, Om̐ Om̐ svaṣṭi ya namah.</p>
.
.<p>pratyakṣatvamihaloka, mānuṣa tvañca visuka devatvaṃ, sūkṣmatvaṃ sakalatvañca, Atmatvañca śariratvaṅ.
.Eka rūpañca visuka sadanaṃ, candrā vatsa tetemekaṃ, trei lokya viyosa śakti.
.Iśvara vara devañca, brahmājāyañja vijayaṃ, mahādeva varatvañca, viṣṇu vijayare vañca.
2125Indra rājaca jayatvaṃ, sarva deva ya ratvañca, sarva de [17v]va Devî tatvaṃ, trelokya sevitantah.
.citta mani mahendraśca, sarva kumarā rājatvaṅ, kumara rāja sajñaccā, Iṣṭā kamacayaṅ jakaṃ.
.Aṣṭātanvavi patiñca, Ugra devā ca sajñakaṃ, sarva pāpa haret siddhi, sarva rogha praharaṇaṅ.sarva śatru vinaśanaṃ.</p>
.
.<p>smarastavā.</p>
2130
.<p> nihan kramaniṅ haśeva latri, hasūryya śevana kita rumuhun, kadi sadinā, huvusniṅ hasūryya śevana, mariṅ pamiyosan, haṅarәpakǝn pitā, yan tan hanāniṅ pitā, Ujuṅaniṅ pisaṅ glarәn, sucenā rumuhun, yan hananiṅ liṅga mās, salakā kuniṅ, pūjanǝn pratiṣṭa ri hujuṅaniṅ pisaṅ, makadi riṅ pitā, pūjanǝn riṅ kana, glarāna padmasana saprakāranya, təkaniṅ devā, pratiṣṭā, Utpǝtyakǝn bhaṭāra sakiṅ hrәddhaya, ma, Om̐ mam̐ Am̐ Um̐ namah, Idhǝp saṅ hyaṅ muṅgviṅ liṅga, pūjāni vijā caṇdhana, sahā sminiṅ majā, skār kunǝṅ, muvah sthityakna bhaṭāra riṅ liṅgā, yan hananiṅ liṅga mās, salakā, yen ta[18 r]n hana salakā, sariniṅ vaduri piṅhe, gavenǝn liṅgākarā, mantra sthiti, Om̐ Am̐ Um̐ mam̐ namah, pūjani rvaniṅ maja, mvaṅ sarva skar, caṇdhana, vija, sabhagyan pujāniṅ dhupa, dipā, ghaṇṭa, mvaṅ japā ganitri, sahā praṇa yama, saha sǝmbah, liṅanta Om̐ Om̐ liṅgā liṅgā dipatayei namah, haturana gadhakṣata, puṣpa, dhūpā dhipa, mvaṅ caru, rakā vovohan, sәḍah voh, liṅanta haṅaturakǝn, Om̐ Om̐ śiva ni vedyañca rūm dadami, Amrәtta deva caruvedādami, sa ba ta A I, nama śiva ya, A U mā, Om̐.pūjā, piṅ, 3, dukiṅ sore pūrvaka, tәṅah vәṅi, mehniṅ rahina, deniṅ āmūjā, tan kantun mantra, Om̐ Om̐ liṅgā ye namah, Om̐ sadāśivāṅliṅgā ya namah. mehniṅ rahina, Ulihakna sira riṅ anta hrәddhaya, puṇdharikā muvah, liṅanta, Om̐ Atma liṅggā ya namah, Om̐ Om̐ Am̐ mam̐ namah,</p>
.
.<p>yekiṅ mantra pralīṇā.
.Om̐ śiva ya śiva liṅga ya,śiva sarvvo maheśvarah, nama śiva ya deva ya, saddha śi[18 v]va namostute.brahmā viṣṇviśvaro devah, sarvajñā parameśvara, Utpati sthiti linañcah, liṅgā deva namo namah. tuṅgal sthiti sarәpiṅ praliṇā.</p>
2135
.
.<p>yen arәp śīva rātri cǝṇdhǝk, liṅanta,
.Om̐ Om̐ liṅgā liṅgādipataye namah, Om̐ Om̐ Ātma liṅgā ya namah, sǝmbah duk sore,
.Om̐ Om̐ parama śiva liṅgā ya namah, sǝmbah tәṅah vәṅi,
2140Om̐ Om̐ śunya liṅgā ya namah, sǝmbah meh rahina,
.sminiṅ maja pinūjakǝn, sthuti tuṅgal, Om̐ nama śiva ya, namo rudra ya, nispadā parvvatā ya , sahā sǝmbah sminiṅ majā kunaṅ.</p>
.
.<p>lviriṅ bratayvakna riṅ tamah, tamah harane turū, yatika kavaśakna yva lupā, I kālanta mabrata, hayva juga kita haturu ri rahina, hila hilā, hilaṅ hulihta mabrata, Asiṅ brata hanisphala tan pantukā Asiṅ sinadya, mataṅyan kayatnakna, hayvā himan iman, Ikaṅ tapā brata hagə̄ṅ phalanya, vahya suka katәmu donya, Ikaṅ kayogiśvarān, kamokṣan phalanya, mataṅnyan hayo cumacadiṅ sira saṅ lumkasakǝn brata tapā, Ayva memeṅeniṅ vvaṅ abrata, Ila hilā liṅ saṅ hyaṅ.
.</p>

.<!-- G … jala pravira subirāt, sugiḥ tan pamaṅun gave, muvah akaravaṅan, habaṁ rūpanira,[41v] sar̥ṅit gәṅira, ya hiku sariniṁ galuṅan, pinakasamtoniṅ ulun, siṁ tan vruḥ sariniṁ galuṅan, pinakakavudhanan ūlun sa….gat, saravanā, satuṅkәbiṁ rat, siṁ haṅavruhi sāriniṁ ṅgāluṅan, ya pinakasa{na}k iṅulun, pinaka{ka}dhaṅiṅ hulun, sasaṅoniṅ hulun āṅavruhakan sāriniṁ ṅgāluṅan, salave lakṣa, salave kṭi, salave yuta, salave barā, salave hiṅәl, pinakapasasaṅoniṁ ṅhulun, katmu samaṅko katmu tambe, ḷviḥ maṅko ḷviḥ tәmbe, mtu salakṣā sadina. 2150<p n="III.73">nihan pabratan, haji sariniṅ galuṅān, krama bantǝn ri saṅgar, bantǝn suci hadaṇdhanan, riṅ ibu dhṅǝn, padha mabuṅkul, riṅ toya abuṅkul, mantra paṅatǝr ā-tǝr bakti maṅavaṅi, ma, Om̐ jaya pravira subiṅ rāt, sugih tan pamaṅun gave, muvah hakaravaṅan, habaṅ rūpanira, sārәṅit gə̄ṅira, ya hiku sariniṅ galuṅan, pinakāsamtoniṅ hulun, siṅ tan vruh sariniṅ galuṅan,pinakā kavulaniṅ hulun, sabhūvana, satuṅkǝbiṅ rāt, siṅ haṅavruhi sariniṅ galuṅān, ya pinaka sanakiṅ hulun, pinakā samtoniṅ hulun, sasaṅoniṅ hulun, haṅavruhākǝn sarīniṅ galuṅan, salave lākṣa, salave kṭi, salave hiṅǝl, pinakā pasasaṅoniṅ hulun, katәmu maṅko, katәmu tǝmbe, lǝvih kātmu tǝmbe, mtu salākṣa sadinā, Om̐ sa ba ta A I, nama śiva ya, A U ma Om̐.

.<!-- N nihan bratā hañarin galuṅān , krama, yan kalaniṅ galuṅān , habantǝn sarimpǝn , saviji sovaṁ, hnahakna ri har̥piṁ saṅgar·, kaṁ riṁ saṅgar·, kadi kramaniṁ bantǝn kaṁ lagi lagi, kaṁ riṅ ību, kaṁ ri tṅaḥ, vuhāna burat vaṅi, lṅa va ṅi, mvaṁ bras , 2, catu, harttha, 225, pinūjā saparikrama, taṅābhakti, vusiṅ haṅabhakti, hamaṅan sarimpǝn , ryuvusiṁ hamaṅan sarimpǝn , hamaṅan sakavaśa, pūjaniṁ hamaṅan sarimpǝn , Om̐ paduka bhaṭāri sā riniṅ galuṅan , manuṣanira kinavruhakǝn sāriniṅ galuṅan , haṅisǝp sariniṁ rahina, haṅisǝp sariniṁ vṅi, haṅisǝp sariniṁ śrī sadanā, haṅisǝp saṛvva sarī, haṅisǝp sariniṅ rāt bhūvana kabeḥ, hulun vruḥ sariniṅ galuṅan , handadi ya bhujaṅgga l̥viḥ, hakaḍaṅā ratū, suka sugiḥ śarīraniṅ hulun , hanakāna keḍǝp, haputu habuyut, tumus tumǝrus , tkaniṁ hanak putu buyutiṅ hulun , katkana sapinakṣā niṅhulun , saṁ hyaṁ triyodaśa sakṣi, Anakṣeniṅ hulun , phalanya, siṅ kaṛyyānta hanmu hayu, kinasihan deniṁ bhūṭā dṅǝn, mvaṁ jnǝk sahisiniṅ pomahan -->
2160
.<!-- P nihan brata ñarin galuṅan kramanya manaṅkәn galuṅan, habantәn jarimpәn har̥piṁ saṅgaṛ, sāmpun mar̥p muṅgahākna mariṁ saṅgaṛ, riṁ hibu, riṁ pagneyan, kādi bantәn sisiriḥ, maliḥ muṅgaḥriṁ saṅggaṛ, bras, 2, catu, hartha, 225, l̥ṅa burat vaṅi, yen vus humuja paṅabhakti, yen vus haṅabhakti hamaṅan haṅinuṁ· sakavasanya. nyan pūjanya: Ōm̐ paduka bhaṭāra sariniṁ galuṅan, manuṣanira kinavruhakәn sariniṁ galuṅan, haṅisәp sariniṁ rahina haṅisәp sariniṁ vәṅi, haṅisәp sariniṁ śri sdhana haṅisәp sariniṁ saṛvva sārī, haṅisәp sariniṁ saṛvva bhuvana, sakabeḥ riṁ hulun, vruḥ sariniṁ galuṅan handadi ya bhujaṅggā l̥viḥ, hakadaṁ ratu suka sugiḥ sariraniṅm hulun, hanakānakā kedhәp haputu habuyut tumus tumәrus tәkaniṁ hanak putu buyut hiṅhulun, saṁ hyaṁ triyodaśa sakṣi hanakṣeniṅ hulun. Phalanya siṁ kāṛyyanta hanәmu hayu, kinasihan bhūtā dәṅәn, mvaṁ jәnәk sahisiniṁ pomahan-->
.
.<p n="III.74">nihan bratahañarin galuṅān, krama, yan kalaniṅ galuṅān, habantǝn sarimpǝn, saviji sovaṅ, hnahakna ri harәpiṅ saṅgar, kaṅ riṅ saṅgar, kadi kramaniṅ bantǝn kaṅ lagi lagi, kaṅ riṅ ību, kaṅ ri tәṅah, vuhāna burat vaṅi, lṅa vaṅi, mvaṅ bras, 2, catu, harttha, 225, pinūjā saparikrama, taṅābhakti, vusiṅ haṅabhakti, amaṅan sarimpǝn, ryuvusiṅ amaṅan sarimpǝn, amaṅan sakavaśa, pūjaniṅ amaṅan sarimpǝn, Om̐ paduka bhaṭārī sāriniṅ galuṅan, mānuṣanira kinavruhakǝn sāriniṅ galuṅan, haṅisǝp sariniṅ rahina, haṅisǝp sariniṅ vәṅi, haṅisǝp sariniṅ śrī sadanā, haṅisǝp sarva sarī, haṅisǝp sariniṅ rāt bhūvana kabeh, hulun vruhsariniṅ galuṅan, handadi ya bhujaṅgga lәvih, hakaḍaṅā ratu, suka sugih śarīraniṅ hulun, hanakāna keḍәp, aputu habuyut, tumus tumǝrus, təkaniṅ hanak putu buyutiṅ hulun, katəkana sapinakṣāniṅhulun, saṅ hyaṅ triyodaśa sakṣi, Anakṣeniṅ hulun, phalanya, siṅ karyyānta hanmu hayu, kinasihan deniṅ bhūṭā dṅǝn, mvaṅ jnǝk sahisiniṅ pomahan.
.<app><lem wit="#N #P" ></lem>
2165 <note> nihan bratā hañarin ... sahisiniṅ pomahan <note>
. </note> <ptr target="#N"/> in III.73 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.113 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
.
2170<!-- N hana bratāsusukan , ṅa, riṁ puṛṇnamaniṅ kapitu, piṁ, 7, sarahina, piṁ 7, savṅi, hamaṅan āṅinūm, haṅigə̄l, bhaṭāra kapitu maveḥ bratā, pha, suka sugiḥ,hanak amitra, diṛgghāyuṣā, keḍǝp kapituhu -->
.
.<!-- P hana bratā sussukan, ṅa, riṁ pūṛṇnamaniṁ kapitu, piṁ 7, sarahina piṁ, 7, savәṅi hamaṅan haṅinum, haṅigәl, bhaṭāra kapitu maveḥ bratā, phalanya suka sugiḥ, hanakāmitra, diṛgha yuṣa, kedhәp kapintuhu -->
.
.<!-- U hana brātā susukān, ṅa, riṁ pūrṇnāma niṁ kapitu, piṁ pitu sarahina, pipitu savṅi, hamaṅana haṅinum haṅigәl, bhaṭāra kapitu maveḥ brātā, pa, suka sugiḥ anak amitra, dirgghā yūṣā kedhәp kapintuhu -->
2175
.
.<p n="III.75">hana bratasusukan, ṅa, riṅ pūrṇamaniṅ kapitu, piṅ, 7, sarahina, piṅ 7, savәṅi, amaṅan āṅinūm, haṅigə̄l, bhaṭāra kapitu maveh brata, pha, suka sugih, hanak amitra, dirgghāyuṣā, keḍәp kapituhu.

.
2185<p n="III.76">hana brata dinulaṅ riṅ lek pituṅ lek samayanya, pha, kinasihaniṅ rāt. </p>
.
.<p n="III.77">hana brata malaṅlek denya maṅan, denya ṅǝpǝl, pituṅ lek samayanya, pha, subhaga kinasihaniṅ histrī.</p>
.
.
2190<!-- G hana brata, mavucandrā, sabran soma yan masipat, ůniveḥ buddha hir̥ṁ, dite manis, ůniveḥ sari-sari, saṁ hyaṁ manik badhe devatanya, satahun tigaṁ ṅlek samayanya, pha, masiḥ saṁ hyaṁ candra ditya, tan lamūr katon ayu, pinicaya phalanya -->
.<!-- N hana bratā mahucandrā, ṅa, sabran masocca yen masiphat, ṅūniveḥ buda Ir̥ṁ, mvaṁ dite manis, ṅūniveḥ sari sarikna, saṁ hyaṁ maṇik baḍe hyaṁnya, satahun tigaṅ lek ṣamayanya, pha, masiḥ saṁ hyaṁ candrāditya, tan lamūṛ kkatonā hayu, mvaṁ pinicaḍaṁ -->
.
.
.<p n="III.78">hana brata mahucandrā, ṅa, sabran masocca yen masi phat, ṅūniveh buda Irәṅ, mvaṅ dite manis, ṅūniveh sari sarikna, saṅ hyaṅ maṇik badhe hyaṅnya, satahun tigaṅ lek ṣamayanya, pha, masih saṅ hyaṅ candrāditya, tan lamūr kkatonā hayu, mvaṅ pinicadhaṅ.

. </note>

2200</p>
.
.<!-- N hana bratā ṅlintaṁ, ṅa, tan pamaṅan , yan tan mtu lintaṅ pipitu sanak, lama tṅaḥ śaśiḥ, pha, sugiḥ dlāha, tuṛūpānta tan ākusut-->
.
.<!-- P hana brata ṅlintaṁ, ṅa, tan pamaṅana yan tan mәtu lintaṁ pipitu sanak, hatәṅaḥ śasiḥ samayanya, phalanya sugiḥ dlahā tuṛ rūpānta tan akusu -->
2205

.<!-- N hana bratta, sore hamaṅan vus āpasaṁ sande jugā, bratā tan pasuluḥ, ṅa, ya pinaka rūpā, pinakā rūpā, pinaka vuvusīṁ paḍa vvaṁ, pha, sīm sadyanta katkan -->
2215
.<!-- U hana brata sore hamaṅan vus apasaṁ damar sande juga, brata tan pasuluh, ṅa, ya pinaka rūpa, pinaka huvus iṁ pada vvaṁ. pha, si sādhyanta katkān -->
.
.

.
.<!-- P hana bratāṅyu haranya tan pamaṅana tәkaniṁ saṅeṅe kulon muvaṁ sakiṁ hupi hyaṁ prabhaṅkara hyaṁniṁ bratā, savaṛṣa samayanyā, phalanyā, hevana pamuktinta, siddha saprayojñānanta -->

.<!-- G hana bratā, haṅәmbaṁ sabran manis, sarvva kәmbaṁ kinumpulakәn, karapun uyaḥ ar̥ṁ suruḥ pupucuk, yen amaṅan riṁ paturon mar̥p iṅulon, yen amaṅan davuḥ pisan, phala pkik hakeḥ aṅulaṅunakәn, yen istri haṅulaṅunakәn hadr̥man halaki, kinasihan deniṁ laki kita tәmbe, tūr tan panmu ki marū -->
.
2270<!-- N hana brata haṅǝṁbaṁ sabran manis , saṛvva kǝmbhaṁ kiṅumpulākǝn , lavan huyaḥ har̥ṁ, suruḥ pupucuk, yen āmaṅan riṅ paturon, mar̥piṅ ulon, yan āmaṅan ḍavuḥ pisan , pha, pkik hakeh ūlaṅunakǝn yen istri haṅulahakǝn, dr̥man halaki, kinasihan riṁ paturon, mar̥piṁ hulon hyen āmaṅan-->
.
.<p n="III.85">hana brata haṅǝṅbaṅ sabran manis, sarva kǝmbhaṅ kiṅumpulākǝn, lavan huyah harәṅ, suruh pupucuk, yen amaṅan riṅ paturon, marәpiṅ ulon, yan amaṅan dhavuh pisan, pha, pkik hakeh ūlaṅunakǝna yen istri haṅulahakǝn , drәman halaki, kinasihan riṅ paturon, marәpiṅ hulon hyen amaṅan.

2290
.<!-- N hana brata, hañjaya, ṅa, tan pamaṅan yan liṅsiṛ, satahun pituṁ dinā lavasanya, saṁ hyaṁ kr̥tta bhuvana hyaṁniṁ brata, pha, kr̥tta kaṁ rāt, manuḥ kaṁ pr̥mana, sidḍi kanisihan deniṁ hyaṁ, kineriṅan deniṁ saṛvva galak-->
.
.<!-- P hana bratā hañjaya, kramanya tan pamaṅan yan lisiṛ savaṛṣa pituṁ dinā samayanya saṁ hyaṁ kr̥tta bhuvana hyaṁ niṁ bratā, kr̥tta taṁ rāt, manuḥ kaṁ pr̥maṇa, phalanya siddi kinasihan deniṁ hyaṁ, kineriṅan deniṁ saṛvva galak -->
.

.
2305<!-- P hana bratā hanrus tuñjuṁ, ṅa, yan riṁ pūṛṇnamaniṁ kapitu hadyus piṁ pitu sarahina, mvaṁ riṁ vәṅi yan paṅloṁ, piṁ, 14, haśeva latri, hacaru suci, sadandanan, bhaṭāra guru hyaṁnya, phalanya savighnanta hilaṁ tuṛ kinasihan deniṁ buṭā dәṅәn, mvaṁ kinasihan deniṁ tuvan muvaṁ samanta-->
.

.
.<!-- P hana brata hanәrus tuñjuṃ, ṅa, haturu haṅadәg savәṅi, bhaṭāra śivā maveḥ bratā, phalanya śakti, sasaṛnya dadi ratu, sugiḥ, tan hilaṁ takonakna, maṅgәḥ deśa, nora rvaṁ siddhi gave -->
.

2320
.<!-- U hana bratā hanrus tuñjuṁ, ṅa, haturu haṅadhәg savṅi, bhaṭāra śiva maveḥ brātā, pha, śakti, sasaṛnya dadi ratu -->
.

.
2325<p n="III.89">hana brata, nrus tuñjuṅ, ṅa, haturu haṅādǝg savәṅi, bhaṭāra śiva maveh brata, pha, śakti, sasarnya dadi rātū, sugih tan hilaṅ takonakna, magǝh deśa, nora voṅ siddhi gave.

.

.

.
2355<p n="III.92">hana brata, nrus tuñjuṅ, ṅa, hadyus piṅ tiga savәṅi, piṅ tiga sarahina, tan paturu gumuliṅ, sumandah vәnaṅ, satahun divasanya, pha, vruh satata guṇaniṅ voṅ kabeh, prajurit hapkik tanāna madani, pinakā huluniṅ sañjatā, savārṇnaniṅ bhūvana norana madā, sanuṣantarā kabeh tumiṅhal iṅ sira.

.<!-- P - hana brata hadyus tuñjuṁ, ṅa, madyus piṁ pitu sarahina, piṁ pitu savәṅi, phalanya listuhayu paripūṛṇna, kinasihan deniṁ pāndhitā -->
2365
.

2375<!-- N hana bratā, nrus tuñjuṁ, ṅa, hadus , piṁ, 7, sarahina, mvaṁ riṁ vṅi, hasisiriḥ kitthā, naṅkǝn vulan aguṁ, pha, vruḥ tan āga saparipolaḥta, bhūvana gegeṛ tumon hiri kitthā -->
.
.<p n="III.94">hana brata, nrus tuñjuṅ, ṅa, hadus, piṅ, 7, sarahina, mvaṅ riṅ vәṅi, hasisirih kita, naṅkǝn vulan aguṅ, pha, vruh tan āga saparipolahta, bhūvana geger tumon hiri kita.

2385<!-- N hana brata tri sandya, ṅa, hamaṅan tigaṁ kpǝl , sarahinā, tigaṁ tahun samayanya, pha, mantukiṁ svaṛgga bhaṭāra viṣṇu, sasaṛnya mañjanma riṁ listvayu paripuṛṇna, suka magə̄ṁ -->
.
.<p n="III.95">hana brata trisandya, ṅa, amaṅan tigaṅ kpǝl, sarahinā, tigaṅ tahun samayanya, pha, mantuk iṅ svarga bhaṭāra viṣṇu, sasarnya mañjanma riṅ listvayu paripurṇna, suka magə̄ṅ.
.<app><lem wit="#N"></lem>
. <note> hana brata tri ... suka magə̄ṁ <note>
2390 </note>
. <ptr target="#N"/> in III.95 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
.
2395<!-- G hana brāta, atri ndhya, piṁ tiga dyusiṁ rahina, mviṅi kuḷm, huvusniṁ adyus, māsisig, māsipat,mañurat, pituṅ lek samayanya, phalaniṁ brata, mulihiṁ kendran, sasaṛnya manja_ _ _ tuhayu, paripūṛṇna, prajña ya-->
.
.<!-- N hana brata, tri sanḍya, ṅa, madyus piṁ tigā sarahina, mvaṁ riṁ vṅi, vusiṁ hadyus hasusurā, masiphatā, pituṅ lek ṣamayanya, pha, muliḥ mari kendran , sasaṛnya mandādi vvaṁ listvayu paripuṛṇna prajñan -->
.
.<!-- P hana brata tri sandya, ṅa, piṁ tigā dyus sarahinā,mvaṁ riṁ, vuniṁ hadyus, hasisig, masipat, mañurat, pituṁ lek ṣamayanya, phalanya muliḥ riṁ kendrān, sasaṛnya mañjanma riṁ vvaṁ listvāyu, paripūṛṇna prajñan-->
2400
.
.<p n="III.96">hana brata, trisaddhya, ṅa, madyus piṅ tiga sarahina, mvaṅ riṅ vәṅi, vusiṅ hadyus hasusurā, masiphatā, pituṅ lek samayanya, pha, mulih mari kendran, sasarnya mandā di vvaṅ listvayu paripurṇna prajñan.
