. <note> hana brata, tri ... paripuṛṇna prajñan X <note>
2405 </note>
. <ptr target="#G"/> in III.54 <ptr target="#N"/> in III.96 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.53 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
.
2410<!-- N hana bratta, kraca dyus , ṅa, hadyusarahina vṅi, lǝṅa siphatnya, pha, svaṛggā mantuk riṁ kendrān , mañjanmā vicakṣaṇa hanulus, tuṛ anom apkik kala hāla -->
.
.<!-- P hana brata kracādyus, ṅa, hadyus sarahina vәṅi, l̥ṅa cipatnyā, phalanya mantuk riṁ svaṛgga riṁ kendran, mañjanmā vicakṣaṇa, hanulus tuṛ hapәkik hanvam tan pavicara-->
.
.
2415<p n="III.97">hana brata, kraca dyus, ṅa, hadyusarahina vәṅi, lǝṅa siphatnya, pha, svarga mantuk riṅ kendrān, majanma vicakṣaṇa hanulus, tur anom apkik kalah āla.

. </note>
. <ptr target="#N"/> in III.97 <ptr target="#P"/> in III…………. </note>
2420</app>
.</p>
.
.<!-- N hana bratta, hamaṅan saṛvva mǝntaḥ, bhaghavan haṅgaṣṭi hyaṁniṁ brata, pha, dadi deva, sasaṛnya dadi ratū, kinasiha niṁ hyaṁ, prajurit haṅalahakǝn kabeḥ, norana madanāna, tan kna sehabrata -->
.
2425<p n="III.98">hana brata, amaṅan sarva mǝntah, bhaghavan haṅgaṣṭi hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, dadi deva, sasarnya dadi ratu, kinasihaniṅ hyaṅ, prajurit haṅalahakǝn [śatru] kabeh, norana madanāna, tan kna seha brata.

.<!-- N hana bratā hasuci lakṣaṇa, ṅa, tan pamaṅan hyan duruṅ ārarahup¸ halǝṅhā, pha, hapkiker̥ṅan , sapari polihiṅ abratā, l̥ vǝsiṁ rambut, hasḍǝpiṁ paṅūcap, mvaṁ rūpā -->
.<!-- U hana bratā haśuci lakṣaṇā, ṅa, tan pamaṅan yan duaruṁ hararavup, hal̥l̥ṅa. pha, hapkik ker̥ṅan, saparipolah iṁṅ abrātā, l̥vas iṁ rambut, hasdhәp iṁ pāṅucap, mvaṁ rūpā -->

.

.<!-- N hana bratā, mavastra śudḍa malā, mantranya, Om̐ śudḍa pāpa, śudḍa malā, 3, śudḍa śudḍa pinariśudā, śudḍa śudḍa pinarivastu. phalanya, hilaṁ malā patakā, pāpa kalesanta, samayanya kaṁ bratta, tigaṁ daśa dinā, hanambut riṁ tīlǝm, hasalaḥ riṁ tīlǝm, hasalaḥ bratā, sahā skaṛ rvaniṁ śudḍa malā, ptekakna rvanya, mañomponi petaṅan mantranyā-->
.
.<!-- P hana brata suddha mala vastranyā, Iti mantranya, ma, Ōm̐ suddha papā suddha māla suddhā suddhā pinarisuddha, Ōm̐, phalanya hilaṁ malā patakā papā kleṣan, samayaniṁ bratā, 30, dinā, manaṅgap riṁ til̥m, saha sәkaṛ suddha malā macaru suci sadandanan-->
.
2460

.<!-- N hana bratā, yan taṅgal piṁ, 1, taṅgal piṁ, 2, taṅgal piṁ, 3, hakambǝn śudāmalā, havastra sacci, yan vus ālabahan , pha, rū pānta lañjar·, hapkik paripuṛṇna, yan lanaṁ habratta, kalamaṛ deniṁ histri, yan istri, kalamar deniṁ kakūṁ, handaka rūpā haraniṁ bratā maṅkana-->
2470<!-- P hana bratā handakā rūpā, ṅa, yan taṅgal hapisan pindo, piṁ tәlu, hakamәn suddha mala, hastra śaci, yan vus ahabahan, phalanya tan kasoran rupānta, dira prajñan -->
.

.<!-- N hana bratā, tan pamaṅan jambe tan sinigar deniṁ ladiṁ, phā, tan tǝkǝs deniṁ saṛvva laṇḍǝp, jaya ri yuddā tan kevǝhan -->

.

.

.<!-- N hana bratā, hamaṅan sakpǝl, tatkalaniṁ taḍahan sapulukan, pituṁ vṅi lavasan ika, pha, kinasihaniṁ rāt, mvaṁ jananurāga, Ekaki ṅaraniṁ brata maṅkana -->
.

2650
.<!-- N hana bratā, haturū haṅadǝg, sabhāgya yen aṅeka padḍa pisan, pituṁ vṅi samayanyā, yen kita hamaṅan sakpǝl sarahina, yan aṅinūm bañu sahlǝd, tluṁ dinā, tluṁ vṅi samayanya, pha, sapocapan riṁ devā, byakta śakti tkeṁ kamokṣan -->
.
.<p n="III.119">hana brata, haturū haṅadǝg, sabhāgya yen aṅeka paddha pisan, pituṅ vәṅi samayanyā, yen kita amaṅan sakpǝl sarahina, yan aṅinūm bañu sahlǝd, tәluṅ dinā, tәluṅ vәṅi samayanya, pha, sapocapan riṅ devā, byakta śakti tkeṅ kamokṣan.
.<app><lem wit="#N"></lem>
2655 <note> hana bratā, haturū ... tkeṁ kamokṣan <note>
. </note>
. <ptr target="#N"/> in III.119 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
2660
.<!-- N hana bratā, maṅan rvaṁ kpǝl , pituṁ vṅi lavasānya, guṇa mogha ḍataṁ, tan kevu han , phalanya, Anidra ṅaraniṁ bratā maṅkana -->
.
.<p n="III.120">hana brata, maṅan rvaṅ kpǝl, pituṅ vәṅi lavasānya, guṇa mogha dhataṅ, tan kevuhan, phalanya, Anidra ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.
. <app><lem wit="#N"></lem>
2665 <note> hana bratā, maṅan ... bratā maṅkana <note>
. </note>
. <ptr target="#N"/> in III.120 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
2670
.<!-- N hana bratta maṅan tigaṁ kpǝl, tri masā, tiga vṅi lavasānya, pha, kinasihaniṁ rat, tri samaya ṅaraniṁ brata maṅkāna -->
.
.<p n="III.121">hana brata maṅan ¬tigaṅ kpǝl, tri masā, tiga vәṅi lavasānya, pha, kinasihaniṅ rat, tri samaya ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkāna.
. <app><lem wit="#N"></lem>
2675 <note> hana bratta maṅan ... brata maṅkāna <note>
. </note>
. <ptr target="#N"/> in III.121 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
2680
.<!-- N hana bratā, hamañca gǝmā, ṅa, hamaṅan sgā limaṅ kpǝl sari sarī, limaṅ lek ṣamayanya, pha, kinasihan deniṁ samanta janmā, kaśruguṇa, kaviṛyyavān, kāsubhagyān sugiḥ sidḍi mantra -->
.
.<!-- U hanā bratā hamañca gәma, ṅa, hamaṅan sgā limaṁ kpәl sarahina, limaṁṅ lek paveḥ samayanya, pha, kinasiha niṁ sama janmā, kasrugun, kaviṛyyan kasubhāgyan sugiḥ, siddi mantra -->
.
2685<p n="III.122">hana brata, hamañca gǝmā, ṅa, amaṅan sәga limaṅ kpǝl sari sarī, limaṅ lek samayanya, pha, kinasihan deniṅ samanta janma, kaśruguṇa , kavīryavan, kāsubhagyān sugih siddhi mantra.
.<app><lem wit="#N #U"></lem>
. <note> hana bratā, hamañca ... sidḍi mantra <note>
. </note>
. <ptr target="#N"/> in III.122 <ptr target="#U"/> in III.82 </note>
2690</app>
.</p>
.
.<!-- N hana bratā, maṅan pituṁ kpǝl, saptā latri lavasanya, guṇa mogha ḍataṁ, saṛvva viṣā tan kataman kittha, yeka phalanya, catūṛ mukā ṅaraniṁ brata maṅkana -->
.
2695<p n="III.123">hana brata, maṅan pituṅ kpǝl, saptā latri lavasanya, guṇamogha dhataṅ, sarva viṣā tan kataman kita, yeka phalanya, catūr mukā ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.
.<app><lem wit="#N"></lem>
. <note> hana bratā, maṅan ... brata maṅkana <note>
. </note>
. <ptr target="#N"/> in III.123 </note>
2700</app>
.</p>
.
.<!-- G hana brāta maṅan pituṁ kpәl, ṅa, pataṅ lek samayanya, phalanika, amūkti suka riṁ dlāhanta -->
.<!-- N hana bratta, hamaṅān pituṁ kpǝl, pataṁ lek ṣamayanya, pha, hamūkti suka riṁ dlāha -->
2705<!-- P hana brata maṅan pituṁ kәpәl sarahinā, pәtaṁ lek ṣamayanya, phalanya, mukti suka kiteṁ dlāhā -->
.<!-- U hanā brata hamaṅan pituṁ kpәl, pataṅ lek ṣamayanya, pha, Amukti suka riṁ dlānta -->
.<!-- U hana brata hamaṅan pituṁ kpәl, pataṅ lek samayanya, pha, hamukti suka riṁ dlāhanta -->
.
.<p n="III.124">hana brata, amaṅan pituṅ kpǝl, pataṅ lek samayanya, pha, hamūkti suka riṅ dlāha.

. <note> hana bratta, hamaṅān ... riṁ dlāha <note>
. </note>
. <ptr target="#G"/> in III.55 <ptr target="#N"/> in III.124 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.54 <ptr target="#U"/> in III.63, III.65 </note>
.</app>
2715</p>
.
.<!-- N hana bratā, hamaṅan saṅaṁ kpǝl, naṅkə̄n puṛṇnama, mr̥ttiharā, ṅa, molihā tigaṁ kasaṅhā, pha, mantuk mariṁ svaṛgga bhaṭāra Indrā, sasaṛnya mañjanma mariṁ vvaṁ listvayu paripuṛṇnā, sugiḥ saṅkan rare -->
.
.<p n="III.125">hana brata, amaṅan saṅaṅ kpǝl, naṅkə̄n pūrṇama, mrәttiharā, ṅa, molihā tigaṅ kasaṅhā, pha, mantuk mariṅ svarga bhaṭāra Indrā, sasarnya mañjanma mariṅ vvaṅ listvayu paripurṇnā, sugih saṅkan rare.

. </note>

2725</p>
.
.<!-- N hana brata maṅan sadaśa kpǝl , taḍaḥ pisan , sadaśa lek lavasanya, pha, salviṛniṁ lara rogha tan tame kitthā, haṅaḍavā ṅaraniṁ brata maṅkana -->
.
.<p n="III.126">hana brata maṅan sadaśa kpǝl, tadhah pisan, sadaśa lek lavasanya, pha, salvirniṅ lara rogha tan tame kita, haṅadhavā ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.

.

.<!-- N hana brata, haṅapitu, ṅa, hamaṅan pituṅ kpǝl , moliha tigaṁ kapitu, pha, mantuk riṁ bhaṭāra brahmā, sasaṛnya mañjanmā riṁ vvaṁ sugiḥ saṅkan rare, listvayu paripuṛṇna -->
.
2740<p n="III.127">hana brata, haṅapitu, ṅa, amaṅan pituṅ kpǝl, moliha tigaṅ kapitu, pha, mantuk riṅ bhaṭāra brahmā, sasarnya majanma riṅ vvaṅ sugih saṅkan rare, listvayu paripurṇna.

. </note>

.
.<!-- N hana brata, naṅkǝn radite Umanis , hamaṅan sǝga sakpǝl , tluṁ radite Umanis , pha, tis manak ānak, trus tumus tkaniṅ ānak putu buyut, suka sugiḥ tan kabañcana -->
.
2750<!-- P hana brata nāṅkәnradite manis, hamaṅan sakәpәl, tәka roṁ radite hamaṅan roṁ kәpәl, tәka tәluṁ radite hamaṅan tigaṁ kәpәl, phalanyatis manak hanak, tәrus tumus tәkaniṁ hanak putu buyut suka sugiḥ tan kavicarā-->
.
.<p n="III.128">hana brata, naṅkǝn radite Umanis, amaṅan sǝga sakpǝl, [oliha] tluṅ radite Umanis, pha, tis manak ānak, trus tumus təkaniṅ ānak putu buyut, sukasugih tan kabañcana.

.</app>
.</p>
.
2760<!-- N hana bratā tañkul bañu·, ṅa, kramanya, hamaṅan sgā sakpǝl , sadina, beñjaṅanya rvaṁ kpǝl, vuhanannya, 3, kpǝl , tlu nanyā malabahan , ma, Om̐ niroghā, niṛpāpa, niṛmmāla, niṁ bape bu lukaṛ muliḥ jati nityasā. hamaṅan tan pahuyaḥ, tan pahivak, kneṁ dyus kevalā, tan kneṁ lisaḥ, tan kǝneṁ vḍak, tan paṅinūm tuvak, tan paṅinaṁ, tan paturu rahina, tan kabañcaran, pha, Ilaṁ salviriṁ larā rogha -->
.<!-- P hana brata hañәkul bañyu, ṅa, kramanya, hamaṅan sәga sakәpәl sadinā, beñjaṅnya rvaṁ kәpәl, vuvananya, 3, kәpәl, tlunanya malabahan, mantra niṁ hamaṅan, ma, Ōm̐ niṛroghā niṛpapā nirmala nirbapebu, lukaṛ muliḥ jati nityaṣā hamaṅan tan pahivak, kәneṁ dyus kevala tan kәneṁ lisaḥ tan kәne vәdhak tan paṅinum tuvak tan paṅinum salvir amuroni, tan haṅinaṁ sәr̥ḥ tan paturu riṁ rahinā tan kabañcaran phalanya hilaṁ salviriṁ rarā roghanta-->
.
.
.<p n="III.129">hana bratañkul bañu, ṅa, kramanya, amaṅan sәga sakpǝl, sadina, beñjaṅanya rvaṅ kpǝl, puhanannya, 3, kpǝl, tlunanyā malabahan, ma, Om̐ niroghā, nirpāpa, nirmmāla, niṅ bape bu lukar mulih jati nityasā. amaṅan tan pahuyah, tan pahivak, kneṅ dyus kevalā, tan kneṅ lisah, tan kǝneṅ vdhak, tan paṅinūm tuvak, tan paṅinaṅ, tan paturu rahina, tan kabañcaran , pha, Ilaṅ salviriṅ larārogha.

. <note> hana bratā tañkul ... larā rogha <note>
. </note>
. <ptr target="#N"/> in III.129 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.58 </note>
.</app>
2770</p>
.
.<!-- N maniḥ bratta ñkul bañu, riṁ ckokiṁ taṅan paṅan sga sakpǝl , toya sackokiṁ taṅan , tigaṁ dinā samayanya, sabagya, 5, dinā, ma, kbas valuya jati. pha, nirlāra vighna -->
.
.<p n="III.130">manih brata ñkul bañu, riṅ ckokiṅ taṅan paṅan sәga sakpǝl, toya sackokiṅ taṅan, tigaṅ dinā samayanya, sabagya, 5, dinā, ma, kbas valuya jati. pha, nirlāra vighna.

. </note>

2780</p>
.
.<!-- N hana bratā ñkul bañu, vaḍaḥ dadasar cmǝṁ, ma, Om̐ hana boloṁ tan pahudǝran , Ana boloṁ tan pamala, nirvighna nirttaṅis, Ōm̐ śrī srī ya namaḥ svāha, Om̐ mam̐ ya namaḥ svahā||hamita ri saṅ āsḍahan brata, ri saṅgar·, ma, Om̐ mam̐ Iśvara ya namaḥ svāhā-->
.
.<!-- P hana brata mañjiṁ limā, ṅa, yan hamaṅan sәgā kālavan toya riṁ dadasaṛ cәmәṁ, limaṁ dinā samayanya, ma, Ōm̐ hana mala tan paboloṁ, hana mala tan pahudәran niṛrūpadrava, niṛmalā maliṇa yan halabahan bantәn saṛvva suci l̥ṅa burat vaṅi, mahar̥piṁ saṅgaṛ -->
2785
.<!-- U hana bratā añәkul bañu, śa, vadhaḥnya dhadhasar cәmәng, ma, Om̐ hana boloṁ tan pahedәran, hana boloṁ tan pamala, nirvighna niṁ taṅis, Om̐ śri śri ya namaḥ svāhā. Om̐ mam̐ Iśvara ya namaḥ svahā. hamita ri saṅ asdahan brata, riṁ saṅgaṛ, ma, Om̐ mam̐ Iśvara ya namaḥ svāha -->
.
.<p n="III.131">hana bratañkul bañu, vadhah dadasar cmǝṅ, ma, Om̐ hana boloṅ tan pahudǝran, Ana boloṅ tan pamala, nirvighna nirtaṅis, Ōm̐ śrī srīya namah svāhā, Om̐ mam̐ ya namah svāhā. hamita ri saṅ āsәḍahan brata, ri saṅgar, ma, Om̐ mam̐ Iśvarāya namah .
.<app><lem wit="#N #P #U"></lem>

. </note>
. <ptr target="#N"/> in III.131 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.60 <ptr target="#U"/> in III.67 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
2795
.<!-- N hana bratāñkul bañu, ṅa, hamaṅan sacalovakaniṁ taṅan , pituṁ vṅi samayanya, nasi kalavan bañu, ma, Om̐ niṛroghā, niṛpāpa niṛbapebu, lukǝṁ muliḥ jatinya saḥ, lukar sapāpaniṁ śarīra, mvaṁ pāpaniṁ bapebu-->
.
.<!-- U hana brata hañkul bañu, ṅa, hamaṅan sacalovoka niṁ taṅan, pituṁ vṅi samayanya, nasi kalavan bañu, ma, Om̐ niroga nirpāpa nirbape bu, lukәṁ muliḥ jātinya saḥ, lukaṛ sapāpa niṁ śarira, mvaṁ pāpa niṁ bapebu-->
.
2800<p n="III.132">hana bratañkul bañu, ṅa, amaṅan sacalovakaniṅ taṅan, pituṅ vәṅi samayanya, nasi kalavan bañu, ma, Om̐ nirroghā, nirpāpa nirbapebu, lukǝṅ mulih jatinyasah, lukar sapāpaniṅ śarīra, mvaṅ pāpaniṅ bapebu.

. </note>

.</p>
.
.
.<!-- G nihan kramaniṁ brāta añakul bañu, mañjiṁ lima, yan amaṅan sakәpәl pinuluk, bañu sacḷkuk, mantra, Om̐ åna boloṁ tan paundәran, hana boloṁ tan pamala, nirvighnā nirtaṅis, Om̐ śrī ya ve namu nama svāhā, maliḥ amuluk sgā, bañu saclakuk, maniḥ mantra, maniḥ amuluk sgā, bañu maṅkana, yan muspa, 3, sakavaśa denta abhukti, avusan aṅinum bañu, aṅinaṁ -->
2810
.<!-- N hana brata ñkul bañu, mañjiṁ limā, ṅa, puluṁ kaṁ skul, 1, Inumi bañu, 1, maliḥ hamuluṁ skul, 1, hinūmi bañu, piṁ tlu hiṅane, raris hamaṅan, sakar̥piṅ āmaṅan vnaṁ, vusaniṅ āmaṅan, ṅinūm bañu, raris ākmuḥ havajik, haṅinaṁ, mari vtǝṅi voṁ, samaṅkana huga kramanya, saglǝmiṅ abrata, Utama lavasnya satahun, ma, Om̐ hana boloṁ tan pamala, hana boloṁ tan paUndǝrān, niṛvighna nirttaṅis niṛrogā, nirUpādravā, niṁ mala malinā, pha, hilaṁ saṛvva malā niṁ śarīranta, kinasihan deniṁ saṁ prabhu, mvaṁ deva sih iri kitthā-->
.
.<p n="III.133">hana brata ñkul bañu, mañjiṅ limā, ṅa, puluṅ kaṅ sәkul, 1, Inumi bañu, 1, malih hamuluṅ sәkul, 1, hinūmi bañu, piṅ tlu hiṅane, raris amaṅan, sakarәpiṅ amaṅan vәnaṅ, vusaniṅ amaṅan, ṅinūm bañu, raris ākmuh havajik, haṅinaṅ, mari vtǝṅi voṅ, samaṅkana huga kramanya, saglǝmiṅ abrata, Utama lavasnya satahun, ma, Om̐ hana boloṅ tan pamala, hana boloṅ tan paUndǝrān, nirvighna nirttaṅis nirrogā, nirUpādravā, niṅ mala malinā, pha, hilaṅ sarva malāniṅ śarīranta, kinasihan deniṅ saṅ prabhu, mvaṅ deva sih iri kita.
.<app><lem wit="#G #N"></lem>
2815 <note> hana brata ñkul ... iri kitthā <note>
. </note>
. <ptr target="#G"/> in III.60 <ptr target="#N"/> in III.133 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
2820
.
.<!-- G mantraniṁ ankul bañu, ma, saṁ dr̥mbāmoha, sira amaṅana mariṁ pajagalan, saṅ kāla visāya, sira maṅana mariṁ pajuden, saṁ kāla ṅadhaṁ, sira amaṅa{na} mariṁ dhalan guṁ, saṅ kāla kaṭuṁ, sira maṅana mariṁ pasar·, ri uvus adyusa rumuhun, makaramāsa, māsisiga, marvi-rvihan-->
.<!-- N hana bratta ñkul bañu, ma, saṁ dr̥mba moha, maṅana riṁ pasaṛ, saṁ kāla ṅaḍaṁ, sira maṅana riṁ dalan guṁ, saṁ kāla katuṁ, sira maṅanā riṁ pajagalan , vusanirā hamaṅan, muliha mariṁ rāga valunaniṅ hulun, rovaṅaniṅ hulun makaṛyyā hayu, Om̐ sidḍi rastu-->
.
2825<!-- P mamantra mañәkul bañu, saṁ dr̥mba moha sira hamaṅana mariṁ pajagalan, saṁ kāla viṣaya sira hamaṅan riṁ pajuden, saṁ kāla ṅadam sira hamaṅan mariṁ dalan guṁ, saṁ kāla katum sira hamaṅan riṁ pasaṛ haguṁ, ri vuvus sira hamaṅan haṅinum, sira mulihā mariṁ raga valunakveṁ hulun, rovaṅaniṅ hulun hamaṅun hayu-->
.
.<!-- U brāta hañәkul bañu, ma, saṁ dr̥mbha moha siḥ hamaṅana riṁ pajagalan, saṁ kālā ṅadhaṁ sira hamaṅana riṁ dalan guṁ saṁ kalā viṣaya sira hamaṅana riṁ pasaṛ, saṁ kāla kәtuṁ sirā hamaṅana riṁ pajuden, vus sira hamaṅan mulihā sira riṁ rāga valu niṅ hulun, rovaṅāniṅ hulun hamaṅan kāṛyya hayu, Om̐ siddi rastu-->
.
.
2830<p n="III.134">hana brata ñkul bañu, ma, saṅ drәmba moha, maṅana riṅ pasar, saṅ kāla ṅadhaṅ, sira maṅana riṅ dalan guṅ, saṅ kāla katuṅ, sira maṅanā riṅ pajagalan, vusanirā amaṅan, muliha mariṅ rāga valunaniṅ hulun, rovaṅaniṅ hulun makaryyā hayu, Om̐ siddhir astu.
.<app><lem wit="#G #N #P #U"></lem>
. <note> hana bratta ñkul ... Om̐ sidḍi rastu <note>
. </note>
. <ptr target="#G"/> in III.61 <ptr target="#N"/> in III.134 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.57 <ptr target="#U"/> in III.68 </note>
2835</app>
.</p>
.
.<!-- N hana bratā tan paṅinūm bañu, tatkalaniṅ amaṅān , yan kaśr̥ḍǝp, hatlasan pisan kita maṅan pituṅ lek ṣamayanyā, pha, tan āsǝr̥t kaṁ sinadyanta, mogha mrih iri kita -->
.
2840<p n="III.135">hana brata tan paṅinūm bañu, tatkalaniṅ amaṅān, yan kaśrәdhǝp , hatlasan pisan kita maṅan pituṅ lek ṣamayanyā, pha, tan āsǝrәt kaṅ sinadyanta, mogha mrih iri kita.

. </note>
. <ptr target="#N"/> in III.135 </note>
2845</app>
.</p>
.
.<!-- N hana bratta tan paṅinūm bañu, satahun divaśanyā, pha, śakti, hyaṁ pādma hyaṁniṁ bratā -->
.
2850<p n="III.136">hana brata tan paṅinūm bañu, satahun divasanyā, pha, śakti, hyaṅ pādma hyaṅniṅ brata.
.<app><lem wit="#N"></lem>
. <note> hana bratta tan ... hyaṁniṁ bratā <note>
. </note>
. <ptr target="#N"/> in III.136 </note>
2855</app>
.</p>
.
.<!-- N hana brata hamaṅan havaḍaḥ godoṁ, sinaṅga riṁ taṅan kivā, tan pavuvuḥ, pha, kinasihan deniṁ rāt, vkasan tan paṅinūm bañu, saglǝmiṅ abratā, sidḍa sadyā phalanya -->
.
2860<p n="III.137">hana brata amaṅan havadhah godoṅ, sinaṅga riṅ taṅan kiva, tan pavuvuh, pha, kinasihan deniṅ rāt, vkasan tan paṅinūm bañu, saglǝmiṅ abrata, siddha sadyā phalanya.
. <app><lem wit="#N"></lem>
. <note> hana brata hamaṅan ... sadyā phalanya <note>
. </note>
. <ptr target="#N"/> in III.137 </note>
2865</app>
.</p>
.
.<!-- N hana brata hamaṅan tan pembuḥ, pituṁ tahun samayanyā, pha, bhoga gə̄ṁ tka -->
.<!-- P hana brata maṅan tan pembuḥ, pituṁ tavun samayanya, phalanya bhoga magәṁ tinәmunta -->
2870<!-- U hāna brata hamaṅan tan pahimbuḥ, pituṁ tahun samayanya, pha, priḥ meṅgal katmu. hanā U brata hamaṅan tan pahimbuḥ, pituṁ tahun samayanya, pha, priḥ meṅgal katmu -->
.
.<p n="III.138">hana brata amaṅan tan pembuh, pituṅ tahun samayanyā, pha, bhoga gə̄ṅ təka.
.<app><lem wit="#N #P #U"></lem>
. <note> hana brata hamaṅan ... gə̄ṁ tka <note>
2875 </note>
. <ptr target="#N"/> in III.138 <ptr target="#P"/> in III.21 <ptr target="#U"/> in III.56, III.57 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
.
2880<!-- N hana brata, tan dadyā tambǝḥ, pituṁ vṅi lavasānya, medā prājja sidḍa kaṛyya phalanya, Aniraṁ ṅaraniṁ bratā maṅkana -->
.
.<p n="III.139">Hana brata, tan dadyā tambǝh, pituṅ vәṅi lavasānya, medā prājja siddha kārya phalanya, Aniraṅ ṅaraniṅbrata maṅkana.
.<app><lem wit="#N"></lem>
. <note> hana brata, tan ... bratā maṅkana <note>
2885 </note>
. <ptr target="#N"/> in III.139 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
.
2890<!-- N hana bratā tan pavuvuḥ, tan paṅinūm bañu, lamun sāmpun āṅinaṁ, haṅinūm bañu vnaṁ, saglǝmiṅ habrata, pha, prajurit kittha -->
.
.<p n="III.140">hana brata tan pavuvuh, tan paṅinūm bañu, lamun sāmpun āṅinaṅ, haṅinūm bañu vәnaṅ, saglǝmiṅ habrata,
.pha, prajurit kita.
.<app><lem wit="#N"></lem>
2895 <note> hana bratā tan ... prajurit kittha <note>
. </note>
. <ptr target="#N"/> in III.140 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
2900
.<!-- N hana brata hamaṅanāron , sinaṅgā tan patḍa tan pavuvuḥ, tigaṁ vṅi la vasnya, pādma raṅkǝp, ṅa, saṁ hyaṁ capuṛiṁ rāt sira turun ābrata, pinakā gulu jariji suku, thǝṛ kinasihaniṁ rāt -->
.
.<p n="III.141">hana brata amaṅanā ron, sinaṅgā tan patdha tan pavuvuh, tigaṅ vәṅi lavasnya, pādma raṅkǝp, ṅa, saṅ hyaṅ capuriṅ rāt sira turun ābrata, pinakāgulu jariji suku, tәhәr kinasihaniṅ rāt.
.<app><lem wit="#N"></lem>
2905 <note> hana brata hamaṅanāron ... kinasihaniṁ rāt <note>
. </note>
. <ptr target="#N"/> in III.141 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
2910
.<!-- N hana bratā hamaṅan tan pavuvuḥ, pituṁ vṅi lavasnyā, sidḍa kaṛyya, kinasihaniṁ rāt phalanya -->
.
.<p n="III.142">hana brata amaṅan tan pavuvuh, pituṅ vәṅi lavasnya, siddha kārya, kinasihaniṅ rāt phalanya.
.<app><lem wit="#N"></lem>
2915 <note> hana bratā hamaṅan ... rāt phalanya <note>
. </note>
. <ptr target="#N"/> in III.142 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
2920
.<!-- N hana brata hamaṅān papā davun, sinaṅga riṁ taṅan kivā, tan patḍa tan patambǝḥ, hyaṁ hekṣasaṇā turun abratā, pha, kinasihaniṁ rāt -->
.
.<p n="III.143">hana brata amaṅan papā davun, sinaṅga riṅ taṅan kiva, tan patdha tan patambǝh, hyaṅ hekṣasaṇā turun abrata, pha, kinasihaniṅ rāt.
.<app><lem wit="#N"></lem>
2925 <note> hana brata hamaṅān ... kinasihaniṁ rāt <note>
. </note>
. <ptr target="#N"/> in III.143 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
2930
.<!-- N hana bratā tan dadya tambǝḥ, pituṁ vṅi lavasanyā, medaprajjā sidḍa kaṛyya phalanyā, Anira ṅāraniṁ brata maṅkana -->
.
.<p n="III.144">hana brata tan dady atambǝh, pituṅ vәṅi lavasanyā, meda prajjā siddha kārya phalanyā, Anira ṅāraniṅ brata maṅkana.
.<app><lem wit="#N"></lem>
2935 <note> hana bratā tan... brata maṅkana <note>
. </note>
. <ptr target="#N"/> in III.144 </note>
.</app>
.</p>
2940
.
.<p n="III.145">hana brata, yan amaṅan tan patdhā tan patambǝh, pha, tan paśatru kita riṅ niṣkalā.</p>
.
.<p n="III.146">hana brata mona, ṅa, yan amaṅan tan paṅūcap, tigaṅ tahūn samayānya, bhaṭāra rudra hyaṅnya, ma, Om̐ rudrāya namah . pamit, pha, kinatvaṅan deniṅ jagat, siddha saprayojñānanta.</p>
2945
.<p n="III.147">hana brata, maṅan amona, tan paṅinum bañu, vusiṅ amaṅān haṅinūm bañu, haṅūcapaknā, pha, tan knā gǝgǝriṅə̄n, viśeṣā riṅ bhūmi, keḍәp kapintuhu, pituṅ śaśih divasanya.
.
.</p>
.
2950<p n="III.148">hana brata, munarakā, tan paṅūcap lamun amaṅan, tluṅ tahun samayanya, bhaṭāra rūdra hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, ginañjar deniṅ hyaṅ kabeh, guṇa təka.</p>
.
.<p n="III.149">hana brata, muna maṅan. muna nap. muna muris. muna susur muna bhaṣmā. muna napuh. muna ṅisiṅ.</p>
.
.<p>kunaṅ mulihiṅ munā,</p>
2955
.<p>[149.1] muna maṅan, pha, vicakṣaṇā dirgghā yuṣā kita.</p>
.<p>[149.2] munanap, pha, kinasihan deniṅ rāt, prabhu vikū.</p>
.<p>[149.3] muna bhasma, pha, mantuk iṅ bhaṭārī rātrī, sasarnya majanma riṅ vikū śakti.</p>
.<p>[149.4] muna napuh, pha, kinasihaniṅ paṇḍita, mvaṅ deva prabhu, rahayu riṅ pañjanmanta.</p>
2960<p>[149.5] muna ṅisiṅ, pha, prih meṅgal katәmu, bahu siṣya kita.</p>
.<p>[149.6] muna sisig, pha, jaya kāryanta, prabha kiteṅ kamokṣan.</p>
.<p>[149.7] muna muris, pha, siddha kāryanta, pinrihta muna təka.</p>
.
.<p n="III.150">hana brata, pañca mukā, ṅa, naṅkǝn kalivon hamona sasore, haṅraṅkus brata kabeh, pha, hamaṅgih suka magə̄ṅ, majanma riṅ sugih sәkul hamukti saṅkan rare, keḍәp deniṅ rāt kabeh.
2965</p>
.
.<p n="III.151">hana brata ṅunir, ṅa, yan amaṅan sәkul kinunirān, lavasnya saglǝmiṅ ābrata, bhaṭāra mahādeva hyaṅnya, pha, mulih mariṅ svarga bhaṭāra mahādeva, sasarnya mañjanma riṅ dam puvavaṅ, sugih dana hulun, labdha vara ri sa
.ṅ āhulun.
.
2970</p>
.
.<p n="III.152">hana brata amaṅan kuñit, makālalab, Amanah kañcana, ṅa, pha, sugih hmās.</p>
.
.<p n="III.153">hana brata, haṅuniṅ, ṅa, sәkul kuniṅ juga pinaṅan, yan tan maṅkana, kunir juga makalalab, pituṅ ta [28 v] hun samayanya, bhaṭārī ratih hyaṅiṅ brata, pha, mantuk iṅ svarga bhaṭāra mahādeva, sasarnya mañjanma riṅ dam puvavaṅ śakti.</p>
2975
.<p n="III.154">hana brata ṅuniṅ, ṅa, kunir paṅan rumuhun, salek lavasnya, ma, Om̐ niryyāya namah svāhā.</p>
.
.<p n="III.155">hana brata, hambhīma, ṅa, yan amaṅan mevakā Uyah, satahun tigaṅ lek divasanya, bhaṭāra Iśvara hyaṅnya, ma, Om̐ mam̐ Iśvarāya namah, pamit, pha, siṅ pinrih meṅgal katәmu, kinasihan de saṅ pāndhita, mvaṅ deva bhūtha sih īri kita.
.
2980</p>
.
.<p n="III.156">hana brata mbhima, ṅa, yan taṅgal, piṅ 12, riṅ kapitu, hamatihāra, pha, suka vrәddhi, tūr sidi mantra, jayeṅ śatru, keḍәp kapintuhu deniṅ rat, hamupu saprajjāniṅ voṅ kabeh.
.
.</p>
2985
.<p n="III.157">hana brata hambhīma, ṅa, yan amaṅan mevakā Uyah, putihiṅ taluh, bhaṅ pṭak, pa, amaṅan ktan bāṅ, bavaṅ bāṅ, pva, amaṅan sәga kuniṅ, mevaka kuniṅiṅ taluh, va, amaṅan ktan hirṅ, mevakā bakulā, ka, amaṅanā sәga hamañca varṇnā, mevekā salvirnya, pha, sugih mās salakā, mvaṅ vsi.
.
.</p>
.
2990<p n="III.158">hana brata mona turu sumaṇḍah, tigaṅ lek samayanya, bhaṭāra viṣṇu hyaṅnya, ma, Om̐ um̐ um̐ viṣṇu ve namah, pha, labdha vara kita, mandi sakcapta.
.
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.159">hana brata turu sumandyah, ṅa, salek lavasnya, bhaṭāra sambhu maveh brata, pha, hapkikevanan tajā kulā.
2995
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.160">hana brata, humbhakarṇna, ṅa, yan aturu, miriṅ satahun, roṅ tahun samayanya, devantara hyaṅnya, ma, Om̐ devantarāya namah, pamit, pha, putra vrәddhi, pamtik vәnaṅ vәnaṅ madasih samā vrәddhi.
.
3000</p>
.
.<p n="III.161">hana brata, kumavaśa, ṅa, pituṅ kulǝm tan knā riṅ turu rahina vәṅi, pha, viryyavan siddha sakāryanta, tan pamaṅgih kevǝh.
.
.</p>
3005
.<p n="III.162">hana brata, niṅibu, ṅa, amaṅan sarva hibu, pataṅ lek divaśānya, pha, mulih riṅ [svarga] bhaṭāra rudra, sasarnya majanma riṅ kulā !saṅ kumbhakarṇnā, haturu tan paṅlihan, rahinā vәṅi tur a [29v] ṅūpavaśā, pha, keḍәp saparipolahta.!
.
.</p>
.
3010<p n="III.163">hana brata, tan pamaṅan tan paturū, saṅ hyaṅ tan kaviśeṣā hyaṅnya, pha, svarga titisnya.
.
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.164">hana brata, lәvih turu, ṅa, tan trәṣṇeṅ paṅān, bhaṭārī keśavā
3015hyaṅiṅ brata, pha, mantuk riṅ svarga bhaṭāraśiva, majanma ri kula putra, luputiṅ lara vighnā, subhaga hanulus.
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.165">hana brata, mopavaśā pituṅ ratrī, hatәhәr tan kneṅ turu rahina vәṅi, bhaṭāra śīvā hyaṅiṅbrata, ma, Om̐ nāma śivāya, pamit, pha, viyyavan , [pha,] sakāryanta siddā, tәhәr siddhi.
.
3020</p>
.
.<p n="III.166">hana brata hambhira, ṅa, yan amaṅan mevakā Uyah kevalā, satahun tigaṅ lek samayanya, pha, prih meṅgal katәmu,
.deva bhūtha sih iri kita.
.
3025</p>
.
.<p n="III.167">hana brata aṅlavar, ṅa, tan pamaṅaniṅ uyahan, satahun divasanya, bhaṭāra saṅkara hyaṅnya, pha, mulih riṅ kendran, sasarnya majanma riṅ listvayu prajña kita. </p>
.
.<p n="III.168">hana brata, ṅlavar, ṅa, tan pamaṅan huyah, pat vulan ptaṅ vәṅi samayanya, bhaṭāra saṅkara hyaṅnya, pha, mantuk mariṅ kendran, sasarnya majanma listu hayu paripurṇnā.
3030
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.169">hana brata, aṅupavāsa, ṅa, lamunāmaṅān haṅgugut huyah ārәṅ rumuhun, 3, tavun divasanya, bhaṭārī gaṅgā hyaṅniṅ brata, ma, Om̐ gaṅgāya nama svāhā, pha, saparipolahta kinerәṅan deniṅ jagat.
.
3035</p>
.
.<p n="III.170">hana brata, maṅan tumpǝṅ hivak huyah harәṅ, bhaṭāra Iśvara hyaṅnya, ya pinakarūpā, pinakāśvaraniṅ kiduṅ caritta, pha, manisiṅ panutukan.
.
.</p>
3040
.<p n="III.171">hana brata, amaṅan kǝmbhaṅ, naṅkǝn, U, hivak huyah ārәṅ, vusiṅ amaṅan, haṅinaṅ suruh pupucuk, haṅliṅggā
.kǝmbaṅ, ṅa, pha, suka sugih, rūpā haheṅ.
.
.</p>
3045
.<p n="III.172">hana brata, amaṅan tan pahuyah, pituṅ vәṅi samayanya, pha, śaktinta dhataṅ, tәhәr kinatvaṅān deniṅ hyaṅ. </p>
.
.<p n="III.173">hana brata, amaṅan arasotih, ṅa, hadahar uyāh ārәṅ minakā vulam, lama pituṅ dinā, ranini padukā bhaṭārī śarasoti hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, prajñan.
.
3050</p>
.
.<p n="III.174">nihan krәtta maśa, ṅa, hayuni ṅhulun, sakārya hayu, makadi vatǝk habrata, nūt āvarah,</p>
.<p>śaśih ka, 1, taṅ, piṅ, 10, saṅ hyaṅ vira kusuma devatanya, bratanya, hayva maṅan sarva buṅkah, pha, sugih hanom bhrәman āvǝvka ta sira.</p>
.
3055<p>śaśih, 2, taṅ, piṅ, 7, saṅ hyaṅ jaya kusuma devatanya, bratanya hayva maṅan sapi, pha, luputeṅ tuju tluh tarañjanā, drәman āhiven iven.</p>
.
.
.<p> śaśih, 3, taṅ, piṅ, 9, saṅ hyaṅnakā devatanya, bratanya, hayva maṅan bavi, pha, tan katampǝkan griṅ āguṅ.</p>
.
3060
.<p>śaśih, 4, taṅ, piṅ, 15, saṅ hyaṅ āsmarā devatanya, bratanya, hayva maṅan sarva roṇḍon, pha, dadi siṅ tinandur.</p>
.
.
.<p>śaśih, 5, paṅloṅ, piṅ, 15, saṅ hyaṅ mahādeva devatanya, bratanya, hayva sǝhǝk yan aṅūcap, hayva nǝṅbaṅ boñcah, [31r] pha, drәman āvǝvkā.</p>
3065
.
.<p>śaśih, 6, taṅ, piṅ, 8, saṅ hyaṅ atanu devatanya, bratanya, hayva haṅinǝp, riṅ paluluṅhan, pha, sugih tan kelaṅ elaṅān.</p>
.
.
3070
.<p>śaśih, 7, taṅ, piṅ, 13, saṅ hyaṅ manasijā devatanya, bratanya, haṅrakā, pha, sugih keḍәp kapaṅgih siṅ giṇa harṣa.</p>
.
.
.
3075<p>śaśih, 8, taṅ, piṅ, 2, saṅ hyaṅ hanaṅgarā devatanya, bratanya, hayva amaṅan paṭik vǝnaṅ suku phat, pha, sugih patik vǝnaṅ.</p>
.
.
.<p>śaśih, 9, taṅ, piṅ, 6, saṅ hyaṅ ravī devatanya, bratanya, hayva maṅan hasu, pha, hapkik raspati prajurit.</p>
.
3080
.<p>śaśih, 10, taṅ, piṅ, 4, saṅ hyaṅ brahmā devatanya, bratanyā, hayva maṅanān dǝlәṅ riṅ luhur, pha, kinasihaniṅ hyaṅ, mvaṅ voṅ mule hakeh āsih iri kita.</p>
.
.
.<p>śaśih, jyeṣṭā, taṅ, piṅ, 5, saṅ hyaṅ leka jayā devatanya, bratanya, haṅlampar ānanapu, pha, keḍәp mandi sakcaptā.</p>
3085
.
.<p>śaśih, saddhā, taṅ, piṅ, 1, saṅ hyaṅ pisodharī deva tanya, bratanya, hayva turu lavan istri, pha, keḍәpāhomah omah.</p>
.
.
3090<p>Iyā ṅitaṅ kariṅ vulan, krәtta maśa haranya, den asthiti sira, keṅə̄takna yva lupa.</p>
.
.
.<p n="III.175">hana brata, saninigrahā, ṅa, tan mamati haghni ri kālaniṅ tumpǝk kalivon[,] kramanyā ta mumujā, hananapuh eṅ saṅgar, tamvitā nǝmbahā ri bhaṭāra śīvaditya, lviriṅ caru riṅ saṅgar, Anapunar, Arih, rәmbaṅ, tambo lagu hakah haraka, phalā, kambaṅ vaṅi, burat vaṅi, lṅa vaṅī, sdhǝṅan Ikṣu, dhipā, dhūpa, den asaṅkǝp, devadarvi nasab, vijā, dhupa, Ika kahatur i bhaṭāra, ma, Om̐ namo bhagavatye vaśūdeva ya, sarva tuṣṭān, dadāsime, Om̐ śrī gurubhyo namah, devacarundādasimahātrәpti svāhā.</p>
.
3095
.<p>tlas ta ṅavaṅiha ta kita, ma, Om̐ sūryya putra ya namah . samaṅkana taṅ brata lkasaknā, hayva ta pramadā riṅ brata, kunaṅ yan kalaṅan āgriṅ, sakalviraniṅ āṅalaṅana, pinakāvuruṅaniṅ brata, hayva pinakṣakǝn ikāṅ brata, kaliṅanya mvitana juga muvah, kunaṅ yan tan kalaṅanā, hanulus rahayu, pakṣakna hikā, pha, riṅ dlāhanta dadi ratu suka vaya katәmu, pinakāśraya deniṅ padhanta ratu, keḍәp kapintuhu deniṅ rat kabeh.</p>
.
.
.<p>Iti sanibrata, kayatnakna de saṅ met hayu, ndan ikā hayva malәtuh Ikaṅ āmbǝk, mataṅyan ikā hayvā miṣya buddhi, tātkalanta maṅanakǝn brata, Apan yan tan karakṣa Ikaṅ brata denta, maṅdadyakǝn vighnaniṅ śarirā, yan Enak denta rumakṣa sarīra, makājñana buddhi mahottamā, malilaṅāhniṅ niravarāṇa, tan paglǝglǝh , tan karaktan karṇna sulā, mvaṅ rajah tamah, Ika ta maṅdadyakǝn svarga magə̄ṅ, ṅūniveh jñāna viśeṣā, vruha ri kramanira sovaṅ sovaṅ.
3100
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.176">hana brata sabran manis, ṅa, tan pamaṅan tampakiṅ āpuy, rvaṅ vulan samayanya,
.sabran pahiṅ tan pamaṅan tampakiṅ aghni, rvaṅ vulan samayanya,
3105sabran pon tan padus tan palәṅhā, tan pararavup, tan pakәkmuh, rvaṅ vulan samayanya,
.sabran vage, tan paturu gumuliṅ, rvaṅ vulan samayānya,
.sabran kalivon, tan paṅūcap ūcap, rvaṅ vulan samayanya,
.
.pha, ginañjar deniṅ vatǝk devata kabeh, norana nūkrәttani, tan ilaṅ takonaknā, drәventa tǝmbe.
3110
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.177">nihan haji pabrata, yaniṅ taṅgal piṅ lima, hanuju kalivon, paṅūpāvaśa ,
.Esuknya riṅ manis, amaṅan kupat pāṇdhava, 5, Ivaknya kacaṅ, pha, dukiṅ halit duruṅ ānmu, yan vus āgə̄ṅ hamaṅgih suka sugih haguṅ dunya.
3115
.
.pa, amaṅan kupat syāṅ anti, 9, Ivaknya komak, pha, tinuṅgu deniṅ rāma reṇā, haṅantos haputu habuyut, kinadhama deniṅ bapebu, kapti ni hulun.
.
.
3120pva, amaṅan kupat sidayu, 7, Ivaknya sudhaṅ, pha, haṅāpti listvayu, halit ārampiṅ aṅlәlǝnte, tan āmadhani, suka sugih drәmman baṅkit, pinarәkan pinakāpahulunaniṅ marū .
.
.va, amaṅan kupat sih tan pәgat, 4, Ivaknya taluh, pha, haṅapti suka sugih, drәmman sidi baṅkit, keḍәpiṅ alaki, tan kavaśa lakinta haṅluṅhani, pinūji deniṅ matva, tanāna ṅesǝmi.
.
.
3125
.ka, handha kupat gnǝp, 8, Ivaknya raraśmen , pha, haṅapti suka sugih haguṅ viryya, hañjǝnǝṅ hardda nareśvarī, keḍәp āṅūcap. Esūk riṅ manis, handha kupat siddha luṅguh, 10, Ivaknya dagiṅ loh, sagarā dhanū, halas sāvah, dagiṅ pomahan, [phalanya], haṅāptisukā sugih haguṅ viryya, kinajrihan deniṅ śatru, kinadamā deniṅ balā mvaṅ varga, pinarәkan deniṅ bāla sabran, tan ivaṅ deniṅ bāla, sami vatra tan āna ṅsal, sidi mandi tan paṅūcap, rәmrәm Ikaṅ vvaṅ kabeh, riṅ panaṅkilan, tinaṅkiliṅ bāla sakiṅ doh, habahan təka sakiṅ tanāna, sabran sabran, yan vadon sinivi deniṅ maru, tan āna madhani, sadera ṅrehaknā, vrәddhi putra, kinajrihan deniṅ santanā, virryya bhukti, hembah mañabuh, himbuh himbuh tan paṅloṅ. sāmi dānūr dahā.
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.178">hana brata nuṅku rāt, ṅa, kā, handumā . U, hamadhūharā, pva , hambayuhāra, pva, hatoyahara, va, haghnihāra, purṇnamā, tīlәm, hamatihāra, piṅ rvanakā, [ṅa], pha, hamupu si brata kabeh.
3130
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.179">hana brata, mañcadara, ṅa, manis amaṅan sәga putih, pahiṅ hamāṅan ktan bāṅ, pvan amaṅan sәga kuniṅ, vage amaṅan ktan īrәṅ, kalivon amaṅan ktan hamañca vārṇna. vetan amaṅan hantǝlu putihnya, kidul surā, kulon hantǝlu kuniṅ, lor bakakul, riṅ tәṅah śarasi bāṅ hāti, pha, suka sugih.
.
3135</p>
.
.<p n="III.180">hana brata, hanūt sāpta vara, ṅa, ra, hasisirih, 5, ra. ca, hasisirih, 4, ca. A, asisirih, 3, A. bu, hasisirih, 7, bu. vrә, hasisirih, 8, vrә. śu, hasisirih, 6, śu. śa, hasisirih, 9, śa. pha, suka sugih, vәnaṅ sakama kama.
.
.</p>
3140
.<p n="III.181">hana brata, amaṅan sәkul āṅgi sarahup, sinaṅga ri taṅan kiva, tan patdha tan patambǝh, tigaṅ vәṅi samayanya, saṅ hyaṅ siddhi rākṣa sira turunābrata, huṅgvānira riṅ rāt, pha, tdhunaniṅ drәman hagave hayu, tan kapjahan vka kita, trus tumus tkeṅ vkā vet bet.
.
.</p>
.
3145<p n="III.182">hana brata, maṅan sәkul saravup, sinaṅga ri taṅan kiva, tan patәdha tan patambǝh, lalab kevala, 3, vәṅi lavasnya, kārya hana putra, ṅa, saṅ hyaṅ sandi rāṣa sira turun abrata, huṅgvanira riṅ śarīra, riṅ rahasya, kәdhukaniṅ dūmānā gave hayu, kveh putra kveh vvaṅ vlas āsih iri kita.
.
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.183">hana brata, amaṅan sinaṅga ri taṅan kiva, saivaknya, sagәlǝmiṅ abrata, pakṣa hidhǝp, ṅa, saṅ hyaṅ kuverā hyaṅnya, ya pinaka rūpa, pinaka kulit, pinaka halis, [phalanya,] siddhiniṅ vvaṅ abәcik i pambǝkan.
3150
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.184">hana brata, amaṅan sәkul, pituṅ lek divasanyā, pha, akveh mahyun iri kita, hanvā ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.
.
3155</p>
.
.<p n="III.185">hana brata, maṅan sәga kevala, sagәlǝmiṅ abrata, hyaṅ puravāt sira turun abrata, pha, sucāra vruh ri kaliṅanya.
.
.</p>
3160
.<p n="III.186">hana brata, amaṅan sәga putih, riṅ taṅgal hapisan, saṅ hyaṅ prasiddha turunā brata, satahun samayanya, pha, kinasihaniṅ rāt, haṅliraṅ ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.</p>
.
.<p n="III.187">hana brata, amaṅan sәga balaka, sagәlǝmiṅ abrata, saṅ hyaṅ paravan hyaṅnya, pha, vruhiṅ ācarā kaliṅanya.
.
3165</p>
.
.<p n="III.188">hana brata, maṅan sәga putih, 5, puluṅ, kәtan baṅ, 5, kәtan jnar, 5, tri dhatū brata, 5, mañcavara, saṅ hyaṅ padmā rāṣa tumurun ābrata, pinkā socca, bāyu śabda Idhǝp, sugih tan hina sāhambǝk phalanya.

.</p>
3170
.<p n="III.189">hana brata, añәkul haṅgi, ulam pahi, laṅa tәṅah lek, ranini paduka bhaṭārī Uma hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, vavanon vastu[,] kinarmakәniṅ akeh.</p>
.
.<p n="III.190">hana brata, amaṅan sәkul āṅgi, anaṅgap, 7, pur, si[35r]ra saṅ hyaṅ viśeṣā tumuruna brata, pha, ginañjaran śakti lima, vadon viṣṇu anәmu, tan ahalavas tur prajñan, vicakṣaṇa, suka sugih riṅ dlāha.
.
3175</p>
.
.<p n="III.191">hana brata, amaṅan sәkul pañca varṇa, aren tiniṅkah cakra
.tinañcǝban vrәtti, denta maṅan maṅkana tatkāla kalivon, añakra bhuvana, ṅa, saṅ hyaṅśivatma sira turuna brata, ya pinakarūpa, pinakayuṣa, pinakalaku, dadi vvaṅ aṅuripi jagat, suka sugih vәnaṅ pinakasariniṅ jagat, riṅ niṣkāla.
.
3180</p>
.
.<p n="III.192">hana brata jaga varṇa, ṅa, amaṅan sәkul, balañan[,] pituṅ vәṅi samayanya, pha, keḍәp deniṅ rāt, prajñan vicakṣaṇa, bisāgamǝl aṅiduṅ, viryavan.
.
.</p>
3185
.<p n="III.193">hana brata, yan amaṅan hanǝmbah sәkul, pituṅ rātri divasanya, pha, kinasiha[35v]niṅ hyaṅ, śrī cittamaṇi ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.
.
.</p>
.
3190<p n="III.194">hana brata naṅga sәkul, tinumpaṅan vrәtti, yan pәjah ikaṅ vrәtti, pavusan kita pamaṅān, pituṅ vәṅi lavasanya, salviriṅ hagata tan tame kita, aṅañcaṅ ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.
.
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.195">hana brata, yan amaṅan tinañcǝban vrәtti[,] vulan, saṅ hyaṅ anuṅkǝbi jagat hyaṅnya, ya minakārūpā hayu apәkik, [pha], riṅ dadi vvaṅ suka sugih, vәnaṅ amatūt jagat riṅ niṣkala.</p>
3195
.<p n="III.196">hana brata, amaṅan tinañcǝban tuṅgul, tiniṅkah bhīma, hyaṅ maṇik teja, ṅa, saṅ hyaṅ paṅirut jagat turunābrata, ya pinakarūpa, pinakalaku, pinakateja, [pha,] aśrī iṅiriṅ sañjata, sakṣat kǝmbaṅ tinuṅgulan, śakti aṅrәbahakǝn jagat riṅ niṣkala.
.
.</p>
.
3200<p n="III.197">hana brata, avrәtti, ṅa, yan amaṅan tinañcǝban vrәtti, pәjah taṅ vrәtti, havusān amaṅan, sapta rātri divasanya, pha, sarva rogha tan tumameṅ śarīranta.
.
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.198">hana brata, aṅǝmbaṅ, ṅa, lamun a [36r]maṅan kǝmbaṅ rumuhun, tigaṅ tahun tigaṅ lek divaṣanya, bhaṭāra Iśvara hyaṅnya, pha, deva sih iri kita.</p>
3205
.<p n="III.199">hana brata, ṅǝmbaṅ, ṅa, tan luṅha yan kaparan tamu, bhaṭāra viśeṣā maveh brata, pha, sugih tan ilaṅ takonakәna , amaṅgih deśa norana voṅ siddhi gave.</p>
.
.<p n="III.200">hana brata hajātukar, ṅa, amaṅan asaṇdhiṅ pulava kǝmbaṅ, salek lavasnya, bhaṭāra guru maveh brata, pha, akarma alaki anom, tur kinasihaniṅ paṇḍita.
.
3210</p>
.
.<p n="III.201">hana brata, maṅan kǝmbaṅ naṅkǝṅ manis, hyaṅ maṇisumila haraniṅ brata, saṅ hyaṅ asmara hyaṅnya, ya pinakarūpa, aśrī sumilah, pasamuhaniṅ akeh riṅ niṣkala.</p>
.
.<p n="III.202">hana brata, yan amaṅan, tinumpaṅan kǝmbaṅ campaka, saṅ hyaṅ maṇik pudhak haraniṅ brata, hyaṅ vidakā turunābrata, ya minakarūpa, apәkik anulus, [pha] tumitis iṅ menak, ring dadi vvaṅ, suka sugih, vicakṣaṇa riṅ niṣkala. </p>
3215
.<p n="III.203">hana brata, maṅan lalab luṅluṅan, mvaṅ kinǝmbaṅakǝn, 2, saṅ hyaṅ maṇik arṣana hyaṅnya, bhaṭāra bāyu sira turunābrata, ya minakarūpa , pinakaurip[,] pinakarambut, pinakalǝye , pinakaidhǝp, pinakagulu, pinakasindhuvā, pinakalimbeyan, [pha] riṅ dadi vvaṅ, sukā sugih, ambǝk ahәniṅ, akǝmbaṅ avə̄h riṅ niṣkala.
.
.</p>
.
3220<p n="III.204">hana brata, amaṅan lalab balaka, sambǝl sinamohva , mantra patala, ṅa, hyaṅ baśūki turunābrata, ya pinakarūpa, pinakālit, pinakadalamakaniṅ suku, pinakatahulan, pinakakәliṅ, [pha,] riṅ dadi vvaṅ, suka sugih, lәmah sīma, kinapeṅin deniṅ voṅ riṅ niṣkala.
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.205">hana brata, yan amaṅan tinumpaṅan vīja, saṅ hyaṅ vira kusuma, ṅa, hyaṅ jayaniṅ rāt turunābrata, ya minakarūpa, pinakajәnǝṅ, pinakapamulu, śakti aheṅ rūpanta, [pha,] riṅ dadi vvaṅ, suka sugih, rāja drәvve, mās pirak, putra putri riṅ niṣkala.

3225</p>
.
.<p n="III.206">hana brata, yan amaṅan tinumpaṅan sәkar vaṅi vaṅi, saṅ hyaṅ mūrvva gaṇḍa vaṅi haraniṅ brata, saṅ hyaṅ maṇik sumirit hyaṅniṅ brata, ya pinakarūpa , pinakakulit, pinakahambu, [pha] riṅ dadi vvaṅ, mrәbuk arūm, anǝrus tkeṅ kadaton riṅ niṣkala.

3230
.<p n="III.207">hana brata, yan amaṅan sәkar śrigaḍiṅ, saṅ hyaṅ maṇik śrī danti hyaṅniṅ brata, ya pinakarūpa, pinakagugusi, pinakahuntu, [pha] aśri sakeṅ huntunta, suka sugih, !saṅ hyaṅ vidayaka sira turunābrata, pinakarūpa, apәkik anulus, tumitisiṅ menak, prakavi vicakṣaṇa riṅ niṣkala!.

.
3235<p n="III.208">hana brata, yan amaṅan alamak sukǝt, puṣpani smrәti, ṅa, bhaṭāra smara hyaṅnya, ya pinakālas, [pha,] nәhәr kinasihaniṅ bapebu.

.</p>

.<p n="III.209">hana brata, amaṅan alamak patra, amūrti prāṇa, ṅa, saṅ hyaṅ pagər gunuṅ sira turunābrata, ya pinakahuntu, [pha,] dirgha yuṣa, pәjah tan pahavan kadga.

.</p>

.<p n="III.210">hana brata, [amaṅan] aren roṇḍon, pituṅ vulan pituṅ vәṅi divasanya, bhaṭāra mahīśvara hyaṅnya, pha, mulih mariṅ bhaṭāra mahiśvara, sasvarga sira, sasarnya majanma riṅ juru baṣa, labdhavara ri san ahulun.

3245

3250<p n="III.213">hana brata, [amaṅan] haren pampat, kvehnya, 73, aṇḍaniṅ janur, iṅaṅge, pha, suka sugih, apәkik halus havakta, jarijinta lәmǝs.

.</p>
.
.<p n="III.214">hana brata, sarvagata, ṅa, yan amaṅan tan pahupa, pataṅ lek pataṅ vәṅi samayanya, pha, prajñan vicakṣaṇa, bisa gamәl aṅiduṅ, vāk bhajra siddhi mantra, jayeṅ śatru kedhәp deniṅ rāt, suka sugih saṅkan rare.
3255
.</p>

.<p n="III.215">hana brata, asiṅ ṅaranya, !pisan amaṅan kinaṅ!, yan amaṅan sumәlapāṅinaṅ, nәhәr tan pahupa, salek lavasnya, bhaṭārī Uma hyaṅniṅ brata, ma, Om̐ yanā Devî nama svāhā, !ahes!, pha, suka sugih hamǝpǝki kadhaton.

3260</p>
.
.<p n="III.216">hana brata, saṅgga ṅinaṅ, ṅa, satahun salek lavasnya, pha, drәman malakya rabi, ratu asih, ahes, ma, Om̐ braśri vastuya nama svāhā.

3265
.<p n="III.217">hana brata, asihaniṅ layon, ṅa, aṅinaṅ tan pambuñcal sәpah, tigaṅ tavun samayanya, sahiṅ sәpah kinampelakǝn, bhinaṣmi, Iki pitutūrnya, ma, Om̐ bhaṭāra mati, ahurip mani amoriṅ megha, tumitis dadi sarvvendah, pinakabuktini ṅhulun, sa ba ta A I namā śiva ya.
.
.</p>
.
3270<p n="III.218">hana brata, asihaniṅ layon, ṅa, aṅinaṅ tan pambuñcal sәpah, tigaṅ tavun samayanya, sahiṅ sәpah kinampelakǝn, bhinaṣmi, Iki pitutūrnya, ma, Om̐ bhaṭāra mati, ahurip mani amoriṅ megha, tumitis dadi sarvvendah, pinakabuktini ṅhulun, sa ba ta A I namā śiva ya.
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.219">hana brata, yan amaṅan asaṇḍiṅ dhūpa dhamar, saṅ hyaṅ maṇik teja, ṅa, hyaṅ maṇik muntab sira turunā brata, ya pinakarūpa, pinakateja, śakti mahabhāra, [pha,] riṅ dadi vvaṅ, abhrā murub sumilah, aheṅ jәrih kaṅ rāt denta.
.
3275</p>
.
.<p n="III.220">hana brata, adahar pucaṅ tәṅah vәlah, vulamaniṅ pahi, ranini paduka bhaṭārī anuṅkurāt hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, abәcik kaṅ jariji.
.
.</p>
3280
.<p n="III.221"> hana brata, damar aguṅ ṅaranya, tan pamaṅan kasurupan saṅ hyaṅ sūryya, savarṣa lamanya, kaṅ pinaṅan, yuyukan, bavaṅ huṅkul, tarasi, sasivi, rarakā malo , caṅkuk sarvan vinuṅkul, prutāmuradaṅan, pha, kacakṣu riṅ sarva rusit, luputiṅ sarva śāstra, tan maṅhel vinuruknya, tumusiṅ hajī, aṅlariṅ kevuh, bhaṭāra śiva hyaṅniṅ brata.
.
.</p>
.
3285<p n="III.222">hana brata, pasaṅ sande, ṅa, tan pamaṅan kasurupan saṅeṅe, pha, apaḍaṅ kaṅ hati, yan asisinahu eṅgal bisa.
.
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.223">hana brata, tan pamaṅan riṅ pūrṇamaniṅ kadaśa, antuk tigaṅ pūrṅamaniṅ kadaśa, pha, svarga sakala katәmu, mañjanma riṅ ratu, paripūrṇānurāga riṅ rāt.
3290
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.224">hana brata, mūrṅama sadā, ṅa, pūrṇama tan pamaṅan tәkaniṅ paṅloṅ apisan tilǝm tәkaniṅ taṅgal apisan, pha, sugih manәrus, katәkan sapinakṣanira riṅ bhūmi, saṅ prajuritiṅ bhūmi hyaṅniṅ brata.
.
3295</p>
.
.<p n="III.225">hana brata akasukhan, ṅa, riṅ pūrṅamaniṅ kapitu, piṅ, 7, sarahina, piṅ, 7, sa[39r]vәṅi, amaṅan aṅinum, aṅigǝl, bhaṭāra kapitu maveh brata, pha, suka sugih, anak amitra, dīrgha yuṣa, keḍәp kapintuhu.
.
.</p>
3300
.<p n="III.226">hana brata, mәnǝr ri taṅgal, piṅ, 3, maṅan kuñit, mūrṇama sadā, ṅa, saṅ hyaṅ trisandhi hyaṅniṅ brata, papalihan bhaṭāra mahādeva, ya pinakarūpa, pinakapamulu, mvaṅ kavicakṣaṇan, [pha,] tan kaluputan .
.
.
.taṅgal, piṅ, 4, amaṅan kәtan irәṅ, amukti labdha, ṅa, saṅ hyaṅ cadu śakti hyaṅniṅ brata, papalihan bhaṭāra viṣṇu, ya pinakarupa, pinakarambut, [pha,] siddhaniṅ ṅvaṅ, anvargakǝn bapebu.
3305
.
.
.taṅ, piṅ, 5, […] amañcavara śakti, ṅa, saṅ hyaṅ pañcavara hyaṅniṅ brata, papalihan bhaṭāra śiva, ya pinakarūpa, pinaka Idhǝp, pinakatǝndhas [pha,] siddhaniṅ ṅvaṅ sugih tan kaharṣa .
.
3310</p>
.
.<p n="III.227">hana brata maṅan raka, pūrṇama limaṅ raka, sira saṅ hyaṅ patūt sih tumurunābrata, pha, ginañjaran śakti lima, pinakarāma, pinakalalako[39v]n suka sugih tan panambut kārya.

3315
.<p n="III.228">hana brata, mūrṇama tilәm, ṅa, maṅupavaśa[,] aṅraka kunǝṅ, [pha] utaṅiṅ atvanta, kәna sinahur[,] polihnya sakarәpta.

.</p>
.
3320<p n="III.229">hana brata, ṅraka naṅkǝn kalivon, patra, ṅa, hyaṅ taruṇa turunābrata, [ya] pinakarūpa, [pha] siddhaniṅ vaṅ sugih lәmah śima.</p>
.
.<p n="III.230">hana brata, maṅan sarva phala, talǝs huvi vahvahan pisaṅ kunaṅ, pituṅ vәṅi lavasnya, kasubhagan kinaharṣan deniṅ istri phalanya, Abhoh kayu ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.
.
.</p>
3325
.<p n="III.231">hana brata, maṅan phala gantuṅ, davun sinabraṅ, ṅa, pha, prajurit.
.
.</p>
.
3330<p n="III.232">hana brata, maṅan sarva buṅkah, sagәlǝmiṅ abrata, saṅ hyaṅ viśeṣa hyaṅniṅ brata, suka sugih, puṣṭaka lǝṅǝn phalanya.
.
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.233">hana brata, amaṅan sarva phala, sapta rātri lavasnya, pha, kinasihaniṅ strī, yaniṅ strī kinasihaniṅ kakuṅ.
3335
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.234">hana brata, amaṅan tur ambaṅkit, bhaṭārī keḍәp hyaṅniṅ brata, ṅgonaniṅ amimiti, riṅ pavon, punaṅ kininaṅ sәḍah sapon den tuvuh, lalamak lampuyaṅ, tan pamaṅan tan paṅinaṅ, yan tan panggugut lampuyaṅ, pha, vavadon tan pagigilutan, keḍәp malaki.
.
3340</p>
.
.<p n="III.235">hana brata, amaṅan katambat tigaṅ bulih, naṅkǝn kalivon, tan pamaṅan paran paran, pituṅ kalivon samayanya, pha, apәkik tur lǝmǝsiṅ rambut.
.
.</p>
3345
.<p n="III.236">hana brata, ambhūmi lәpa, ṅa, amaṅan jaṅaniṅ lǝlǝpa kabeh, salek lavasnya, bhaṭāra Iśvara maveh brata, pha, kinasihaniṅ svami, keḍәp alaki, kinasihaniṅ
.hyaṅ.
.
.</p>
3350
.<p n="III.237">hana brata, amaṅana mimba, salek lavasnya, pha, athāravit.</p>
.
.<p n="III.238">hana brata, sarva tatā, ṅa, amaṅan luṅggahiṅ gaṇḍa rusa kәliṅ, mvaṅ campaka garus, bhaṭāra śambhu hyaṅnya, pha, mulih[,] riṅ svarga bhaṭāra guru, mvaṅ riṅ bhaṭāra śiva.
.
3355</p>
.
.<p n="III.239">hana brata, vījāharā, ṅa, amaṅan vīja rumuhun, saha pucukiṅ gaṇḍa rusa, pucukiṅ alaṅ-alaṅ, pha, prajñan kita, sihaniṅ istrī.
.
.</p>
3360
.<p n="III.240">hana brata, maṅan sarva luṅgah luṅgahan, pucukiṅ dukut
.[40v] lәpas, pucukiṅ alaṅ-alaṅ, tuñjuṅ, vija tәluṅ jumput, sapta rātri pituṅ dina lavasanya, siddha kārya saphalanya, Amūrva ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.
.
.</p>
3365
.<p n="III.241">hana brata ṅantavali, ṅa, amaṅan hantavali, pañjaṅnya salǝṅkat madhya, pituṅ tumpǝk kalivon patәlasanya, mirica pituṅ viji, ligundi pituṅ muñcuk, pha, salara vighna hilaṅ donya, sojarira keḍәp, !...! katәmu maṅke mvaṅ dlāha.
.
.</p>
.
3370<p n="III.242">hana brata nirambu, ṅa, tan pamaṅan sarva binumbon, satahun lavasnya, pha, mulih mariṅ svarga bhaṭāra rūdra, sasarnya majanma ri listvayu, apәkik prajurit.
.
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.243">hana brata, amaṅan kәtan baṅ[,] pituṅ vәṅi, hirәṅ pituṅ vәṅi, ivaknya sarva śuci, arariṅ śakti, ṅa, bhagavān paraśara hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, akadaṅ voṅ pәkik.
3375
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.244">hana brata, maṅan kәtan[,] ya taṅkǝp , voṅ tuṅgal tuṅgal riṅ kalivon, 7, hǝmbanya phala, sahaṅ, mәñan, aṅgara kaśih amaṅan, 7, alaṇdhyan, sira saṅ hyaṅ asihiṅ prāṇa turunābrata, ginañjaran śakti lima, pha, suka sugih, sapatinya vәnaṅ.
.
3380</p>
.
.<p n="III.245">hana brata, anila, ṅa, amaṅan kәtan hirәṅ, satahun samayanya, pha, mantuk iṅ svarga bhaṭāra viṣṇu, sasarnya majanma riṅ mantrī.
.
.</p>
3385
.<p n="III.246">hana brata, murāṇa, ṅa, amaṅan ñahñah lan gula tәbu, lamanya tigaṅ dina, pha, tan kataman siṅ saparanta.</p>
.
.<p n="III.247">Hana brata, maṅan tan dady akarvan, pituṅ lek lavasnya, suka magə̄ṅ phalanya, eka patra ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.</p>
.
3390<p n="III.248">hana brata, tan kapadan, ṅa, yan amaṅan tan pakǝmbulan, aduluran pañcamuna, sahuripnya riṅ amaṅan, alalab roṇḍon, mvaṅ kǝmbhaṅ, uttamaniṅ brata kabeh, pha, tan kapadan viśeṣa, maṅkana polahira saṅ viku
.tәmǝn tәmǝn.
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.249">hana brata, amaṅan tan pakǝmbulan, pәtaṅ tahun samayanya, pha, mantuk riṅ svarga bhaṭāra rudra, sasarnya mañjanma riṅ kulaputra, kaḍaṅ haji subhaga.</p>
3395
.<p n="III.250">hana brata, aṅajum , ṅa, amaṅan riṅ va[41v]ton salek lavasnya, bhaṭāra mahādeva maveh brata, pha, tәka atuduhiṅ paliṅgihan, keḍәp tәka ruruṅeniṅ voṅ. </p>
.
.<p n="III.251">hana brata, amutәriṅ paṅkon, ṅa, amaṅan pinaṅku, salek lavasnya, bhaṭāra mahādeva maveh brata, pha, kinasihan deniṅ bapa ibu, malakya rabi, sasarnya dadi bhujaṅga lәvih.</p>
.
3400<p n="III.252">hana brata, amaṅan [ri] ryaghūrṇita, pituṅ lek samayanya, pha, siddhi mantra, listvayu paripūrṇa.</p>
.
.<p n="III.253">hana brata, naṅkə̄nāra, ṅa, yan amaṅan aṅagǝm jinah, 7, salek samayanya, saṅ hyaṅ rūdra hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, akәlar tan kәneṅ śrī kita.

3405
.<p n="III.254">hana brata, asaṇḍiṅ jinah keteṅ, salek lavasnya, bhaṭāra Indra maveh brata, pha, prajña prakavi, Aṣṭa kośala, sasarnya dadi patih sugih.</p>

3410</p>
.
.<p n="III.256">hana brata, amaṅan kupat pāṇḍava, 3, paṅanǝn esuk, 1, paṅanǝn tәṅah ṅve, 1, paṅanǝn sore, 1, pha, rinakṣa deniṅ rāt, kinasavitan deniṅ sama janma, hajana livavaktayanya, tan pamuruṅ polihnya.

3415
.<p n="III.257">hana brata, maṅan kupat, mevaka sarva śukla, tәluṅ vәṅi divasanya, bhaṭāra Iśvara hyaṅniṅ brata, pha[,] biṣa ṅiduṅ, abәcikiṅ ulon, manisiṅ panutukan, mvaṅ kinasihaniṅ voṅ.

3420<p n="III.258">hana brata, adahar lәpǝt, lama tәṅah vulan, ranini kundaṅ kasih hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, arampiṅ.
.
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.259">hana brata, naḍah tumpəṅ, sahasta pañjaṅnya, śūnya ivaknya uyah arәṅ kevala, anarasvatī, ṅa, saṅ hyaṅ pitu tan palavan hyaṅniṅ brata, ya pinakaprajña, sih malakya rabi, siddhaniṅ vaṅ sugih tan surud, mvaṅ pradaṇānuṅku rāt.
3425
.</p>

.<p n="III.272">hana brata, adva savәguṅ, bhaṭāra rūdra maveh brata, pha, sugih rumbe.</p>

3440<p n="III.275">hana brata, amәlәṅ tutuk sarahina vәṅi, pur, saṅ hyaṅ anәmu jagat sira turunābrata, pha, ginañjaran śakti lima, pinakarāma, pinakalalakon vadon, listvayu, prajñan, lanaṅ vicakṣaṇa, sukha sugih, maṅke kalavan tǝmbe.</p>
.
.<p n="III.276">hana brata ṅālamuñə̄ṅ, ṅa, saṅ hyaṅ lәbur jagat sira turunābrata, ginañjaran śakti lima, voṅ tuṅgal sakvehiṅ sira abrata, ya pinakarūpa, pinakalakon, vastu rahayu, lanaṅ vadon suka sugih drәman keḍәp.</p>
.
.<p n="III.277">hana brata, ṅalacakra, ṅa, sira saṅ hyaṅ viśeṣa riṅ bhuvana, sira turunābrata, ginañjarān śakti tigaṅ rakṣa , sakvehaniṅ abrata, pha, suka sugih, prajñan vicakṣaṇa, lanaṅ vadon.

.</p>

.
3450<p n="III.279">hana brata, kukusaniṅ śarīra, ṅa, tan pamaṅan suku pat, lavasnya sakavaśahaniṅ abrata, saṅ hyaṅ cadu śakti sira turunābrata, ya pinakarūpa, pinakavaṅkoṅ, siddhaniṅ vvaṅ muṣṭika, keh avәlas, rovaṅ asih iri kita, aṅraṅkus brata.
.
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.280">hana brata, tan pamaṅan bavi, hyaṅ manasija hyaṅnya, pituṅ tavun samayanya, pha, luputiṅ gәriṅ aguṅ, tur kinasihan deniṅ jagat.</p>
3455
.<p n="III.281">hana brata, tan pamaṅan śrәgāla, pha, rūpanta tan akusut.
.

.<p n="III.284">hana brata, akәrisa, ṅa, tan pamaṅan yan tan pasisig rumuhun, sari sarī, bhaṭārī śvari hyaṅniṅ brata, satahun sayamanya, pha, prajña, tavitan labdha mās kita.</p>
3465
.<p n="III.285">hana brata ñandiṅ dhadhap, lama tigaṅ dina, tan pamaṅan, bhaṭāra śiva hyaṅnya, pha, svarga lәvih dinuṅkapnya, subhaga kita, kula putra atәhǝr viśeṣa, bahudhǝṇdha ñakra vrәtti.</p>
.
.<p n="III.286">hana brata, ṅapitu, ṅa, naṅkǝn dvadaśi śukla pakṣaniṅ kapitu, aṅupavaśa, bhaṭāra bhīma hyaṅnya, ma, Om̐ bam̐ bhīmā ya namah, pamit, pha, viryavan kapintuhu deniṅ rāt, sugih mās pirak, hulun putra vrәddhi, siddha sakāryanta.</p>

3470<p n="III.287">hana brata, ṅrәspati, ṅa, kramanyānaṅkǝn vrәspati ṅupavaśa, pha, listuhayu kita, siṅ kāryanta hayu.
.

3475
.</p>

.
3480<p n="III.290">hana brata, yan tәkaniṅ vәton, tan pamaṅan sarvvāmbǝkan, pha, antuka omah omah, tan surud dharmmanya, bhaṭā[44r]ra rudra hyaṅnya.</p>
.

.

3485
.</p>
.
.<p n="III.294">hana brata, yan amaṅan asaṇḍiṅ puṣpa liṅga, aṅliga prāṇa, ṅa, hyaṅ aṅgaṣṭi sira turunābrata, pha, keḍәpiṅ rāt, tur rūpanta muntab, śakti prajurit mahābhara, yan dadi vvaṅ abhra murub, tan kasoran rūpanta, dirggha yuṣa paripūrṇna, puruṣa viśeṣa.

3490</p>
.
.<p n="III.295">hana brata, aṅliṅga pәraṅ, ṅa, yan amaṅan asaṇḍiṅ duhuṅ, bhaṭāra rūdra hyaṅiṅ brata, pha, Akveh vvaṅ tumaṅgalaṅ asih iri kita.

3495
.<p n="III.296">hana brata, aṅubi, ṅa, amaṅan aṅinum bañu rumuhun, huvusiṅ amaṅan, tan vәnaṅ aṅucap lavan voṅ, pha, akәlar, suka sugih, tan kǝna gәriṅ, tan sasar kapintuhu deniṅ rāt.</p>
.
.<p n="III.297">hana brata, maṅan tan pembuh, tan paṅinum bañu, pha, śakti kiteṅ ri niṣkala, lavasnya sagәlǝmiṅ abrata, saṅ hyaṅ dura dasih hyaṅnya, tatkālaniṅ abrata, tan paturviṅ rahina, [pha,] apaḍaṅ riṅ rūpa, apaḍaṅ kaṅ ati, kinasihaniṅ rat.</p>
.
3500<p n="III.298">hana brata, ñәkul bañu, [ṅa,] tan pamaṅan sәga sadina, tan paturviṅ rahina vәṅi, aṅayapakǝn tәkeṅ polihnya, añjanma hayu, ma, rāga śūnya mahiśi taya, amaṅan sәga satatak, siniratiṅ toya añar, pamit, vus mapamit, madahar, sakantunanya, hayva mañapuhaṅ.</p>
.
.<p n="III.299">hana brata ñәkul bañu, mañjiṅ lima ṅaranya, kavaśa amaṅan suruh, maṅan sәkul inumi toya, sәga sakәpǝl tinatak ri lәpa lәpaniṅ taṅan, vәnaṅ inumi bañu sabran sore, lavasiṅ abrata, satavun, yan kavaśa, mokṣa salviriṅ lara, vighnaniṅ śarīra Ilaṅ donya.</p>
.
.<p n="III.300">hana brata, tan paṅinum vvai, tatkāla savuku galuṅan, Aṅhiṅ tāmaṅan antiga binǝṅdhǝm, harәpiṅ dhәṅǝn, sambi aṅadǝg tәṅaṅ ṅve tatkāla guṅe, Arddhaṇa bhaṭāra mrәtyu, phalanya kәdhuk timbul, tutug tumuvuh, puruṣa viśeṣa, śakti vani, kineriṅan deniṅ jagat, labdha vara gragaluṅān.</p>
3505
.<p n="III.301">hana brata, aṅambaṅ, ṅa, yan amaṅan kinambaṅakәn riṅ bañu, satavun samayanya, bhaṭāra viṣṇu maveh brata, pha, mañjanma riṅ kaḍaṅ ajī, sugih vәsi, tūr keḍәp kavi prajurit.</p>
.
.<p n="IV">nyan ta saṅ citta varaṇā, umarah [ri] saṅ vala kula, mūla tattvaniṅ dadi kabeh, pahenak paṅrәṅə̄nta, mūlabhoktaniṅ kanirāśrayan, mvaṅ kābhyudayan, bhāvanya mvaṅ lakṣaṇanya, pūrvanya mvaṅ vәkasnya, maṅkana liṅ saṅ vala kula, nǝmbah hulun, Om̐ viku satakvan[,] tānaku, kita pva siksa ṅaran ika, duga-duga tumakvan, vuvus maṅkana, rәṅə̄n siptan i ṅhulun.
.
3510
.pūrvaṃ śrī puruṣānte, varānugraha makanya, saṅ rojyam, narāsakane, Ayavaṃ vidyaṃ prajayaṃ.
.
.maṅkana pariñciniṅ cipta, kaliṅanya, pūrva haraniṅ mimitan, tripuruṣa haraniṅ brahmā viṣṇu Iśvara, vara ṅaraniṅ amiddhi , anugraha haraniṅ panuṅsuṅ , manoka ṅaraniṅ devata, saroja [45v] ṅaraniṅ manūtra, nara ṅaraniṅ mānuṣa, sakāla ṅaraniṅ samaṅke, yaśa ṅaraniṅ kirti, vidyā ṅaraniṅ hajī, aprayadha ṅaraniṅ pūjā,
.

.kaliṅanya, bhaṭāra sira magave pratapa riṅ vana giri, maṅaṣkāra bhaṭāra, bhaṭārī, Atitah kasukan amragat trәṣṇā, anusupi vanavāsa, maṅǝnakǝn tapa, manaṅsāra rāga, tinūt deniṅ manūṣa maṅke, atapa abrata, ayoga asamadhī, ayajña dāna kīrti,

.maṅhanakǝn brata apayapanya, Ulandriya, rumәgǝp pañcendriya, tuṅgalakәna riṅ tri sandhyā, piṇdhakǝn riṅ kaparāmarthan, vaḍahana yoga, sahabana samadhi, tindihana brata, tuṅgunǝniṅ dāna kīrti, laṅlaṅana riṅ āgama, pagǝrana pupūjān sasapon, lavaṅana saṅgarma, ugǝr ugǝrana sadā, inǝbana tuhu, tindihana kañciṅanā parāmartha,

3530
.nambah hulun, mapa riṅ kanirāśrayan, mәne pukulun,

3535sājña pukulun, vurukәniṅ brata pukulun, pariñcinya, mvaṅ phalanya, A U ma.</p>
.
.<p n="III.302">hana brata, tan pamaṅan tan paturu, bratanira saṅ hyaṅ vәkasniṅ kavi viśeṣa. pha, svarga lәvih, titisnya añakravartti, subhaga anulus, anurāga riṅ rāt, katәkan sapinakṣanira riṅ bhūmi, dinuluriṅ āyu, śakti vani mahābhāra.
.</p>
.
3540<p n="III.303">hana brata, ambhairava pakṣa, siṅ pinaṅan, tuhun tan trәṣṇeṅ turu, bhaṭāra pavakānugrahani, mvaṅ devata, [pha,] bhūta gandharva masih, janmanya puruṣa viśeṣa, subhaga hanulus, ajrih kaṅ sarva galak.</p>
.
.<p n="III.304">hana brata, tan paṅgilani sarva tinaḍah, sambarana , ṅa, pha, viryavan siddha sugih saṅkan rare.</p>
.
.<p n="III.305">hana brata, ṅarәṅ, ṅa, amaṅan harәṅ rumuhun[,] bhaṭārī gaṅga hyaṅniṅ brata, ma, Om̐ gaṅgā ya namah, salek samayanya, pha, apәkik kerәṅan deniṅ jagat.</p>
3545
.<p n="III.306">hana brata, yan amaṅan maivak harәṅ tumpə̄r, pәtaṅ tavun samayanya, pha, keḍәp riṅ samanta janma, kinasihaniṅ rāt, keḍәpiṅ arabi anak anak. </p>
.
.<p n="III.307">hana brata, maṅan apisan, pituṅ lek pituṅ vәṅi samayanya, pha, kinasihaniṅ rāt.</p>
.
3550<p n="III.308">hana brata nitīkrama, ṅa, amaṅan sadina sapisan, saṅ hyaṅ smara hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, siṅ prih meṅgal katәmu, dirghyuṣa. </p>
.
.<p n="III.309">nahan brata, maṅan piṅ saptami, pituṅ lek samayanya, kinasihaniṅ rāt phalanya.</p>
.
.<p n="III.310">hana brata, ambhūmi amasar bhuvana, ṅa, pha, sugih lәmah sīma. </p>
3555
.<p n="III.311">hana brata, maṅaniṅ lәmah, pituṅ śaśih lavasnya, kinasihaniṅ rāt phalanya, bhūmi ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.</p>
.
.<p n="III.312">hana brata, mañcavara, ṅa, U, marәp maṅetan amaṅan, pa, marәp kidul amaṅan. pva, marәp aṅulon. va, marәp aṅalor amaṅan. ka, siṅ harәpira maṅan, duluranya lalab kabeh, mvaṅ kǝmbaṅ hanūt kadi varṇaniṅ sәga, pañcavarṇa, putih kuniṅ abaṅ Irәṅ, riṅ teṅah pañcavarṇa, deva rata hyaṅnya, pha, mantuk iṅ svarga pada bhaṭāra śiva, !pamit!, ma, Om̐ Om̐ śrī jagat guru paduke bhyo namah. sasarnya mañjanma rata añakravr̥tti, tan kapadhān. </p>
.
3560<p n="III.313">hana brata, mañca vara dalәm, ṅa, kramanya, amaṅan uyah kevala, amaṅan sәkul kevala, salek tәluṅ dina samayanya, vus maṅkana, ulam kevala, vus maṅkana, toya kevala, vus maṅkana, aṅinaṅ kevala, vus maṅkana lavasnya, kәneṅ paṅan, tan kәneṅ turu, samaṅkana lavasnya, saṅ hyaṅ vәkasiṅ anuṅku rāt hyaṅnya ikaṅ brata, tan upir upir sukanta, mantuk riṅ svargan bhaṭāra dharma, janmanya suka maṅan aṅaṅgur, tan aṅhel panambut gave, suka sugih tan pasaṅkan, kaṅ vvaṅ masih deva bikṣuka, muleh iri kita.</p>
.
.<p n="III.314">hana brata, luhuriṅ kayu, ṅa, tigaṅ lek samayanya, pha, vrәddhi putra, tur keḍәp siṅ paṅucap.
.
.</p>
3565
.<p n="III.315">hana brata, aturu luhuriṅ kayu, salek divasanya, pha, śakti kasiddhyan kapaṅguh.</p>
.
.<p n="III.316">hana brata, aṅalasa, ṅa, asaṅidaniṅ alas savәguṅ, tan papasa deniṅ voṅ, ṅuniveh sarva sato, asǝp, pha, prajurit riṅ paravu, aṅuṅgahana bahanya, va, harәṅ prajurit riṅ darāt luṅguhana vatu, [devatanya] saṅ buddha subrata, sasarnya dam puvavaṅ riṅ paravu, sugih savah, tur sugih paravu.</p>
.
3570<p n="III.317">hana brata, ṅraka sabran tilәm mvaṅ pūrṇama, sarva putus, ṅa, saṅ hyaṅ silih asih maveh brata, pha, tinuṅgviṅ rāma reṇa, suka sugih prih avak, tur tan paṅubiṅ voṅ atuha.</p>
.
.<p n="III.318">hana brata, maṅan gǝḍaṅ tan kinulitan, tәluṅ vәṅi samayanya, saṅ hyaṅ murṣita hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, apәkik, yen istri mǝṅgǝpiṅ pahyunan, abәcikiṅ buddhi, vruhiṅ kaliṅanya, pituturiṅ bapebu.</p>
.
.<p n="III.319">hana brata, maṅan tuhuṅ pitpit rumuhun, saṅ hyaṅ maṇik muñcar, ṅaraniṅ brata, saṅ hyaṅ maṇik aṅuñci pǝpǝt sira turunābrata, pinakabaghā, pinakarūpa, paṅadǝganiṅ vavadon, pinakalistvayu, [pha] drәman manis ta kita, lindihǝn voṅ apәkik, drәman anak anak, aputu riṅ niṣkala.</p>
3575
.<p n="III.320">hana brata, ṅgilir kacaṅ, ṅa, kramanya, aṅuvāsa savәguṅ, amaṅan savәguṅ, hyaṅ prajā sadā hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, mantuk riṅ svargan bhaṭāra Iśvara, sasarnya mañjanma suka sugih, lәvih anulus, yan lanaṅ puruṣa kula pratyakṣa anurāga kita, sugih pisis riṅ dlāha, yan istri samaṅkana.</p>
.
.<p n="III.321">hana brata, yan amaṅan sinaren kasumba, saṅ hyaṅ maṇik pari rāja, ṅa, hyaṅ maṇik teja bhūmi turunābrata, ya pinakarūpa, pinakarah-dagiṅ, pinakahati, [pha,] riṅ dadi vvaṅ, suka sugih, listvayu, sәkar analum, akǝmbaṅ avoh riṅ niṣkala.
.
3580</p>
.
.<p n="III.322">hana brata, maṅan sәkul sapuluṅ, saṅ hyaṅ maṇik tampa, ṅaraniṅ brata, saṅ hyaṅ maṇḍala hyaṅniṅ brata, ya pinakarūpa, pinakakukusaniṅ śarīra, [pha,] asǝsǝkan kanakāguṅ, kalavan alit, aśrī asambaṅ jarijya, siddhaniṅ vvaṅ suka sugih, tan pәgat sādhana, mvaṅ mās maṇik, kinanti jagat kinanti japa kita riṅ dlāha.</p>
.
.<p n="III.323">hana brata, maṅān sәkul putih kuniṅ, aṅkǝn kalivon, humārәp purvva, mevaka bhīra, paṅan pisan saṅaṅ kalivon divasanya, Uttamā saṅaṅ vulan, bhaṭāra śiva hyaṅniṅ brata, papalihan hyaṅ antadeva, ya pinakarūpa, pinakasamūha, pinakadirgha yuṣa, yan lanaṅ pinakapәkikan, pinakapolah, pinakararas, yan vadon pinakakahayon pinakapolah , pinakahibon, pha, mulihiṅ svarga bhaṭāra śiva, sasarnya mañjanma riṅ prabhu añakravarti, viku, bhujaṅga, śeva sogata, sugih malǝṅkә riṅ mās pirak, sarva sosoca, rare, hulun, kәbo sapi, mrәgādi, vrәddhi putra, tinuṅgviṅ bapebu, kaki nini, ma, Om̐ hram̐ hrim̐ sah parāmaśivāditya ya namah, ahyas.</p>
3585
.<p n="III.324">hana brata, amiśe[49r]ṣa, ṅa, yan amaṅan tan pahupa, anlasana sәkul, yan vus kinurәn kurәn, ma, Atma tuturakәna mariṅ bhaṭāra viśeṣa, umuṅguh riṅ vindu nadha, sakāla niṣkāla, viśeṣa bhaṭāra baja, maty aturu, maty aluṅguh, maty aṅadǝg, lәsālәyǝp, pavak tan paśarīra sakāla niṣkāla.</p>
.
.<p n="III.325">hana brata, nūtakǝn saśila bhaṭāra gaṇa, amuṣpa gaṇa, ṅa, yan amaṅan sәga nǝm kǝpǝl, sarahina, tiṅkahiṅ amaṅan, śīla gaṇā, nǝm vulan samayanya, pha, mantuk iṅ bhaṭāra guru, sasarnya mañjanma riṅ viku Ijo, śakti dūra darśana, sojar ira keḍǝp.</p>
.
3590<p n="III.326">hana brata, maṅan sәga sinaṅga ri taṅan kiva, tan patәdha tan patambǝh, tan apilih ivaknya, Apan mayoni, ṅa, hyaṅ siddhi narasiṅha turunābrata, ya pinakarūpa, pinakalaku , [pha,] siddhaniṅ vaṅ anambadani śabda, sihniṅ rāt, ma, Om̐ Om̐ siddhi kāraṇāya namah svāhā, yan ahyas.</p>
.
.<p n="III.327">hana brata, jaṅga varṇa, ṅa, amaṅan [49v] sәga balaka, pituṅ dina lavasnya mābhyāsa, pha, keḍәp savuvusta deniṅ rāt, prajñan vicakṣaṇa, biṣa gamǝl aṅiduṅ.
.
.</p>
3595
.<p n="III.328">hana brata, jaga śatru, ṅa, saṅ hyaṅ saptanala hyaṅniṅ brata, kramanya, taṅgal pisan piṅ ro tәmu taṅgal piṅ pitu, lamun huvus sumurup vulan juga kita vәnaṅ aturu, livat saṅkeṅ taṅgal piṅ pitu, sakarәptāturu, maṅkāneṅ krәṣṇa pakṣa, lamun mәtu vulan juga kita turu, livat saṅke rika, sakarәpta turu, pha, riṅ dadi vvaṅ sugih, tan hana nuskr̥ta , riṅ niṣkāla.
.
.</p>
.
3600<p n="III.329">hana brata, mūrāba, ṅa, maṅlәkasa taṅgaliṅ kapat mabrata, maṅana purāṇa, kǝmbaṅ nāgasāri, kulalaṭa, malabahaniṅ pūrṇama , polihnyāpәkik hayu tan pasiriṅ, ma, Om̐ smarāya namah, yan ahyas.</p>
.
.<p n="III.330">hana brata, taṅgal piṅ savlas, Atikukus, ṅa, phalanya virya, drәman anulus.
.
.</p>
3605
.<p n="III.331">hana brata, maṅan aronāron, ulam kalapa binakar, lima vәlas dina divasanya, saṅ hyaṅ viśeṣa hyaṅ[50r]niṅ brata, pha, abәcik kaṅ hulon.
.
.</p>
.
3610<p n="III.332">hana brata, amaṅan tan paron, pituṅ lek divasanya, pha, siddhakārya, jaya patra ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana. </p>
.
.<p n="III.333">hana brata, ṅavaśakәn sakvehiṅ brata, pha, mantuk iṅ svarga bhaṭāra Umapati, [pha,] janmanya prabhu añakravartti, viku śakti bahu sikṣa, labdha vara subhaga.</p>
.
.<p n="III.334">hana brata, kadi rare, tan kinatәṅǝtakәn, pha, tan pavali valyañjanma kita, sasarnya dadi ratu. </p>
3615
.<p n="III.335">nihan brata, amati agni, asisirih, 3, dina, tan pamaṅan sakalvirnya, tutug 3, dina, alabahan, tur tīrthanana, pha, hilaṅ pāpa kleṣaniṅ śarīra.
.
.</p>
.
3620<p n="III.336">hana brata, amaṅan sǝsǝdhǝp rumuhun, pituṅ tavun divasanya, bhaṭārī vastu hyaṅniṅ brata, pha, keḍәpiṅ rāt.</p>
.
.<p n="III.337">hana brata, maṅan mevak uyah harәṅ, pha, keḍәp riṅ rāt, kineriṅan deniṅ bhuvana, kinajrihaniṅ śatru.
.
.</p>
3625
.<p n="III.338">Ana brata, mamaṅan catur varṇa, limaṅ vәṅi lavasanya, prajña śakti phalanika, tәhǝr kinasihaniṅ rāt, Apurvva kita, sakabdhu ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana.
.
.</p>
.
3630<p n="III.339">hana brata maṅan riyana, 5, tәluṅ lek lavasnya, pha, halus jarijinta, niromanira.</p>
.
.<p n="III.340">hana brata, ṅantara, ṅa, maṅan tṅaṅ ve , tәṅah vәṅi, tigaṅ lek lavasnya mabhyāsa, pha, śakti saturasta, suka magə̄ṅ.</p>
.
.<p n="III.341">hana brata, maṅan pituṅ kәpǝl, sadina, pituṅ rahina samayanya, mabrata, catur ṅaraniṅ brata, [pha] riṅ dadi vvaṅ sarva vәsi tan tumamāhi śariranta, riṅ niṣkāla.</p>
3635
.<p n="III.342">hana brata, yan amaṅan tan paluṅguh, saṅ hyaṅ hayu maveh brata, saṅ hyaṅ laku laku haraniṅ brata, ya pinakarūpa hayu raspati, [pha] suka riṅ lakunta, lәbur tampakta aśri iṅiriṅan, deniṅ pavoṅan, siddhaniṅ vvaṅ suka sugih, amūkti sāriniṅ kaḍaton, kita riṅ dlāha.</p>
.
.<p n="III.343">hana brata, amadhapa, ṅa, amaṅan riṅ paṅkon, malamak patra, saṅ hyaṅ sūkṣma maveh brata, phalanya sapolahta pantǝs, tan pәgat sihniṅ malakya rabi, salek samayanya, ma, Om̐ sūkṣmāya namah, pamit.
.
3640</p>
.
.<p n="III.344">hana brata, tan pamaṅan sarvāmbǝkan, naṅkǝn pon, mvaṅ kalivon, pha, keḍәpiṅ rāt.</p>
.
.<p n="III.345">hana brata, yan amaṅan aṅilo riṅ pahesan, naṅkǝn pūrṇama, satavun divasanya, pha, mañjanma riṅ kabayan buyut sugih.</p>
3645
.<p n="III.346">nihan aji rambut, amaṅan sәga hirәṅ, naṅkǝn caturthi, śukla pakṣa, ma, hulun aṅaji rambut, tan abaṅ, tan ana raṅraṅ, tan ana putih, sәlǝm abuluniṅ gagak, adava, alambas, atәtәl, ṅkon rambutin hulun, katәmu maṅko, lәvih kaṅ tǝmbe hulun aṅaji rambut, vastu hulun aṅaji rambut, Om̐ sa ba ta A I namā śivāya.</p>
.
.<p n="III.347">hana brata, mona mūjā, pha, deva masih iri kita. </p>
.
3650<p n="III.348">hana brata, mona, ṅa, yan aṅisiṅ, yan ahuyuh, yan adyus, yan alәlәṅa, yan abasahan, yan lumaku, pituṅ lek samayanya, bhaṭāra śiva maveh brata, sasarnya sugih duve, sugih vәka, tur keḍәp, mañjanma riṅ mantrī.</p>
.
.<p>I śaka, 1722. Vai, ka, vrә, vara mrakih, praṭipadā riṅ śukla pakṣa, Asuji maśa, rah, 2, tǝṅgǝk, 2. I rika divasanya, pūrṇna linikhita. </p>
.
.
3655
.</div>
.
.<!-- Mon 29 Desember 2025-->
.
3660 </div>

. </text>

hana brata yan amaṅan anūtakǝn vulan ... śiṣya təka] In P the title of the brata, mantra, and result is same with other witnesses, but tend to different in the technique to perform the observance. This is the complete passage of the ms P. "hana bratā hañutakәn hulan·, yan hamaṅan taṅgal hapisan·, sakәpәl·, taṁ, 2, rvaṁ kәpәl·, muṅgah sakәpәl· sadinā, tәkāniṁ taṅgal·, piṁ, 14, pūṛnama hamr̥ti, yan paṅloṁ hapisan·, piṁ, 14, sinuddhana sakәpәl·, tәkaniṁ til̥m hamr̥ti, tigaṁ lek· ṣamayanya, bhaṭārendra hyaṁnya, ma, Ōm̐ surendra ya namaḥ, pamit·. phalanya mantukiṁ bhaṭāra śivā, sasaṛnya mañjanmā riṁ ratu, mvaṁ riṁ vikva bhavu siṣyā kitā." G U in III.26 M N P in III.29 mañjanma M N
maṅjanma Gmvaṅ M N
mva Gbhaṭāra M N
om. Gyaniṅ M N

hana bratā tan ... mrih iri kita N in III.135 N
